å¦‚æœéƒ½æŒ‰ç…§ä¸Šè¿°çš„æ“ä½œæ–¹å¼æ¥å¤„ç†è¿™äº›å…¬å…±å­—æ®µ, éœ€è¦åœ¨æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªä¸šåŠ¡æ–¹æ³•ä¸­è¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œ, ç¼–ç ç›¸å¯¹å†—ä½™ã€ç¹çï¼Œé‚£èƒ½ä¸èƒ½å¯¹äºè¿™äº›å…¬å…±å­—æ®µåœ¨æŸä¸ªåœ°æ–¹ç»Ÿä¸€å¤„ç†ï¼Œæ¥ç®€åŒ–å¼€å‘å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

ç­”æ¡ˆæ˜¯å¯ä»¥çš„ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨AOPåˆ‡é¢ç¼–ç¨‹ï¼Œå®ç°åŠŸèƒ½å¢å¼ºï¼Œæ¥å®Œæˆå…¬å…±å­—æ®µè‡ªåŠ¨å¡«å……åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

1.2 å®ç°æ€è·¯ â€‹

åœ¨å®ç°å…¬å…±å­—æ®µè‡ªåŠ¨å¡«å……ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯åœ¨æ’å…¥æˆ–è€…æ›´æ–°çš„æ—¶å€™ä¸ºæŒ‡å®šå­—æ®µèµ‹äºˆæŒ‡å®šçš„å€¼ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨å®ƒçš„å¥½å¤„å°±æ˜¯å¯ä»¥ç»Ÿä¸€å¯¹è¿™äº›å­—æ®µè¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†ï¼Œé¿å…äº†é‡å¤ä»£ç ã€‚åœ¨ä¸Šè¿°çš„é—®é¢˜åˆ†æä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æåˆ°æœ‰å››ä¸ªå…¬å…±å­—æ®µï¼Œéœ€è¦åœ¨æ–°å¢/æ›´æ–°ä¸­è¿›è¡Œèµ‹å€¼æ“ä½œ, å…·ä½“æƒ…å†µå¦‚ä¸‹:

åºå·å­—æ®µåå«ä¹‰æ•°æ®ç±»å‹æ“ä½œç±»å‹
1create_timeåˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´datetimeinsert
2create_useråˆ›å»ºäººidbigintinsert
3update_timeä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´datetimeinsertã€update
4update_userä¿®æ”¹äººidbigintinsertã€update

å®ç°æ­¥éª¤ â€‹

1). è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ³¨è§£ AutoFillï¼Œç”¨äºæ ‡è¯†éœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œå…¬å…±å­—æ®µè‡ªåŠ¨å¡«å……çš„æ–¹æ³• â€‹
2). è‡ªå®šä¹‰åˆ‡é¢ç±» AutoFillAspectï¼Œç»Ÿä¸€æ‹¦æˆªåŠ å…¥äº† AutoFill æ³¨è§£çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œé€šè¿‡åå°„ä¸ºå…¬å…±å­—æ®µèµ‹å€¼ â€‹
3). åœ¨ Mapper çš„æ–¹æ³•ä¸ŠåŠ å…¥ AutoFill æ³¨è§£ â€‹

è‹¥è¦å®ç°ä¸Šè¿°æ­¥éª¤ï¼Œéœ€æŒæ¡ä»¥ä¸‹çŸ¥è¯†(ä¹‹å‰è¯¾ç¨‹å†…å®¹éƒ½å­¦è¿‡)

**æŠ€æœ¯ç‚¹ï¼š**æšä¸¾ã€æ³¨è§£ã€AOPã€åå°„

1.3 ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

æŒ‰ç…§ä¸Šä¸€å°èŠ‚åˆ†æçš„å®ç°æ­¥éª¤ä¾æ¬¡å®ç°ï¼Œå…±ä¸‰æ­¥ã€‚

1.3.1 æ­¥éª¤ä¸€ â€‹

è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ³¨è§£ AutoFill

è¿›å…¥åˆ°sky-serveræ¨¡å—ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºcom.sky.annotationåŒ…ã€‚

java
package com.sky.annotation;

import com.sky.enumeration.OperationType;
import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
import java.lang.annotation.Target;

/**
 * è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ³¨è§£ï¼Œç”¨äºæ ‡è¯†æŸä¸ªæ–¹æ³•éœ€è¦è¿›è¡ŒåŠŸèƒ½å­—æ®µè‡ªåŠ¨å¡«å……å¤„ç†
 */
@Target(ElementType.METHOD)
@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
public @interface AutoFill {
    //æ•°æ®åº“æ“ä½œç±»å‹ï¼šUPDATE INSERT
    OperationType value();
}

å…¶ä¸­OperationTypeå·²åœ¨sky-commonæ¨¡å—ä¸­å®šä¹‰

java
package com.sky.enumeration;

/**
 * æ•°æ®åº“æ“ä½œç±»å‹
 */
public enum OperationType {

    /**
     * æ›´æ–°æ“ä½œ
     */
    UPDATE,

    /**
     * æ’å…¥æ“ä½œ
     */
    INSERT
}

1.3.2 åå°„ â€‹

Javaåå°„ï¼ˆReflectionï¼‰æ˜¯ä¸€ç§åœ¨**è¿è¡Œæ—¶åˆ†æç±»ã€æ¥å£ã€æ–¹æ³•ã€å­—æ®µç­‰ç»“æ„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå¹¶å¯¹è¿™äº›ç»“æ„è¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œçš„æœºåˆ¶**ã€‚å®ƒå…è®¸ç¨‹åºåœ¨è¿è¡Œæ—¶åŠ¨æ€åœ°è·å–å¯¹è±¡çš„ç±»å‹ä¿¡æ¯å’Œæˆå‘˜ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå¹¶èƒ½å¤Ÿåˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡ã€è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³•ã€è®¿é—®å’Œä¿®æ”¹å­—æ®µçš„å€¼ç­‰ã€‚åå°„åœ¨æ¡†æ¶å¼€å‘ã€å·¥å…·åº“ã€åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†ã€æ³¨è§£å¤„ç†ç­‰åœºæ™¯ä¸­éå¸¸å¸¸ç”¨ã€‚

åå°„çš„æ ¸å¿ƒç±» â€‹

Javaåå°„ä¸»è¦é€šè¿‡ä»¥ä¸‹å‡ ä¸ªæ ¸å¿ƒç±»å’Œæ¥å£æ¥å®ç°ï¼š

  1. Classç±»ï¼šç”¨äºè·å–ç±»çš„ç»“æ„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå¦‚ç±»åã€ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦ã€å­—æ®µã€æ–¹æ³•ã€æ„é€ å™¨ç­‰ã€‚
  2. Methodç±»ï¼šç”¨äºè¡¨ç¤ºç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¹¶å…è®¸è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³•ã€‚
  3. Fieldç±»ï¼šç”¨äºè¡¨ç¤ºç±»çš„å­—æ®µï¼Œå¹¶å…è®¸è¯»å–å’Œä¿®æ”¹å­—æ®µçš„å€¼ã€‚
  4. Constructorç±»ï¼šç”¨äºè¡¨ç¤ºç±»çš„æ„é€ å™¨ï¼Œå¹¶å…è®¸åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„å®ä¾‹ã€‚
  5. Arrayç±»ï¼šç”¨äºåŠ¨æ€åˆ›å»ºå’Œè®¿é—®æ•°ç»„ã€‚
åå°„å¸¸ç”¨æ–¹æ³• â€‹

  1. è·å–Classå¯¹è±¡ï¼š

    • Class.forName(String className)ï¼šé€šè¿‡ç±»çš„å…¨é™å®šåè·å–Classå¯¹è±¡ã€‚
    • ç±»å.classï¼šç›´æ¥é€šè¿‡ç±»åè·å–Classå¯¹è±¡ã€‚
    • å¯¹è±¡.getClass()ï¼šé€šè¿‡å®ä¾‹å¯¹è±¡è·å–Classå¯¹è±¡ã€‚

  2. åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡ï¼š

    • Class.newInstance()ï¼šè°ƒç”¨æ— å‚æ„é€ å™¨åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡ã€‚
    • Constructor.newInstance(Object... initargs)ï¼šè°ƒç”¨æŒ‡å®šæ„é€ å™¨åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡ã€‚

  3. è·å–ç±»çš„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š

    • getName()ï¼šè·å–ç±»çš„å…¨é™å®šåã€‚
    • getMethods()/getDeclaredMethods()ï¼šè·å–ç±»çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬ç§æœ‰çš„ï¼‰ã€‚
    • getFields()/getDeclaredFields()ï¼šè·å–ç±»çš„æ‰€æœ‰å­—æ®µï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬ç§æœ‰çš„ï¼‰ã€‚
    • getConstructors()/getDeclaredConstructors()ï¼šè·å–ç±»çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ„é€ å™¨ï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬ç§æœ‰çš„ï¼‰ã€‚

  4. è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

    • Method.invoke(Object obj, Object... args)ï¼šåœ¨æŒ‡å®šå¯¹è±¡ä¸Šè°ƒç”¨è¯¥æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

  5. è®¿é—®å’Œä¿®æ”¹å­—æ®µï¼š

    • Field.get(Object obj)ï¼šè·å–å­—æ®µçš„å€¼ã€‚
    • Field.set(Object obj, Object value)ï¼šä¿®æ”¹å­—æ®µçš„å€¼ã€‚
ç”¨ä¾‹ç¤ºä¾‹ â€‹

ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼Œæ¼”ç¤ºå¦‚ä½•ä½¿ç”¨åå°„æ¥åŠ¨æ€åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡ã€è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³•å’Œè®¿é—®å­—æ®µï¼š

java
public class Person {
    private String name;
    private int age;

    public Person() {
        this.name = "John";
        this.age = 30;
    }

    public Person(String name, int age) {
        this.name = name;
        this.age = age;
    }

    public void setName(String name) {
        this.name = name;
    }

    public String getName() {
        return name;
    }

    public int getAge() {
        return age;
    }

    private void secretMethod() {
        System.out.println("This is a secret method!");
    }
}

public class ReflectionExample {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
        // è·å–Classå¯¹è±¡
        Class<?> personClass = Class.forName("Person");

        // åˆ›å»ºPersonå¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆæ— å‚æ„é€ å™¨ï¼‰
        Object person1 = personClass.getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance();

        // è°ƒç”¨setNameæ–¹æ³•
        Method setNameMethod = personClass.getMethod("setName", String.class);
        setNameMethod.invoke(person1, "Alice");

        // è·å–å¹¶æ‰“å°nameå­—æ®µçš„å€¼
        Field nameField = personClass.getDeclaredField("name");
        nameField.setAccessible(true); // å…è®¸è®¿é—®ç§æœ‰å­—æ®µ
        System.out.println("Name: " + nameField.get(person1));

        // è°ƒç”¨ç§æœ‰æ–¹æ³•
        Method secretMethod = personClass.getDeclaredMethod("secretMethod");
        secretMethod.setAccessible(true); // å…è®¸è°ƒç”¨ç§æœ‰æ–¹æ³•
        secretMethod.invoke(person1);
    }
}
è¾“å‡ºç»“æœ â€‹
Name: Alice
This is a secret method!
åå°„çš„ä¼˜ç¼ºç‚¹ â€‹

  • ä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼š

    • åŠ¨æ€æ€§ï¼šåå°„å…è®¸åœ¨è¿è¡Œæ—¶åŠ¨æ€åœ°æ“ä½œç±»å’Œå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œé€‚åˆäºç¼–å†™çµæ´»çš„æ¡†æ¶å’Œå·¥å…·ã€‚
    • é€šç”¨æ€§ï¼šå¯ä»¥ç¼–å†™é€šç”¨çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºå¤šç§ç±»å‹ï¼Œè€Œä¸ä¾èµ–äºå…·ä½“ç±»çš„å®ç°ã€‚

  • ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼š

    • æ€§èƒ½å¼€é”€ï¼šåå°„æ¶‰åŠåŠ¨æ€è§£æï¼Œä¼šæœ‰ä¸€å®šçš„æ€§èƒ½æŸè€—ã€‚

    • å®‰å…¨æ€§é—®é¢˜ï¼šåå°„å¯ä»¥ç»•è¿‡è®¿é—®æ§åˆ¶é™åˆ¶ï¼Œè®¿é—®ç§æœ‰æˆå‘˜ï¼Œå¯èƒ½å¼•å‘å®‰å…¨é—®é¢˜ã€‚

    • ä»£ç å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šåå°„ä»£ç ç›¸å¯¹å¤æ‚ï¼Œå¯è¯»æ€§å’Œå¯ç»´æŠ¤æ€§è¾ƒä½ã€‚

åå°„æœºåˆ¶å¼ºå¤§ä¸”çµæ´»ï¼Œä½†åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨æ—¶éœ€è¦æƒè¡¡å…¶å¸¦æ¥çš„æ€§èƒ½å’Œå®‰å…¨æ€§é—®é¢˜ã€‚

1.3.3 æ­¥éª¤äºŒ â€‹

è‡ªå®šä¹‰åˆ‡é¢ AutoFillAspect

åœ¨sky-serveræ¨¡å—ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºcom.sky.aspectåŒ…ã€‚

java
package com.sky.aspect;

/**
 * è‡ªå®šä¹‰åˆ‡é¢ï¼Œå®ç°å…¬å…±å­—æ®µè‡ªåŠ¨å¡«å……å¤„ç†é€»è¾‘
 */
@Aspect
@Component
@Slf4j
public class AutoFillAspect {

    /**
     * åˆ‡å…¥ç‚¹
     */
    @Pointcut("execution(* com.sky.mapper.*.*(..)) && @annotation(com.sky.annotation.AutoFill)")
    public void autoFillPointCut(){}

    /**
     * å‰ç½®é€šçŸ¥ï¼Œåœ¨é€šçŸ¥ä¸­è¿›è¡Œå…¬å…±å­—æ®µçš„èµ‹å€¼
     */
    @Before("autoFillPointCut()")
    public void autoFill(JoinPoint joinPoint){
        /////////////////////é‡è¦////////////////////////////////////
        //å¯å…ˆè¿›è¡Œè°ƒè¯•ï¼Œæ˜¯å¦èƒ½è¿›å…¥è¯¥æ–¹æ³• æå‰åœ¨mapperæ–¹æ³•æ·»åŠ AutoFillæ³¨è§£
        log.info("å¼€å§‹è¿›è¡Œå…¬å…±å­—æ®µè‡ªåŠ¨å¡«å……...");

    }
}

å®Œå–„è‡ªå®šä¹‰åˆ‡é¢ AutoFillAspect çš„ autoFill æ–¹æ³•

java
package com.sky.aspect;

import com.sky.annotation.AutoFill;
import com.sky.constant.AutoFillConstant;
import com.sky.context.BaseContext;
import com.sky.enumeration.OperationType;
import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Aspect;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Before;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.Pointcut;
import org.aspectj.lang.reflect.MethodSignature;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
import java.lang.reflect.Method;
import java.time.LocalDateTime;

/**
 * è‡ªå®šä¹‰åˆ‡é¢ï¼Œå®ç°å…¬å…±å­—æ®µè‡ªåŠ¨å¡«å……å¤„ç†é€»è¾‘
 */
@Aspect
@Component
@Slf4j
public class AutoFillAspect {

    /**
     * åˆ‡å…¥ç‚¹
     */
    @Pointcut("execution(* com.sky.mapper.*.*(..)) && @annotation(com.sky.annotation.AutoFill)")
    public void autoFillPointCut(){}

    /**
     * å‰ç½®é€šçŸ¥ï¼Œåœ¨é€šçŸ¥ä¸­è¿›è¡Œå…¬å…±å­—æ®µçš„èµ‹å€¼
     */
    @Before("autoFillPointCut()")
    public void autoFill(JoinPoint joinPoint){
        log.info("å¼€å§‹è¿›è¡Œå…¬å…±å­—æ®µè‡ªåŠ¨å¡«å……...");

        //è·å–åˆ°å½“å‰è¢«æ‹¦æˆªçš„æ–¹æ³•ä¸Šçš„æ•°æ®åº“æ“ä½œç±»å‹
        MethodSignature signature = (MethodSignature) joinPoint.getSignature();//æ–¹æ³•ç­¾åå¯¹è±¡
        AutoFill autoFill = signature.getMethod().getAnnotation(AutoFill.class);//è·å¾—æ–¹æ³•ä¸Šçš„æ³¨è§£å¯¹è±¡
        OperationType operationType = autoFill.value();//è·å¾—æ•°æ®åº“æ“ä½œç±»å‹

        //è·å–åˆ°å½“å‰è¢«æ‹¦æˆªçš„æ–¹æ³•çš„å‚æ•°--å®ä½“å¯¹è±¡
        Object[] args = joinPoint.getArgs();
        if(args == null || args.length == 0){
            return;
        }

        Object entity = args[0];

        //å‡†å¤‡èµ‹å€¼çš„æ•°æ®
        LocalDateTime now = LocalDateTime.now();
        Long currentId = BaseContext.getCurrentId();

        //æ ¹æ®å½“å‰ä¸åŒçš„æ“ä½œç±»å‹ï¼Œä¸ºå¯¹åº”çš„å±æ€§é€šè¿‡åå°„æ¥èµ‹å€¼
        if(operationType == OperationType.INSERT){
            //ä¸º4ä¸ªå…¬å…±å­—æ®µèµ‹å€¼
            try {
                Method setCreateTime = entity.getClass().getDeclaredMethod(AutoFillConstant.SET_CREATE_TIME, LocalDateTime.class);
                Method setCreateUser = entity.getClass().getDeclaredMethod(AutoFillConstant.SET_CREATE_USER, Long.class);
                Method setUpdateTime = entity.getClass().getDeclaredMethod(AutoFillConstant.SET_UPDATE_TIME, LocalDateTime.class);
                Method setUpdateUser = entity.getClass().getDeclaredMethod(AutoFillConstant.SET_UPDATE_USER, Long.class);

                //é€šè¿‡åå°„ä¸ºå¯¹è±¡å±æ€§èµ‹å€¼
                setCreateTime.invoke(entity,now);
                setCreateUser.invoke(entity,currentId);
                setUpdateTime.invoke(entity,now);
                setUpdateUser.invoke(entity,currentId);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }else if(operationType == OperationType.UPDATE){
            //ä¸º2ä¸ªå…¬å…±å­—æ®µèµ‹å€¼
            try {
                Method setUpdateTime = entity.getClass().getDeclaredMethod(AutoFillConstant.SET_UPDATE_TIME, LocalDateTime.class);
                Method setUpdateUser = entity.getClass().getDeclaredMethod(AutoFillConstant.SET_UPDATE_USER, Long.class);

                //é€šè¿‡åå°„ä¸ºå¯¹è±¡å±æ€§èµ‹å€¼
                setUpdateTime.invoke(entity,now);
                setUpdateUser.invoke(entity,currentId);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }
}

1.3.4 æ­¥éª¤ä¸‰ â€‹

åœ¨Mapperæ¥å£çš„æ–¹æ³•ä¸ŠåŠ å…¥ AutoFill æ³¨è§£

ä»¥CategoryMapperä¸ºä¾‹ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«åœ¨æ–°å¢å’Œä¿®æ”¹æ–¹æ³•æ·»åŠ @AutoFill()æ³¨è§£ï¼Œä¹Ÿéœ€è¦EmployeeMapperåšç›¸åŒæ“ä½œ

java
package com.sky.mapper;

@Mapper
public interface CategoryMapper {
    /**
     * æ’å…¥æ•°æ®
     * @param category
     */
    @Insert("insert into category(type, name, sort, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user)" +
            " VALUES" +
            " (#{type}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})")
    @AutoFill(value = OperationType.INSERT)
    void insert(Category category);
    /**
     * æ ¹æ®idä¿®æ”¹åˆ†ç±»
     * @param category
     */
    @AutoFill(value = OperationType.UPDATE)
    void update(Category category);

}

åŒæ—¶ï¼Œå°†ä¸šåŠ¡å±‚ä¸ºå…¬å…±å­—æ®µèµ‹å€¼çš„ä»£ç æ³¨é‡Šæ‰ã€‚

1). å°†å‘˜å·¥ç®¡ç†çš„æ–°å¢å’Œç¼–è¾‘æ–¹æ³•ä¸­çš„å…¬å…±å­—æ®µèµ‹å€¼çš„ä»£ç æ³¨é‡Šã€‚

2). å°†èœå“åˆ†ç±»ç®¡ç†çš„æ–°å¢å’Œä¿®æ”¹æ–¹æ³•ä¸­çš„å…¬å…±å­—æ®µèµ‹å€¼çš„ä»£ç æ³¨é‡Šã€‚

1.4 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

ä»¥æ–°å¢èœå“åˆ†ç±»ä¸ºä¾‹ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•

å¯åŠ¨é¡¹ç›®å’ŒNginx

æŸ¥çœ‹æ§åˆ¶å°

é€šè¿‡è§‚å¯Ÿæ§åˆ¶å°è¾“å‡ºçš„SQLæ¥ç¡®å®šå…¬å…±å­—æ®µå¡«å……æ˜¯å¦å®Œæˆ

æŸ¥çœ‹è¡¨

categoryè¡¨ä¸­æ•°æ®

å…¶ä¸­create_time,update_time,create_user,update_userå­—æ®µéƒ½å·²å®Œæˆè‡ªåŠ¨å¡«å……ã€‚

ç”±äºä½¿ç”¨admin(id=1)ç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•è¿›è¡Œèœå“æ·»åŠ æ“ä½œ,æ•…create_user,update_useréƒ½ä¸º1.

1.5 ä»£ç æäº¤ â€‹

ç‚¹å‡»æäº¤ï¼š

æäº¤è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ï¼Œå‡ºç°æç¤ºï¼š

ç»§ç»­push:

æ¨é€æˆåŠŸï¼š

2. æ–°å¢èœå“ â€‹

2.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æä¸è®¾è®¡ â€‹

2.1.1 äº§å“åŸå‹ â€‹

åå°ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­å¯ä»¥ç®¡ç†èœå“ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ æ–°å¢åŠŸèƒ½æ¥æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„èœå“ï¼Œåœ¨æ·»åŠ èœå“æ—¶éœ€è¦é€‰æ‹©å½“å‰èœå“æ‰€å±çš„èœå“åˆ†ç±»ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”éœ€è¦ä¸Šä¼ èœå“å›¾ç‰‡ã€‚

æ–°å¢èœå“åŸå‹ï¼š

å½“å¡«å†™å®Œè¡¨å•ä¿¡æ¯, ç‚¹å‡»"ä¿å­˜"æŒ‰é’®å, ä¼šæäº¤è¯¥è¡¨å•çš„æ•°æ®åˆ°æœåŠ¡ç«¯, åœ¨æœåŠ¡ç«¯ä¸­éœ€è¦æ¥å—æ•°æ®, ç„¶åå°†æ•°æ®ä¿å­˜è‡³æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­ã€‚

ä¸šåŠ¡è§„åˆ™ï¼š

  • èœå“åç§°å¿…é¡»æ˜¯å”¯ä¸€çš„
  • èœå“å¿…é¡»å±äºæŸä¸ªåˆ†ç±»ä¸‹ï¼Œä¸èƒ½å•ç‹¬å­˜åœ¨
  • æ–°å¢èœå“æ—¶å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®æƒ…å†µé€‰æ‹©èœå“çš„å£å‘³
  • æ¯ä¸ªèœå“å¿…é¡»å¯¹åº”ä¸€å¼ å›¾ç‰‡

2.1.2 æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ â€‹

æ ¹æ®ä¸Šè¿°åŸå‹å›¾å…ˆç²—ç²’åº¦è®¾è®¡æ¥å£ï¼Œå…±åŒ…å«3ä¸ªæ¥å£ã€‚

æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ï¼š

  • æ ¹æ®ç±»å‹æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ†ç±»ï¼ˆå·²å®Œæˆï¼‰
  • æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ 
  • æ–°å¢èœå“

æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ç»†ç²’åº¦åˆ†ææ¯ä¸ªæ¥å£ï¼Œæ˜ç¡®æ¯ä¸ªæ¥å£çš„è¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼ã€è¯·æ±‚è·¯å¾„ã€ä¼ å…¥å‚æ•°å’Œè¿”å›å€¼ã€‚

1. æ ¹æ®ç±»å‹æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ†ç±»

2. æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ 

3. æ–°å¢èœå“

2.1.3 è¡¨è®¾è®¡ â€‹

é€šè¿‡åŸå‹å›¾è¿›è¡Œåˆ†æï¼š

æ–°å¢èœå“ï¼Œå…¶å®å°±æ˜¯å°†æ–°å¢é¡µé¢å½•å…¥çš„èœå“ä¿¡æ¯æ’å…¥åˆ°dishè¡¨ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ·»åŠ äº†å£å‘³åšæ³•ï¼Œè¿˜éœ€è¦å‘dish_flavorè¡¨æ’å…¥æ•°æ®ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥åœ¨æ–°å¢èœå“æ—¶ï¼Œæ¶‰åŠåˆ°ä¸¤ä¸ªè¡¨ï¼š

è¡¨åè¯´æ˜
dishèœå“è¡¨
dish_flavorèœå“å£å‘³è¡¨

1). èœå“è¡¨:dish

å­—æ®µåæ•°æ®ç±»å‹è¯´æ˜å¤‡æ³¨
idbigintä¸»é”®è‡ªå¢
namevarchar(32)èœå“åç§°å”¯ä¸€
category_idbigintåˆ†ç±»idé€»è¾‘å¤–é”®
pricedecimal(10,2)èœå“ä»·æ ¼
imagevarchar(255)å›¾ç‰‡è·¯å¾„
descriptionvarchar(255)èœå“æè¿°
statusintå”®å–çŠ¶æ€1èµ·å”® 0åœå”®
create_timedatetimeåˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´
update_timedatetimeæœ€åä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´

update_userbigintæœ€åä¿®æ”¹äººid

2). èœå“å£å‘³è¡¨:dish_flavor

å­—æ®µåæ•°æ®ç±»å‹è¯´æ˜å¤‡æ³¨
idbigintä¸»é”®è‡ªå¢
dish_idbigintèœå“idé€»è¾‘å¤–é”®

valuevarchar(255)å£å‘³å€¼

2.2 ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

2.2.1 æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ å®ç° â€‹

å› ä¸ºåœ¨æ–°å¢èœå“æ—¶ï¼Œéœ€è¦ä¸Šä¼ èœå“å¯¹åº”çš„å›¾ç‰‡(æ–‡ä»¶)ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬åç»ªå…¶å®ƒåŠŸèƒ½ä¹Ÿä¼šä½¿ç”¨åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ ï¼Œæ•…è¦å®ç°é€šç”¨çš„æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ æ¥å£ã€‚

æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ ï¼Œæ˜¯æŒ‡å°†æœ¬åœ°å›¾ç‰‡ã€è§†é¢‘ã€éŸ³é¢‘ç­‰æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ åˆ°æœåŠ¡å™¨ä¸Šï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä¾›å…¶ä»–ç”¨æˆ·æµè§ˆæˆ–ä¸‹è½½çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ åœ¨é¡¹ç›®ä¸­åº”ç”¨éå¸¸å¹¿æ³›ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ç»å¸¸å‘æŠ–éŸ³ã€å‘æœ‹å‹åœˆéƒ½ç”¨åˆ°äº†æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

å®ç°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ æœåŠ¡ï¼Œéœ€è¦æœ‰å­˜å‚¨çš„æ”¯æŒï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬çš„è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆå°†ä»¥ä¸‹å‡ ç§ï¼š

  1. ç›´æ¥å°†å›¾ç‰‡ä¿å­˜åˆ°æœåŠ¡çš„ç¡¬ç›˜ï¼ˆspringmvcä¸­çš„æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ ï¼‰
    1. ä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼šå¼€å‘ä¾¿æ·ï¼Œæˆæœ¬ä½
    2. ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼šæ‰©å®¹å›°éš¾
  2. ä½¿ç”¨åˆ†å¸ƒå¼æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿè¿›è¡Œå­˜å‚¨
    1. ä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼šå®¹æ˜“å®ç°æ‰©å®¹
    2. ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼šå¼€å‘å¤æ‚åº¦ç¨å¤§ï¼ˆæœ‰æˆç†Ÿçš„äº§å“å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ï¼šFastDFS,MinIOï¼‰
  3. ä½¿ç”¨ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹çš„å­˜å‚¨æœåŠ¡ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚OSSï¼‰
    1. ä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼šå¼€å‘ç®€å•ï¼Œæ‹¥æœ‰å¼ºå¤§åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå…ç»´æŠ¤
    2. ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼šä»˜è´¹

åœ¨æœ¬é¡¹ç›®é€‰ç”¨é˜¿é‡Œäº‘çš„OSSæœåŠ¡è¿›è¡Œæ–‡ä»¶å­˜å‚¨ã€‚ï¼ˆå‰é¢è¯¾ç¨‹å·²å­¦ä¹ è¿‡é˜¿é‡Œäº‘OSS,ä¸å†èµ˜è¿°ï¼‰

å®ç°æ­¥éª¤ï¼š

1). å®šä¹‰OSSç›¸å…³é…ç½®

åœ¨sky-serveræ¨¡å—

application-dev.yml

yaml
sky:
  alioss:
    endpoint: oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com
    access-key-id: xxx
    access-key-secret: xxx
    bucket-name: sky-take-out

application.yml

yaml
spring:
  profiles:
    active: dev    #è®¾ç½®ç¯å¢ƒ
sky:
  alioss:
    endpoint: ${sky.alioss.endpoint}
    access-key-id: ${sky.alioss.access-key-id}
    access-key-secret: ${sky.alioss.access-key-secret}
    bucket-name: ${sky.alioss.bucket-name}

2). è¯»å–OSSé…ç½®

åœ¨sky-commonæ¨¡å—ä¸­ï¼Œå·²å®šä¹‰

java
package com.sky.properties;

import lombok.Data;
import org.springframework.boot.context.properties.ConfigurationProperties;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

@Component
@ConfigurationProperties(prefix = "sky.alioss")
@Data
public class AliOssProperties {

    private String endpoint;
    private String accessKeyId;
    private String accessKeySecret;
    private String bucketName;

}

3). ç”ŸæˆOSSå·¥å…·ç±»å¯¹è±¡

åœ¨sky-serveræ¨¡å—

java
package com.sky.config;

import com.sky.properties.AliOssProperties;
import com.sky.utils.AliOssUtil;
import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.condition.ConditionalOnMissingBean;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;

/**
 * é…ç½®ç±»ï¼Œç”¨äºåˆ›å»ºAliOssUtilå¯¹è±¡
 */
@Configuration
@Slf4j
public class OssConfiguration {

    @Bean
    @ConditionalOnMissingBean
    public AliOssUtil aliOssUtil(AliOssProperties aliOssProperties){
        log.info("å¼€å§‹åˆ›å»ºé˜¿é‡Œäº‘æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ å·¥å…·ç±»å¯¹è±¡ï¼š{}",aliOssProperties);
        return new AliOssUtil(aliOssProperties.getEndpoint(),
                aliOssProperties.getAccessKeyId(),
                aliOssProperties.getAccessKeySecret(),
                aliOssProperties.getBucketName());
    }
}

å…¶ä¸­ï¼ŒAliOssUtil.javaå·²åœ¨sky-commonæ¨¡å—ä¸­å®šä¹‰

java
package com.sky.utils;

import com.aliyun.oss.ClientException;
import com.aliyun.oss.OSS;
import com.aliyun.oss.OSSClientBuilder;
import com.aliyun.oss.OSSException;
import lombok.AllArgsConstructor;
import lombok.Data;
import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;

@Data
@AllArgsConstructor
@Slf4j
public class AliOssUtil {

    private String endpoint;
    private String accessKeyId;
    private String accessKeySecret;
    private String bucketName;

    /**
     * æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ 
     *
     * @param bytes
     * @param objectName
     * @return
     */
    public String upload(byte[] bytes, String objectName) {

        // åˆ›å»ºOSSClientå®ä¾‹ã€‚
        OSS ossClient = new OSSClientBuilder().build(endpoint, accessKeyId, accessKeySecret);

        try {
            // åˆ›å»ºPutObjectè¯·æ±‚ã€‚
            ossClient.putObject(bucketName, objectName, new ByteArrayInputStream(bytes));
        } catch (OSSException oe) {
            System.out.println("Caught an OSSException, which means your request made it to OSS, "
                    + "but was rejected with an error response for some reason.");
            System.out.println("Error Message:" + oe.getErrorMessage());
            System.out.println("Error Code:" + oe.getErrorCode());
            System.out.println("Request ID:" + oe.getRequestId());
            System.out.println("Host ID:" + oe.getHostId());
        } catch (ClientException ce) {
            System.out.println("Caught an ClientException, which means the client encountered "
                    + "a serious internal problem while trying to communicate with OSS, "
                    + "such as not being able to access the network.");
            System.out.println("Error Message:" + ce.getMessage());
        } finally {
            if (ossClient != null) {
                ossClient.shutdown();
            }
        }

        //æ–‡ä»¶è®¿é—®è·¯å¾„è§„åˆ™ https://BucketName.Endpoint/ObjectName
        StringBuilder stringBuilder = new StringBuilder("https://");
        stringBuilder
                .append(bucketName)
                .append(".")
                .append(endpoint)
                .append("/")
                .append(objectName);

        log.info("æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ åˆ°:{}", stringBuilder.toString());

        return stringBuilder.toString();
    }
}

4). å®šä¹‰æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ æ¥å£

åœ¨sky-serveræ¨¡å—ä¸­å®šä¹‰æ¥å£

java
package com.sky.controller.admin;

import com.sky.constant.MessageConstant;
import com.sky.result.Result;
import com.sky.utils.AliOssUtil;
import io.swagger.annotations.Api;
import io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation;
import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PostMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;
import org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.UUID;

/**
 * é€šç”¨æ¥å£
 */
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/admin/common")
@Api(tags = "é€šç”¨æ¥å£")
@Slf4j
public class CommonController {

    @Autowired
    private AliOssUtil aliOssUtil;

    /**
     * æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ 
     * @param file
     * @return
     */
    @PostMapping("/upload")
    @ApiOperation("æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ ")
    public Result<String> upload(MultipartFile file){
        log.info("æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ ï¼š{}",file);

        try {
            //åŸå§‹æ–‡ä»¶å
            String originalFilename = file.getOriginalFilename();
            //æˆªå–åŸå§‹æ–‡ä»¶åçš„åç¼€   dfdfdf.png
            String extension = originalFilename.substring(originalFilename.lastIndexOf("."));
            //æ„é€ æ–°æ–‡ä»¶åç§°
            String objectName = UUID.randomUUID().toString() + extension;

            //æ–‡ä»¶çš„è¯·æ±‚è·¯å¾„
            String filePath = aliOssUtil.upload(file.getBytes(), objectName);
            return Result.success(filePath);
        } catch (IOException e) {
            log.error("æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ å¤±è´¥ï¼š{}", e);
        }

        return Result.error(MessageConstant.UPLOAD_FAILED);
    }
}

2.2.2 æ–°å¢èœå“å®ç° â€‹

1). è®¾è®¡DTOç±»

åœ¨sky-pojoæ¨¡å—ä¸­

java
package com.sky.dto;

import com.sky.entity.DishFlavor;
import lombok.Data;
import java.io.Serializable;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

@Data
public class DishDTO implements Serializable {

    private Long id;
    //èœå“åç§°
    private String name;
    //èœå“åˆ†ç±»id
    private Long categoryId;
    //èœå“ä»·æ ¼
    private BigDecimal price;
    //å›¾ç‰‡
    private String image;
    //æè¿°ä¿¡æ¯
    private String description;
    //0 åœå”® 1 èµ·å”®
    private Integer status;
    //å£å‘³
    private List<DishFlavor> flavors = new ArrayList<>();
}

2). Controllerå±‚

è¿›å…¥åˆ°sky-serveræ¨¡å—

java
package com.sky.controller.admin;

import com.sky.dto.DishDTO;
import com.sky.dto.DishPageQueryDTO;
import com.sky.entity.Dish;
import com.sky.result.PageResult;
import com.sky.result.Result;
import com.sky.service.DishService;
import com.sky.vo.DishVO;
import io.swagger.annotations.Api;
import io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation;
import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Set;

/**
 * èœå“ç®¡ç†
 */
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/admin/dish")
@Api(tags = "èœå“ç›¸å…³æ¥å£")
@Slf4j
public class DishController {

    @Autowired
    private DishService dishService;

    /**
     * æ–°å¢èœå“
     *
     * @param dishDTO
     * @return
     */
    @PostMapping
    @ApiOperation("æ–°å¢èœå“")
    public Result save(@RequestBody DishDTO dishDTO) {
        log.info("æ–°å¢èœå“ï¼š{}", dishDTO);
        dishService.saveWithFlavor(dishDTO);//åç»ªæ­¥éª¤å¼€å‘
        return Result.success();
    }
}

3). Serviceå±‚æ¥å£

java
package com.sky.service;

import com.sky.dto.DishDTO;
import com.sky.entity.Dish;

public interface DishService {

    /**
     * æ–°å¢èœå“å’Œå¯¹åº”çš„å£å‘³
     *
     * @param dishDTO
     */
    public void saveWithFlavor(DishDTO dishDTO);

}

4). Serviceå±‚å®ç°ç±»

java
package com.sky.service.impl;


@Service
@Slf4j
public class DishServiceImpl implements DishService {

    @Autowired
    private DishMapper dishMapper;
    @Autowired
    private DishFlavorMapper dishFlavorMapper;

    /**
     * æ–°å¢èœå“å’Œå¯¹åº”çš„å£å‘³
     *
     * @param dishDTO
     */
    @Transactional
    public void saveWithFlavor(DishDTO dishDTO) {

        Dish dish = new Dish();
        BeanUtils.copyProperties(dishDTO, dish);

        //å‘èœå“è¡¨æ’å…¥1æ¡æ•°æ®
        dishMapper.insert(dish);//åç»ªæ­¥éª¤å®ç°

        //è·å–insertè¯­å¥ç”Ÿæˆçš„ä¸»é”®å€¼
        Long dishId = dish.getId();

        List<DishFlavor> flavors = dishDTO.getFlavors();
        if (flavors != null && flavors.size() > 0) {
            flavors.forEach(dishFlavor -> {
                dishFlavor.setDishId(dishId);
            });
            //å‘å£å‘³è¡¨æ’å…¥næ¡æ•°æ®
            dishFlavorMapper.insertBatch(flavors);//åç»ªæ­¥éª¤å®ç°
        }
    }

}

5). Mapperå±‚

DishMapper.javaä¸­æ·»åŠ 

java
	/**
     * æ’å…¥èœå“æ•°æ®
     *
     * @param dish
     */
    @AutoFill(value = OperationType.INSERT)
    void insert(Dish dish);

åœ¨/resources/mapperä¸­åˆ›å»ºDishMapper.xml

< insert id="insert" ==useGeneratedKeys="true"====keyProperty="id"==> â€‹

xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN"
        "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd" >
<mapper namespace="com.sky.mapper.DishMapper">

    <insert id="insert" useGeneratedKeys="true" keyProperty="id">
        insert into dish (name, category_id, price, image, description, create_time, update_time, create_user,update_user, status)
        values (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{image}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{status})
    </insert>
</mapper>

DishFlavorMapper.java

java
package com.sky.mapper;

import com.sky.entity.DishFlavor;
import java.util.List;

@Mapper
public interface DishFlavorMapper {
    /**
     * æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥å£å‘³æ•°æ®
     * @param flavors
     */
    void insertBatch(List<DishFlavor> flavors);

}

åœ¨/resources/mapperä¸­åˆ›å»ºDishFlavorMapper.xml

xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN"
        "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd" >
<mapper namespace="com.sky.mapper.DishFlavorMapper">
    <insert id="insertBatch">
        insert into dish_flavor (dish_id, name, value) VALUES
        <foreach collection="flavors" item="df" separator=",">
            (#{df.dishId},#{df.name},#{df.value})
        </foreach>
    </insert>
</mapper>

2.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

è¿›å…¥åˆ°èœå“ç®¡ç†--->æ–°å»ºèœå“

ç”±äºæ²¡æœ‰å®ç°èœå“æŸ¥è¯¢åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¿å­˜åï¼Œæš‚ä¸”åœ¨è¡¨ä¸­æŸ¥çœ‹æ·»åŠ çš„æ•°æ®ã€‚

dishè¡¨ï¼š

dish_flavorè¡¨ï¼š

æµ‹è¯•æˆåŠŸã€‚

2.4ä»£ç æäº¤ â€‹

åç»­æ­¥éª¤å’Œä¸Šè¿°åŠŸèƒ½ä»£ç æäº¤ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œä¸å†èµ˜è¿°ã€‚

3. èœå“åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢ â€‹

3.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

3.1.1 äº§å“åŸå‹ â€‹

ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­çš„èœå“æ•°æ®å¾ˆå¤šçš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œå¦‚æœåœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªé¡µé¢ä¸­å…¨éƒ¨å±•ç¤ºå‡ºæ¥ä¼šæ˜¾å¾—æ¯”è¾ƒä¹±ï¼Œä¸ä¾¿äºæŸ¥çœ‹ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸€èˆ¬çš„ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­éƒ½ä¼šä»¥åˆ†é¡µçš„æ–¹å¼æ¥å±•ç¤ºåˆ—è¡¨æ•°æ®ã€‚

èœå“åˆ†é¡µåŸå‹ï¼š

åœ¨èœå“åˆ—è¡¨å±•ç¤ºæ—¶ï¼Œé™¤äº†èœå“çš„åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯(åç§°ã€å”®ä»·ã€å”®å–çŠ¶æ€ã€æœ€åæ“ä½œæ—¶é—´)å¤–ï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªå­—æ®µç•¥å¾®ç‰¹æ®Šï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯å›¾ç‰‡å­—æ®µ ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä»æ•°æ®åº“æŸ¥è¯¢å‡ºæ¥çš„ä»…ä»…æ˜¯å›¾ç‰‡çš„åå­—ï¼Œå›¾ç‰‡è¦æƒ³åœ¨è¡¨æ ¼ä¸­å›æ˜¾å±•ç¤ºå‡ºæ¥ï¼Œå°±éœ€è¦ä¸‹è½½è¿™ä¸ªå›¾ç‰‡ã€‚ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªæ˜¯èœå“åˆ†ç±»ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œå±•ç¤ºçš„æ˜¯åˆ†ç±»åç§°ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯åˆ†ç±»IDï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶æˆ‘ä»¬å°±éœ€è¦æ ¹æ®èœå“çš„åˆ†ç±»IDï¼Œå»åˆ†ç±»è¡¨ä¸­æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ†ç±»ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œç„¶ååœ¨é¡µé¢å±•ç¤ºã€‚

ä¸šåŠ¡è§„åˆ™ï¼š

  • æ ¹æ®é¡µç å±•ç¤ºèœå“ä¿¡æ¯
  • æ¯é¡µå±•ç¤º10æ¡æ•°æ®
  • åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢æ—¶å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®éœ€è¦è¾“å…¥èœå“åç§°ã€èœå“åˆ†ç±»ã€èœå“çŠ¶æ€è¿›è¡ŒæŸ¥è¯¢

3.1.2 æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ â€‹

æ ¹æ®ä¸Šè¿°åŸå‹å›¾ï¼Œè®¾è®¡å‡ºç›¸åº”çš„æ¥å£ã€‚

3.2 ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

3.2.1 è®¾è®¡DTOç±» â€‹

æ ¹æ®èœå“åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢æ¥å£å®šä¹‰è®¾è®¡å¯¹åº”çš„DTOï¼š

åœ¨sky-pojoæ¨¡å—ä¸­ï¼Œå·²å®šä¹‰

java
package com.sky.dto;

import lombok.Data;
import java.io.Serializable;

@Data
public class DishPageQueryDTO implements Serializable {

    private int page;
    private int pageSize;
    private String name;
    private Integer categoryId; //åˆ†ç±»id
    private Integer status; //çŠ¶æ€ 0è¡¨ç¤ºç¦ç”¨ 1è¡¨ç¤ºå¯ç”¨

}

3.2.2 è®¾è®¡VOç±» â€‹

æ ¹æ®èœå“åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢æ¥å£å®šä¹‰è®¾è®¡å¯¹åº”çš„VOï¼š

  • èœå“è¡¨Dishï¼Œåç«¯ä¼ é€’ç»™å‰ç«¯çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œå†æ ¹æ®è¿™ä¸ªVOå†åºåˆ—åŒ–ä¸ºJSON
  • ä»åˆ†ç±»è¡¨ä¸­è·å–categoryNameï¼šæ ¹æ®categoryId->categoryName

åœ¨sky-pojoæ¨¡å—ä¸­ï¼Œå·²å®šä¹‰

java
package com.sky.vo;

import com.sky.entity.DishFlavor;
import lombok.AllArgsConstructor;
import lombok.Builder;
import lombok.Data;
import lombok.NoArgsConstructor;
import java.io.Serializable;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.time.LocalDateTime;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

/**
 * èœå“è¡¨Dishï¼Œåç«¯ä¼ é€’ç»™å‰ç«¯çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œå†æ ¹æ®è¿™ä¸ªVOå†åºåˆ—åŒ–ä¸ºJSON
 * ä»åˆ†ç±»è¡¨ä¸­è·å–categoryNameï¼šæ ¹æ®categoryId->categoryName
 */
@Data
@Builder
@NoArgsConstructor
@AllArgsConstructor
public class DishVO implements Serializable {

    private Long id;
    //èœå“åç§°
    private String name;
    //èœå“åˆ†ç±»id
    private Long categoryId;
    //èœå“ä»·æ ¼
    private BigDecimal price;
    //å›¾ç‰‡
    private String image;
    //æè¿°ä¿¡æ¯
    private String description;
    //0 åœå”® 1 èµ·å”®
    private Integer status;
    //æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´
    private LocalDateTime updateTime;
    //åˆ†ç±»åç§°
    private String categoryName; //ä»åˆ†ç±»è¡¨ä¸­è·å–categoryNameï¼šæ ¹æ®categoryId->categoryName
    //èœå“å…³è”çš„å£å‘³
    private List<DishFlavor> flavors = new ArrayList<>();

    //private Integer copies;
}

3.2.3 Controllerå±‚ â€‹

æ ¹æ®æ¥å£å®šä¹‰åˆ›å»ºDishControllerçš„pageåˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * èœå“åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢
     *
     * @param dishPageQueryDTO
     * @return
     */
    @GetMapping("/page")
    @ApiOperation("èœå“åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢")
    public Result<PageResult> page(DishPageQueryDTO dishPageQueryDTO) {
        log.info("èœå“åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢:{}", dishPageQueryDTO);
        PageResult pageResult = dishService.pageQuery(dishPageQueryDTO);//åç»ªæ­¥éª¤å®šä¹‰
        return Result.success(pageResult);
    }

3.2.4 Serviceå±‚æ¥å£ â€‹

åœ¨ DishService ä¸­æ‰©å±•åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * èœå“åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢
     *
     * @param dishPageQueryDTO
     * @return
     */
    PageResult pageQuery(DishPageQueryDTO dishPageQueryDTO);

3.2.5 Serviceå±‚å®ç°ç±» â€‹

åœ¨ DishServiceImpl ä¸­å®ç°åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * èœå“åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢
     *
     * @param dishPageQueryDTO
     * @return
     */
    public PageResult pageQuery(DishPageQueryDTO dishPageQueryDTO) {
        PageHelper.startPage(dishPageQueryDTO.getPage(), dishPageQueryDTO.getPageSize());
        Page<DishVO> page = dishMapper.pageQuery(dishPageQueryDTO);//åç»ªæ­¥éª¤å®ç°
        return new PageResult(page.getTotal(), page.getResult());
    }

3.2.6 Mapperå±‚ â€‹

åœ¨ DishMapper æ¥å£ä¸­å£°æ˜ pageQuery æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * èœå“åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢
     *
     * @param dishPageQueryDTO
     * @return
     */
    Page<DishVO> pageQuery(DishPageQueryDTO dishPageQueryDTO);

åœ¨ DishMapper.xml ä¸­ç¼–å†™SQLï¼š

xml
<select id="pageQuery" resultType="com.sky.vo.DishVO">
        select d.* , c.name as categoryName from dish d left outer join category c on d.category_id = c.id
        <where>
            <if test="name != null">
                and d.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
            </if>
            <if test="categoryId != null">
                and d.category_id = #{categoryId}
            </if>
            <if test="status != null">
                and d.status = #{status}
            </if>
        </where>
        order by d.create_time desc
</select>

3.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

3.3.1 æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£æµ‹è¯• â€‹

**å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡ï¼š**è®¿é—®http://localhost:8080/doc.htmlï¼Œè¿›å…¥èœå“åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢æ¥å£

**æ³¨æ„ï¼š**ä½¿ç”¨adminç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•é‡æ–°è·å–tokenï¼Œé˜²æ­¢tokenå¤±æ•ˆã€‚

ç‚¹å‡»å‘é€ï¼š

3.3.2 å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒæµ‹è¯• â€‹

å¯åŠ¨nginx,è®¿é—® http://localhost

ç‚¹å‡»èœå“ç®¡ç†

æ•°æ®æˆåŠŸæŸ¥å‡ºã€‚

4. åˆ é™¤èœå“ â€‹

4.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

4.1.1 äº§å“åŸå‹ â€‹

åœ¨èœå“åˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªèœå“åé¢å¯¹åº”çš„æ“ä½œåˆ†åˆ«ä¸ºä¿®æ”¹ã€åˆ é™¤ã€åœå”®ï¼Œå¯é€šè¿‡åˆ é™¤åŠŸèƒ½å®Œæˆå¯¹èœå“åŠç›¸å…³çš„æ•°æ®è¿›è¡Œåˆ é™¤ã€‚

åˆ é™¤èœå“åŸå‹ï¼š

ä¸šåŠ¡è§„åˆ™ï¼š

  • å¯ä»¥ä¸€æ¬¡åˆ é™¤ä¸€ä¸ªèœå“ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ‰¹é‡åˆ é™¤èœå“
  • èµ·å”®ä¸­çš„èœå“ä¸èƒ½åˆ é™¤
  • è¢«å¥—é¤å…³è”çš„èœå“ä¸èƒ½åˆ é™¤
  • åˆ é™¤èœå“åï¼Œå…³è”çš„å£å‘³æ•°æ®ä¹Ÿéœ€è¦åˆ é™¤æ‰

4.1.2 æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ â€‹

æ ¹æ®ä¸Šè¿°åŸå‹å›¾ï¼Œè®¾è®¡å‡ºç›¸åº”çš„æ¥å£ã€‚

**æ³¨æ„ï¼š**åˆ é™¤ä¸€ä¸ªèœå“å’Œæ‰¹é‡åˆ é™¤èœå“å…±ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ¥å£ï¼Œæ•…idså¯åŒ…å«å¤šä¸ªèœå“id,ä¹‹é—´ç”¨é€—å·åˆ†éš”ã€‚

4.1.3 è¡¨è®¾è®¡ â€‹

åœ¨è¿›è¡Œåˆ é™¤èœå“æ“ä½œæ—¶ï¼Œä¼šæ¶‰åŠåˆ°ä»¥ä¸‹ä¸‰å¼ è¡¨ã€‚

æ³¨æ„äº‹é¡¹ï¼š

  • åœ¨dishè¡¨ä¸­åˆ é™¤èœå“åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®æ—¶ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶ï¼Œä¹Ÿè¦æŠŠå…³è”åœ¨dish_flavorè¡¨ä¸­çš„æ•°æ®ä¸€å—åˆ é™¤ã€‚
  • setmeal_dishè¡¨ä¸ºèœå“å’Œå¥—é¤å…³è”çš„ä¸­é—´è¡¨ã€‚
  • è‹¥åˆ é™¤çš„èœå“æ•°æ®å…³è”ç€æŸä¸ªå¥—é¤ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶ï¼Œåˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥ã€‚
  • è‹¥è¦åˆ é™¤å¥—é¤å…³è”çš„èœå“æ•°æ®ï¼Œå…ˆè§£é™¤ä¸¤è€…å…³è”ï¼Œå†å¯¹èœå“è¿›è¡Œåˆ é™¤ã€‚

4.2 ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

4.1.2 Controllerå±‚ â€‹

æ ¹æ®åˆ é™¤èœå“çš„æ¥å£å®šä¹‰åœ¨DishControllerä¸­åˆ›å»ºæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * èœå“æ‰¹é‡åˆ é™¤
     *
     * @param ids
     * @return
     */
    @DeleteMapping
    @ApiOperation("èœå“æ‰¹é‡åˆ é™¤")
    public Result delete(@RequestParam List<Long> ids) {
        log.info("èœå“æ‰¹é‡åˆ é™¤ï¼š{}", ids);
        dishService.deleteBatch(ids);//åç»ªæ­¥éª¤å®ç°
        return Result.success();
    }

4.2.2 Serviceå±‚æ¥å£ â€‹

åœ¨DishServiceæ¥å£ä¸­å£°æ˜deleteBatchæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * èœå“æ‰¹é‡åˆ é™¤
     *
     * @param ids
     */
    void deleteBatch(List<Long> ids);

4.2.3 Serviceå±‚å®ç°ç±» â€‹

åœ¨DishServiceImplä¸­å®ç°deleteBatchæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
    @Autowired
    private SetmealDishMapper setmealDishMapper;
	/**
     * èœå“æ‰¹é‡åˆ é™¤
     *
     * @param ids
     */
    @Transactional//äº‹åŠ¡
    public void deleteBatch(List<Long> ids) {
        //åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰èœå“æ˜¯å¦èƒ½å¤Ÿåˆ é™¤---æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨èµ·å”®ä¸­çš„èœå“ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿ
        for (Long id : ids) {
            Dish dish = dishMapper.getById(id);//åç»ªæ­¥éª¤å®ç°
            if (dish.getStatus() == StatusConstant.ENABLE) {
                //å½“å‰èœå“å¤„äºèµ·å”®ä¸­ï¼Œä¸èƒ½åˆ é™¤
                throw new DeletionNotAllowedException(MessageConstant.DISH_ON_SALE);
            }
        }

        //åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰èœå“æ˜¯å¦èƒ½å¤Ÿåˆ é™¤---æ˜¯å¦è¢«å¥—é¤å…³è”äº†ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿ
        List<Long> setmealIds = setmealDishMapper.getSetmealIdsByDishIds(ids);
        if (setmealIds != null && setmealIds.size() > 0) {
            //å½“å‰èœå“è¢«å¥—é¤å…³è”äº†ï¼Œä¸èƒ½åˆ é™¤
            throw new DeletionNotAllowedException(MessageConstant.DISH_BE_RELATED_BY_SETMEAL);
        }

        //åˆ é™¤èœå“è¡¨ä¸­çš„èœå“æ•°æ®
        for (Long id : ids) {
            dishMapper.deleteById(id);//åç»ªæ­¥éª¤å®ç°
            //åˆ é™¤èœå“å…³è”çš„å£å‘³æ•°æ®
            dishFlavorMapper.deleteByDishId(id);//åç»ªæ­¥éª¤å®ç°
        }
    }

4.2.4 Mapperå±‚ â€‹

åœ¨DishMapperä¸­å£°æ˜getByIdæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¹¶é…ç½®SQLï¼š

java
	/**
     * æ ¹æ®ä¸»é”®æŸ¥è¯¢èœå“
     *
     * @param id
     * @return
     */
    @Select("select * from dish where id = #{id}")
    Dish getById(Long id);

åˆ›å»ºSetmealDishMapperï¼Œå£°æ˜getSetmealIdsByDishIdsæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨xmlæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ç¼–å†™SQLï¼š

java
package com.sky.mapper;

import com.sky.entity.SetmealDish;
import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.Delete;
import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.Mapper;
import java.util.List;

@Mapper
public interface SetmealDishMapper {
    /**
     * æ ¹æ®èœå“idæŸ¥è¯¢å¯¹åº”çš„å¥—é¤id
     *
     * @param dishIds
     * @return
     */
    //select setmeal_id from setmeal_dish where dish_id in (1,2,3,4)
    List<Long> getSetmealIdsByDishIds(List<Long> dishIds);
}

SetmealDishMapper.xml

xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN"
        "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd" >
<mapper namespace="com.sky.mapper.SetmealDishMapper">
    <select id="getSetmealIdsByDishIds" resultType="java.lang.Long">
        select setmeal_id from setmeal_dish where dish_id in
        <foreach collection="dishIds" item="dishId" separator="," open="(" close=")">
            #{dishId}
        </foreach>
    </select>
</mapper>

åœ¨DishMapper.javaä¸­å£°æ˜deleteByIdæ–¹æ³•å¹¶é…ç½®SQLï¼š

java
	/**
     * æ ¹æ®ä¸»é”®åˆ é™¤èœå“æ•°æ®
     *
     * @param id
     */
    @Delete("delete from dish where id = #{id}")
    void deleteById(Long id);

åœ¨DishFlavorMapperä¸­å£°æ˜deleteByDishIdæ–¹æ³•å¹¶é…ç½®SQLï¼š

java
    /**
     * æ ¹æ®èœå“idåˆ é™¤å¯¹åº”çš„å£å‘³æ•°æ®
     * @param dishId
     */
    @Delete("delete from dish_flavor where dish_id = #{dishId}")
    void deleteByDishId(Long dishId);

4.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

æ—¢å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡Swaggeræ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒæµ‹è¯•ï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒæµ‹è¯•ã€‚

è¿›å…¥åˆ°èœå“åˆ—è¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢é¡µé¢

å¯¹æµ‹è¯•èœå“è¿›è¡Œåˆ é™¤æ“ä½œ

åŒæ—¶ï¼Œè¿›åˆ°dishè¡¨å’Œdish_flavorä¸¤ä¸ªè¡¨æŸ¥çœ‹æµ‹è¯•èœå“çš„ç›¸å…³æ•°æ®éƒ½å·²è¢«æˆåŠŸåˆ é™¤ã€‚

å†æ¬¡ï¼Œåˆ é™¤çŠ¶æ€ä¸ºå¯å”®çš„èœå“

ç‚¹å‡»æ‰¹é‡åˆ é™¤

åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥ï¼Œå› ä¸ºèµ·å”®ä¸­çš„èœå“ä¸èƒ½åˆ é™¤ã€‚

4.4 ä»£ç æäº¤ â€‹

åç»­æ­¥éª¤å’Œä¸Šè¿°åŠŸèƒ½ä»£ç æäº¤ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œä¸å†èµ˜è¿°ã€‚

5. ä¿®æ”¹èœå“ â€‹

5.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

5.1.1 äº§å“åŸå‹ â€‹

åœ¨èœå“ç®¡ç†åˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢ç‚¹å‡»ä¿®æ”¹æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œè·³è½¬åˆ°ä¿®æ”¹èœå“é¡µé¢ï¼Œåœ¨ä¿®æ”¹é¡µé¢å›æ˜¾èœå“ç›¸å…³ä¿¡æ¯å¹¶è¿›è¡Œä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œæœ€åç‚¹å‡»ä¿å­˜æŒ‰é’®å®Œæˆä¿®æ”¹æ“ä½œã€‚

ä¿®æ”¹èœå“åŸå‹ï¼š

5.1.2 æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ â€‹

é€šè¿‡å¯¹ä¸Šè¿°åŸå‹å›¾è¿›è¡Œåˆ†æï¼Œè¯¥é¡µé¢å…±æ¶‰åŠ4ä¸ªæ¥å£ã€‚

æ¥å£ï¼š

  • æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“
  • æ ¹æ®ç±»å‹æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ†ç±»(å·²å®ç°)
  • æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ (å·²å®ç°)
  • ä¿®æ”¹èœå“

æˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦å®ç°æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“å’Œä¿®æ”¹èœå“ä¸¤ä¸ªæ¥å£ï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ¥é‡ç‚¹åˆ†æè¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªæ¥å£ã€‚

1). æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“

2). ä¿®æ”¹èœå“

æ³¨:å› ä¸ºæ˜¯ä¿®æ”¹åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œè¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼å¯è®¾ç½®ä¸ºPUTã€‚

5.2 ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

5.2.1 æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“å®ç° â€‹

1). Controllerå±‚

æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“çš„æ¥å£å®šä¹‰åœ¨DishControllerä¸­åˆ›å»ºæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
    /**
     * æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“
     *
     * @param id
     * @return
     */
    @GetMapping("/{id}")
    @ApiOperation("æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“")
    public Result<DishVO> getById(@PathVariable Long id) {
        log.info("æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“ï¼š{}", id);
        DishVO dishVO = dishService.getByIdWithFlavor(id);//åç»ªæ­¥éª¤å®ç°
        return Result.success(dishVO);
    }

2). Serviceå±‚æ¥å£

åœ¨DishServiceæ¥å£ä¸­å£°æ˜getByIdWithFlavoræ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“å’Œå¯¹åº”çš„å£å‘³æ•°æ®
     *
     * @param id
     * @return
     */
    DishVO getByIdWithFlavor(Long id);

3). Serviceå±‚å®ç°ç±»

åœ¨DishServiceImplä¸­å®ç°getByIdWithFlavoræ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“å’Œå¯¹åº”çš„å£å‘³æ•°æ®
     *
     * @param id
     * @return
     */
    public DishVO getByIdWithFlavor(Long id) {
        //æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“æ•°æ®
        Dish dish = dishMapper.getById(id);

        //æ ¹æ®èœå“idæŸ¥è¯¢å£å‘³æ•°æ®
        List<DishFlavor> dishFlavors = dishFlavorMapper.getByDishId(id);//åç»ªæ­¥éª¤å®ç°

        //å°†æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°çš„æ•°æ®å°è£…åˆ°VO
        DishVO dishVO = new DishVO();
        BeanUtils.copyProperties(dish, dishVO);
        dishVO.setFlavors(dishFlavors);

        return dishVO;
    }

4). Mapperå±‚

åœ¨DishFlavorMapperä¸­å£°æ˜getByDishIdæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¹¶é…ç½®SQLï¼š

java
    /**
     * æ ¹æ®èœå“idæŸ¥è¯¢å¯¹åº”çš„å£å‘³æ•°æ®
     * @param dishId
     * @return
     */
    @Select("select * from dish_flavor where dish_id = #{dishId}")
    List<DishFlavor> getByDishId(Long dishId);

5.2.1 ä¿®æ”¹èœå“å®ç° â€‹

1). Controllerå±‚

æ ¹æ®ä¿®æ”¹èœå“çš„æ¥å£å®šä¹‰åœ¨DishControllerä¸­åˆ›å»ºæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * ä¿®æ”¹èœå“
     *
     * @param dishDTO
     * @return
     */
    @PutMapping
    @ApiOperation("ä¿®æ”¹èœå“")
    public Result update(@RequestBody DishDTO dishDTO) {
        log.info("ä¿®æ”¹èœå“ï¼š{}", dishDTO);
        dishService.updateWithFlavor(dishDTO);
        return Result.success();
    }

2). Serviceå±‚æ¥å£

åœ¨DishServiceæ¥å£ä¸­å£°æ˜updateWithFlavoræ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * æ ¹æ®idä¿®æ”¹èœå“åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯å’Œå¯¹åº”çš„å£å‘³ä¿¡æ¯
     *
     * @param dishDTO
     */
    void updateWithFlavor(DishDTO dishDTO);

3). Serviceå±‚å®ç°ç±»

åœ¨DishServiceImplä¸­å®ç°updateWithFlavoræ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * æ ¹æ®idä¿®æ”¹èœå“åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯å’Œå¯¹åº”çš„å£å‘³ä¿¡æ¯
     *
     * @param dishDTO
     */
    public void updateWithFlavor(DishDTO dishDTO) {
        Dish dish = new Dish();
        BeanUtils.copyProperties(dishDTO, dish);

        //ä¿®æ”¹èœå“è¡¨åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯
        dishMapper.update(dish);

        //åˆ é™¤åŸæœ‰çš„å£å‘³æ•°æ®
        dishFlavorMapper.deleteByDishId(dishDTO.getId());

        //é‡æ–°æ’å…¥å£å‘³æ•°æ®
        List<DishFlavor> flavors = dishDTO.getFlavors();
        if (flavors != null && flavors.size() > 0) {
            flavors.forEach(dishFlavor -> {
                dishFlavor.setDishId(dishDTO.getId());
            });
            //å‘å£å‘³è¡¨æ’å…¥næ¡æ•°æ®
            dishFlavorMapper.insertBatch(flavors);
        }
    }

4). Mapperå±‚

åœ¨DishMapperä¸­ï¼Œå£°æ˜updateæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * æ ¹æ®idåŠ¨æ€ä¿®æ”¹èœå“æ•°æ®
     *
     * @param dish
     */
    @AutoFill(value = OperationType.UPDATE)
    void update(Dish dish);

å¹¶åœ¨DishMapper.xmlæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ç¼–å†™SQL:

xml
<update id="update">
        update dish
        <set>
            <if test="name != null">name = #{name},</if>
            <if test="categoryId != null">category_id = #{categoryId},</if>
            <if test="price != null">price = #{price},</if>
            <if test="image != null">image = #{image},</if>
            <if test="description != null">description = #{description},</if>
            <if test="status != null">status = #{status},</if>
            <if test="updateTime != null">update_time = #{updateTime},</if>
            <if test="updateUser != null">update_user = #{updateUser},</if>
        </set>
        where id = #{id}
</update>

5.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

æœ¬æ¬¡æµ‹è¯•ç›´æ¥é€šè¿‡å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒæµ‹è¯• ï¼Œå¯ä½¿ç”¨Debugæ–¹å¼å¯åŠ¨é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œè§‚å¯Ÿè¿è¡Œä¸­æ­¥éª¤ã€‚

è¿›å…¥èœå“åˆ—è¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢é¡µé¢ï¼Œå¯¹ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªèœå“çš„ä»·æ ¼è¿›è¡Œä¿®æ”¹

ç‚¹å‡»ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œå›æ˜¾æˆåŠŸ

èœå“ä»·æ ¼ä¿®æ”¹åï¼Œç‚¹å‡»ä¿å­˜

ä¿®æ”¹æˆåŠŸ

5.4 ä»£ç æäº¤ â€‹

åç»­æ­¥éª¤å’Œä¸Šè¿°åŠŸèƒ½ä»£ç æäº¤ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œä¸å†èµ˜è¿°ã€‚

å››ã€è‹ç©¹å¤–å–-å¥—é¤ç®¡ç† â€‹

æ›´æ–°: 2025/4/11 å­—æ•°: 0 å­— æ—¶é•¿: 0 åˆ†é’Ÿ

1. æ–°å¢å¥—é¤ â€‹

1.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

äº§å“åŸå‹ï¼š

ä¸šåŠ¡è§„åˆ™ï¼š

  • å¥—é¤åç§°å”¯ä¸€
  • å¥—é¤å¿…é¡»å±äºæŸä¸ªå¥—é¤åˆ†ç±»
  • å¥—é¤å¿…é¡»åŒ…å«èœå“
  • åç§°ã€åˆ†ç±»ã€ä»·æ ¼ã€å›¾ç‰‡ä¸ºå¿…å¡«é¡¹
  • æ·»åŠ èœå“çª—å£éœ€è¦æ ¹æ®åˆ†ç±»ç±»å‹æ¥å±•ç¤ºèœå“
  • æ–°å¢çš„å¥—é¤é»˜è®¤ä¸ºåœå”®çŠ¶æ€

æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ï¼ˆå…±æ¶‰åŠåˆ°4ä¸ªæ¥å£ï¼‰ï¼š

  • æ ¹æ®ç±»å‹æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ†ç±»ï¼ˆå·²å®Œæˆï¼‰
  • æ ¹æ®åˆ†ç±»idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“
  • å›¾ç‰‡ä¸Šä¼ ï¼ˆå·²å®Œæˆï¼‰
  • æ–°å¢å¥—é¤

æ•°æ®åº“è®¾è®¡ï¼š

setmealè¡¨ä¸ºå¥—é¤è¡¨ï¼Œç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨å¥—é¤çš„ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚å…·ä½“è¡¨ç»“æ„å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

å­—æ®µåæ•°æ®ç±»å‹è¯´æ˜å¤‡æ³¨
idbigintä¸»é”®è‡ªå¢
namevarchar(32)å¥—é¤åç§°å”¯ä¸€
category_idbigintåˆ†ç±»idé€»è¾‘å¤–é”®
pricedecimal(10,2)å¥—é¤ä»·æ ¼
imagevarchar(255)å›¾ç‰‡è·¯å¾„
descriptionvarchar(255)å¥—é¤æè¿°
statusintå”®å–çŠ¶æ€1èµ·å”® 0åœå”®
create_timedatetimeåˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´
update_timedatetimeæœ€åä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´
create_userbigintåˆ›å»ºäººid
update_userbigintæœ€åä¿®æ”¹äººid

setmeal_dishè¡¨ä¸ºå¥—é¤èœå“å…³ç³»è¡¨ï¼Œç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨å¥—é¤å’Œèœå“çš„å…³è”å…³ç³»ï¼ˆå¤šå¯¹å¤šï¼‰ã€‚å…·ä½“è¡¨ç»“æ„å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

å­—æ®µåæ•°æ®ç±»å‹è¯´æ˜å¤‡æ³¨
idbigintä¸»é”®è‡ªå¢
setmeal_idbigintå¥—é¤idé€»è¾‘å¤–é”®
dish_idbigintèœå“idé€»è¾‘å¤–é”®
namevarchar(32)èœå“åç§°å†—ä½™å­—æ®µ
pricedecimal(10,2)èœå“å•ä»·å†—ä½™å­—æ®µ
copiesintèœå“ä»½æ•°

1.2 ä»£ç å®ç° â€‹

1.2.1 DishController â€‹

java
/**
     * æ ¹æ®åˆ†ç±»idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“
     * @param categoryId
     * @return
*/
@GetMapping("/list")
@ApiOperation("æ ¹æ®åˆ†ç±»idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“")
public Result`<List<Dish>`> list(Long categoryId){
    List`<Dish>` list = dishService.list(categoryId);
    return Result.success(list);
}

1.2.2 DishService â€‹

java
/**
     * æ ¹æ®åˆ†ç±»idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“
     * @param categoryId
     * @return
*/
List`<Dish>` list(Long categoryId);

1.2.3 DishServiceImpl â€‹

java
/**
     * æ ¹æ®åˆ†ç±»idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“
     * @param categoryId
     * @return
*/
public List`<Dish>` list(Long categoryId) {
    Dish dish = Dish.builder()
        .categoryId(categoryId)
        .status(StatusConstant.ENABLE)
        .build();
    return dishMapper.list(dish);
}

1.2.4 DishMapper â€‹

java
/**
     * åŠ¨æ€æ¡ä»¶æŸ¥è¯¢èœå“
     * @param dish
     * @return
*/
List`<Dish>` list(Dish dish);

1.2.5 DishMapper.xml â€‹

xml
`<select id="list" resultType="Dish" parameterType="Dish">`
    select * from dish
    `<where>`
        `<if test="name != null">`
            and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
        `</if>`
        `<if test="categoryId != null">`
            and category_id = #{categoryId}
        `</if>`
        `<if test="status != null">`
            and status = #{status}
        `</if>`
    `</where>`
    order by create_time desc
`</select>`

1.2.6 SetmealController â€‹

java
/**
 * å¥—é¤ç®¡ç†
 */
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/admin/setmeal")
@Api(tags = "å¥—é¤ç›¸å…³æ¥å£")
@Slf4j
public class SetmealController {

    @Autowired
    private SetmealService setmealService;

    /**
     * æ–°å¢å¥—é¤
     * @param setmealDTO
     * @return
     */
    @PostMapping
    @ApiOperation("æ–°å¢å¥—é¤")
    public Result save(@RequestBody SetmealDTO setmealDTO) {
        setmealService.saveWithDish(setmealDTO);
        return Result.success();
    }
}

1.2.7 SetmealService â€‹

java
public interface SetmealService {

    /**
     * æ–°å¢å¥—é¤ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶éœ€è¦ä¿å­˜å¥—é¤å’Œèœå“çš„å…³è”å…³ç³»
     * @param setmealDTO
     */
    void saveWithDish(SetmealDTO setmealDTO);
}

1.2.8 SetmealServiceImpl â€‹

java
/**
 * å¥—é¤ä¸šåŠ¡å®ç°
 */
@Service
@Slf4j
public class SetmealServiceImpl implements SetmealService {

    @Autowired
    private SetmealMapper setmealMapper;
    @Autowired
    private SetmealDishMapper setmealDishMapper;
    @Autowired
    private DishMapper dishMapper;

    /**
     * æ–°å¢å¥—é¤ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶éœ€è¦ä¿å­˜å¥—é¤å’Œèœå“çš„å…³è”å…³ç³»
     * @param setmealDTO
     */
    @Transactional
    public void saveWithDish(SetmealDTO setmealDTO) {
        Setmeal setmeal = new Setmeal();
        BeanUtils.copyProperties(setmealDTO, setmeal);

        //å‘å¥—é¤è¡¨æ’å…¥æ•°æ®
        setmealMapper.insert(setmeal);

        //è·å–ç”Ÿæˆçš„å¥—é¤id
        Long setmealId = setmeal.getId();

        List`<SetmealDish>` setmealDishes = setmealDTO.getSetmealDishes();
        setmealDishes.forEach(setmealDish -> {
            setmealDish.setSetmealId(setmealId);
        });

        //ä¿å­˜å¥—é¤å’Œèœå“çš„å…³è”å…³ç³»
        setmealDishMapper.insertBatch(setmealDishes);
    }
}

1.2.9 SetmealMapper â€‹

java
/**
     * æ–°å¢å¥—é¤
     * @param setmeal
*/
@AutoFill(OperationType.INSERT)
void insert(Setmeal setmeal);

1.2.10 SetmealMapper.xml â€‹

xml
`<insert id="insert" parameterType="Setmeal" useGeneratedKeys="true" keyProperty="id">`
    insert into setmeal
    (category_id, name, price, status, description, image, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user)
    values (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{status}, #{description}, #{image}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime},
    #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
`</insert>`

1.2.11 SetmealDishMapper â€‹

java
/**
     * æ‰¹é‡ä¿å­˜å¥—é¤å’Œèœå“çš„å…³è”å…³ç³»
     * @param setmealDishes
*/
void insertBatch(List`<SetmealDish>` setmealDishes);

1.2.12 SetmealDishMapper.xml â€‹

xml
`<insert id="insertBatch" parameterType="list">`
    insert into setmeal_dish
    (setmeal_id,dish_id,name,price,copies)
    values
    `<foreach collection="setmealDishes" item="sd" separator=",">`
        (#{sd.setmealId},#{sd.dishId},#{sd.name},#{sd.price},#{sd.copies})
    `</foreach>`
`</insert>`

1.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

ç•¥

2. å¥—é¤åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢ â€‹

2.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

äº§å“åŸå‹ï¼š

ä¸šåŠ¡è§„åˆ™ï¼š

  • æ ¹æ®é¡µç è¿›è¡Œåˆ†é¡µå±•ç¤º
  • æ¯é¡µå±•ç¤º10æ¡æ•°æ®
  • å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®éœ€è¦ï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§å¥—é¤åç§°ã€åˆ†ç±»ã€å”®å–çŠ¶æ€è¿›è¡ŒæŸ¥è¯¢

æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ï¼š

2.2 ä»£ç å®ç° â€‹

2.2.1 SetmealController â€‹

java
/**
     * åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢
     * @param setmealPageQueryDTO
     * @return
*/
@GetMapping("/page")
@ApiOperation("åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢")
public Result`<PageResult>` page(SetmealPageQueryDTO setmealPageQueryDTO) {
    PageResult pageResult = setmealService.pageQuery(setmealPageQueryDTO);
    return Result.success(pageResult);
}

2.2.2 SetmealService â€‹

java
/**
     * åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢
     * @param setmealPageQueryDTO
     * @return
*/
PageResult pageQuery(SetmealPageQueryDTO setmealPageQueryDTO);

2.2.3 SetmealServiceImpl â€‹

java
/**
     * åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢
     * @param setmealPageQueryDTO
     * @return
*/
public PageResult pageQuery(SetmealPageQueryDTO setmealPageQueryDTO) {
    int pageNum = setmealPageQueryDTO.getPage();
    int pageSize = setmealPageQueryDTO.getPageSize();

    PageHelper.startPage(pageNum, pageSize);
    Page`<SetmealVO>` page = setmealMapper.pageQuery(setmealPageQueryDTO);
    return new PageResult(page.getTotal(), page.getResult());
}

2.2.4 SetmealMapper â€‹

java
/**
     * åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢
     * @param setmealPageQueryDTO
     * @return
*/
Page`<SetmealVO>` pageQuery(SetmealPageQueryDTO setmealPageQueryDTO);

2.2.5 SetmealMapper.xml â€‹

xml
`<select id="pageQuery" resultType="com.sky.vo.SetmealVO">`
    select
    	s.*,c.name categoryName
    from
    	setmeal s
    left join
    	category c
    on
    	s.category_id = c.id
    `<where>`
        `<if test="name != null">`
            and s.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
        `</if>`
        `<if test="status != null">`
            and s.status = #{status}
        `</if>`
        `<if test="categoryId != null">`
            and s.category_id = #{categoryId}
        `</if>`
    `</where>`
    order by s.create_time desc
`</select>`

2.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

ç•¥

3. åˆ é™¤å¥—é¤ â€‹

3.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

äº§å“åŸå‹ï¼š

ä¸šåŠ¡è§„åˆ™ï¼š

  • å¯ä»¥ä¸€æ¬¡åˆ é™¤ä¸€ä¸ªå¥—é¤ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ‰¹é‡åˆ é™¤å¥—é¤
  • èµ·å”®ä¸­çš„å¥—é¤ä¸èƒ½åˆ é™¤

æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ï¼š

3.2 ä»£ç å®ç° â€‹

3.2.1 SetmealController â€‹

java
/**
     * æ‰¹é‡åˆ é™¤å¥—é¤
     * @param ids
     * @return
*/
@DeleteMapping
@ApiOperation("æ‰¹é‡åˆ é™¤å¥—é¤")
public Result delete(@RequestParam List`<Long>` ids){
    setmealService.deleteBatch(ids);
    return Result.success();
}

3.2.2 SetmealService â€‹

java
/**
     * æ‰¹é‡åˆ é™¤å¥—é¤
     * @param ids
*/
void deleteBatch(List`<Long>` ids);

3.2.3 SetmealServiceImpl â€‹

java
/**
     * æ‰¹é‡åˆ é™¤å¥—é¤
     * @param ids
*/
@Transactional
public void deleteBatch(List`<Long>` ids) {
    ids.forEach(id -> {
        Setmeal setmeal = setmealMapper.getById(id);
        if(StatusConstant.ENABLE == setmeal.getStatus()){
            //èµ·å”®ä¸­çš„å¥—é¤ä¸èƒ½åˆ é™¤
            throw new DeletionNotAllowedException(MessageConstant.SETMEAL_ON_SALE);
        }
    });

    ids.forEach(setmealId -> {
        //åˆ é™¤å¥—é¤è¡¨ä¸­çš„æ•°æ®
        setmealMapper.deleteById(setmealId);
        //åˆ é™¤å¥—é¤èœå“å…³ç³»è¡¨ä¸­çš„æ•°æ®
        setmealDishMapper.deleteBySetmealId(setmealId);
    });
}

3.2.4 SetmealMapper â€‹

java
/**
     * æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢å¥—é¤
     * @param id
     * @return
*/
@Select("select * from setmeal where id = #{id}")
Setmeal getById(Long id);

/**
     * æ ¹æ®idåˆ é™¤å¥—é¤
     * @param setmealId
*/
@Delete("delete from setmeal where id = #{id}")
void deleteById(Long setmealId);

3.2.5 SetmealDishMapper â€‹

java
/**
     * æ ¹æ®å¥—é¤idåˆ é™¤å¥—é¤å’Œèœå“çš„å…³è”å…³ç³»
     * @param setmealId
*/
@Delete("delete from setmeal_dish where setmeal_id = #{setmealId}")
void deleteBySetmealId(Long setmealId);

3.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

ç•¥

4. ä¿®æ”¹å¥—é¤ â€‹

4.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

äº§å“åŸå‹ï¼š

æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ï¼ˆå…±æ¶‰åŠåˆ°5ä¸ªæ¥å£ï¼‰ï¼š

  • æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢å¥—é¤
  • æ ¹æ®ç±»å‹æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ†ç±»ï¼ˆå·²å®Œæˆï¼‰
  • æ ¹æ®åˆ†ç±»idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“ï¼ˆå·²å®Œæˆï¼‰
  • å›¾ç‰‡ä¸Šä¼ ï¼ˆå·²å®Œæˆï¼‰
  • ä¿®æ”¹å¥—é¤

4.2 ä»£ç å®ç° â€‹

4.2.1 SetmealController â€‹

java
/**
     * æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢å¥—é¤ï¼Œç”¨äºä¿®æ”¹é¡µé¢å›æ˜¾æ•°æ®
     *
     * @param id
     * @return
*/
@GetMapping("/{id}")
@ApiOperation("æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢å¥—é¤")
public Result`<SetmealVO>` getById(@PathVariable Long id) {
    SetmealVO setmealVO = setmealService.getByIdWithDish(id);
    return Result.success(setmealVO);
}

/**
     * ä¿®æ”¹å¥—é¤
     *
     * @param setmealDTO
     * @return
*/
@PutMapping
@ApiOperation("ä¿®æ”¹å¥—é¤")
public Result update(@RequestBody SetmealDTO setmealDTO) {
    setmealService.update(setmealDTO);
    return Result.success();
}

4.2.2 SetmealService â€‹

java
/**
     * æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢å¥—é¤å’Œå…³è”çš„èœå“æ•°æ®
     * @param id
     * @return
*/
SetmealVO getByIdWithDish(Long id);

/**
     * ä¿®æ”¹å¥—é¤
     * @param setmealDTO
*/
void update(SetmealDTO setmealDTO);

4.2.3 SetmealServiceImpl â€‹

java
/**
     * æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢å¥—é¤å’Œå¥—é¤èœå“å…³ç³»
     *
     * @param id
     * @return
*/
public SetmealVO getByIdWithDish(Long id) {
    Setmeal setmeal = setmealMapper.getById(id);
    List`<SetmealDish>` setmealDishes = setmealDishMapper.getBySetmealId(id);

    SetmealVO setmealVO = new SetmealVO();
    BeanUtils.copyProperties(setmeal, setmealVO);
    setmealVO.setSetmealDishes(setmealDishes);
    
    return setmealVO;
}

/**
     * ä¿®æ”¹å¥—é¤
     *
     * @param setmealDTO
*/
@Transactional
public void update(SetmealDTO setmealDTO) {
    Setmeal setmeal = new Setmeal();
    BeanUtils.copyProperties(setmealDTO, setmeal);

    //1ã€ä¿®æ”¹å¥—é¤è¡¨ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œupdate
    setmealMapper.update(setmeal);

    //å¥—é¤id
    Long setmealId = setmealDTO.getId();

    //2ã€åˆ é™¤å¥—é¤å’Œèœå“çš„å…³è”å…³ç³»ï¼Œæ“ä½œsetmeal_dishè¡¨ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œdelete
    setmealDishMapper.deleteBySetmealId(setmealId);

    List`<SetmealDish>` setmealDishes = setmealDTO.getSetmealDishes();
    setmealDishes.forEach(setmealDish -> {
        setmealDish.setSetmealId(setmealId);
    });
    //3ã€é‡æ–°æ’å…¥å¥—é¤å’Œèœå“çš„å…³è”å…³ç³»ï¼Œæ“ä½œsetmeal_dishè¡¨ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œinsert
    setmealDishMapper.insertBatch(setmealDishes);
}

4.2.4 SetmealDishMapper â€‹

java
	/**
     * æ ¹æ®å¥—é¤idæŸ¥è¯¢å¥—é¤å’Œèœå“çš„å…³è”å…³ç³»
     * @param setmealId
     * @return
     */
    @Select("select * from setmeal_dish where setmeal_id = #{setmealId}")
    List`<SetmealDish>` getBySetmealId(Long setmealId);

4.2.5 SetmealMapper â€‹

java
    /**
     * å¥—é¤èµ·å”®æˆ–åœå”®
     * @param status
     * @param id
     */
    @Update("update setmeal set status = #{status} where id = #{id} ")
    void startOrStop(Integer status, Long id);

4.2.6 SetmealMapper.xml â€‹

xml
    <update id="update" parameterType="Setmeal">
        update setmeal
        <set>
            <if test="name !=null">name = #{name},</if>
            <if test="price !=null">price = #{price},</if>
            <if test="categoryId !=null">category_id = #{categoryId},</if>
            <if test="status !=null">status = #{status},</if>
            <if test="image !=null">image = #{image},</if>
            <if test="description !=null ">description = #{description},</if>
            <if test="updateUser !=null ">update_user = #{updateUser},</if>
            <if test="updateTime !=null ">update_time = #{updateTime},</if>
        </set>
        where id = #{id}
    </update>

4.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

ç•¥

5. èµ·å”®åœå”®å¥—é¤ â€‹

5.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

äº§å“åŸå‹ï¼š

ä¸šåŠ¡è§„åˆ™ï¼š

  • å¯ä»¥å¯¹çŠ¶æ€ä¸ºèµ·å”®çš„å¥—é¤è¿›è¡Œåœå”®æ“ä½œï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¯¹çŠ¶æ€ä¸ºåœå”®çš„å¥—é¤è¿›è¡Œèµ·å”®æ“ä½œ
  • èµ·å”®çš„å¥—é¤å¯ä»¥å±•ç¤ºåœ¨ç”¨æˆ·ç«¯ï¼Œåœå”®çš„å¥—é¤ä¸èƒ½å±•ç¤ºåœ¨ç”¨æˆ·ç«¯
  • èµ·å”®å¥—é¤æ—¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœå¥—é¤å†…åŒ…å«åœå”®çš„èœå“ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸èƒ½èµ·å”®

æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ï¼š

5.2 ä»£ç å®ç° â€‹

5.2.1 SetmealController â€‹

java
/**
     * å¥—é¤èµ·å”®åœå”®
     * @param status
     * @param id
     * @return
*/
@PostMapping("/status/{status}")
@ApiOperation("å¥—é¤èµ·å”®åœå”®")
public Result startOrStop(@PathVariable Integer status, Long id) {
    setmealService.startOrStop(status, id);
    return Result.success();
}

5.2.2 SetmealService â€‹

java
/**
     * å¥—é¤èµ·å”®ã€åœå”®
     * @param status
     * @param id
*/
void startOrStop(Integer status, Long id);

5.2.3 SetmealServiceImpl â€‹

java
/**
     * å¥—é¤èµ·å”®ã€åœå”®
     * @param status
     * @param id
*/
public void startOrStop(Integer status, Long id) {
    //èµ·å”®å¥—é¤æ—¶ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­å¥—é¤å†…æ˜¯å¦æœ‰åœå”®èœå“ï¼Œæœ‰åœå”®èœå“æç¤º"å¥—é¤å†…åŒ…å«æœªå¯å”®èœå“ï¼Œæ— æ³•å¯å”®"
    if(status == StatusConstant.ENABLE){
        //select a.* from dish a left join setmeal_dish b on a.id = b.dish_id where b.setmeal_id = ?
        List`<Dish>` dishList = dishMapper.getBySetmealId(id);
        if(dishList != null && dishList.size() > 0){
            dishList.forEach(dish -> {
                if(StatusConstant.DISABLE == dish.getStatus()){
                    throw new SetmealEnableFailedException(MessageConstant.SETMEAL_ENABLE_FAILED);
                }
            });
        }
    }

    Setmeal setmeal = Setmeal.builder()
        .id(id)
        .status(status)
        .build();
    setmealMapper.update(setmeal);
}

5.2.4 DishMapper â€‹

java
/**
     * æ ¹æ®å¥—é¤idæŸ¥è¯¢èœå“
     * @param setmealId
     * @return
*/
@Select("select a.* from dish a left join setmeal_dish b on a.id = b.dish_id where b.setmeal_id = #{setmealId}")
List`<Dish>` getBySetmealId(Long setmealId);

5.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

æ›´æ–°: 2025/4/11 å­—æ•°: 0 å­— æ—¶é•¿: 0 åˆ†é’Ÿ

è¯¾ç¨‹å†…å®¹ â€‹

åŠŸèƒ½å®ç°ï¼šè¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€è®¾ç½®

æ•ˆæœå›¾ï¼š

é€‰æ‹©è¥ä¸šä¸­ï¼Œå®¢æˆ·å¯åœ¨å°ç¨‹åºç«¯ä¸‹å•ï¼š

é€‰æ‹©æ‰“çƒŠä¸­ï¼Œå®¢æˆ·æ— æ³•åœ¨å°ç¨‹åºç«¯ä¸‹å•ï¼š

1. Rediså…¥é—¨ â€‹

1.1 Redisç®€ä»‹ â€‹

Redisæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäºå†…å­˜çš„key-valueç»“æ„æ•°æ®åº“ã€‚Redis æ˜¯äº’è”ç½‘æŠ€æœ¯é¢†åŸŸä½¿ç”¨æœ€ä¸ºå¹¿æ³›çš„å­˜å‚¨ä¸­é—´ä»¶ã€‚

**å®˜ç½‘ï¼š**https://redis.io **ä¸­æ–‡ç½‘ï¼š**https://www.redis.net.cn/

key-valueç»“æ„å­˜å‚¨ï¼š â€‹

ä¸»è¦ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼š â€‹

  • åŸºäºå†…å­˜å­˜å‚¨ï¼Œè¯»å†™æ€§èƒ½é«˜
  • é€‚åˆå­˜å‚¨çƒ­ç‚¹æ•°æ®ï¼ˆçƒ­ç‚¹å•†å“ã€èµ„è®¯ã€æ–°é—»ï¼‰
  • ä¼ä¸šåº”ç”¨å¹¿æ³›
  • Redisæ˜¯ç”¨Cè¯­è¨€å¼€å‘çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå¼€æºçš„é«˜æ€§èƒ½é”®å€¼å¯¹(key-value)æ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œå®˜æ–¹æä¾›çš„æ•°æ®æ˜¯å¯ä»¥è¾¾åˆ°100000+çš„QPSï¼ˆæ¯ç§’å†…æŸ¥è¯¢æ¬¡æ•°ï¼‰ã€‚
  • å®ƒå­˜å‚¨çš„valueç±»å‹æ¯”è¾ƒä¸°å¯Œï¼Œä¹Ÿè¢«ç§°ä¸ºç»“æ„åŒ–çš„NoSqlæ•°æ®åº“ã€‚

NoSqlï¼ˆNot Only SQLï¼‰ï¼Œä¸ä»…ä»…æ˜¯SQLï¼Œæ³›æŒ‡éå…³ç³»å‹æ•°æ®åº“ã€‚NoSqlæ•°æ®åº“å¹¶ä¸æ˜¯è¦å–ä»£å…³ç³»å‹æ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯å…³ç³»å‹æ•°æ®åº“çš„è¡¥å……ã€‚

å…³ç³»å‹æ•°æ®åº“(RDBMS)ï¼š

èµ„æ–™ä¸­å·²æä¾›å¥½çš„å®‰è£…åŒ…ï¼š

1.2.2 Rediså®‰è£… â€‹

1ï¼‰åœ¨Windowsä¸­å®‰è£…Redis(é¡¹ç›®ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨)

Redisçš„Windowsç‰ˆå±äºç»¿è‰²è½¯ä»¶ï¼Œç›´æ¥è§£å‹å³å¯ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œè§£å‹åç›®å½•ç»“æ„å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

2ï¼‰åœ¨Linuxä¸­å®‰è£…Redis(ç®€å•äº†è§£)

åœ¨Linuxç³»ç»Ÿå®‰è£…Redisæ­¥éª¤ï¼š

  1. å°†Rediså®‰è£…åŒ…ä¸Šä¼ åˆ°Linux

  3. å®‰è£…Redisçš„ä¾èµ–ç¯å¢ƒgccï¼Œå‘½ä»¤ï¼šyum install gcc-c++
  4. è¿›å…¥/usr/local/redis-4.0.0ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œç¼–è¯‘ï¼Œå‘½ä»¤ï¼šmake
  5. è¿›å…¥redisçš„srcç›®å½•è¿›è¡Œå®‰è£…ï¼Œå‘½ä»¤ï¼šmake install

å®‰è£…åé‡ç‚¹æ–‡ä»¶è¯´æ˜ï¼š

1.3 RedisæœåŠ¡å¯åŠ¨ä¸åœæ­¢ â€‹

ä»¥windowç‰ˆRedisè¿›è¡Œæ¼”ç¤ºï¼š

1.3.1 æœåŠ¡å¯åŠ¨å‘½ä»¤ â€‹

redis-server.exe redis.windows.conf â€‹

RedisæœåŠ¡é»˜è®¤ç«¯å£å·ä¸º 6379 ï¼Œé€šè¿‡å¿«æ·é”®Ctrl + C å³å¯åœæ­¢RedisæœåŠ¡

å½“RedisæœåŠ¡å¯åŠ¨æˆåŠŸåï¼Œå¯é€šè¿‡å®¢æˆ·ç«¯è¿›è¡Œè¿æ¥ã€‚

1.3.2 å®¢æˆ·ç«¯è¿æ¥å‘½ä»¤ â€‹

é€šè¿‡redis-cli.exeå‘½ä»¤é»˜è®¤è¿æ¥çš„æ˜¯æœ¬åœ°çš„redisæœåŠ¡ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤6379ç«¯å£ã€‚ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡æŒ‡å®šå¦‚ä¸‹å‚æ•°è¿æ¥ï¼š

1.3.3 ä¿®æ”¹Redisé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ â€‹

è®¾ç½®RedisæœåŠ¡å¯†ç ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹redis.windows.conf

requirepass 123456

æ³¨æ„ï¼š

  • ä¿®æ”¹å¯†ç åéœ€è¦é‡å¯RedisæœåŠ¡æ‰èƒ½ç”Ÿæ•ˆ
  • Redisé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ # è¡¨ç¤ºæ³¨é‡Š

é‡å¯Redisåï¼Œå†æ¬¡è¿æ¥Redisæ—¶ï¼Œéœ€åŠ ä¸Šå¯†ç ï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¿æ¥å¤±è´¥ã€‚

1.3.4 Rediså®¢æˆ·ç«¯å›¾å½¢å·¥å…· â€‹

é»˜è®¤æä¾›çš„å®¢æˆ·ç«¯è¿æ¥å·¥å…·ç•Œé¢ä¸å¤ªå‹å¥½ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æ“ä½œä¹Ÿè¾ƒä¸ºéº»çƒ¦ï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œå¼•å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªRediså®¢æˆ·ç«¯å›¾å½¢å·¥å…·ã€‚

åœ¨å½“å¤©èµ„æ–™ä¸­å·²æä¾›å®‰è£…åŒ…ï¼Œç›´æ¥å®‰è£…å³å¯ã€‚

å®‰è£…å®Œæ¯•åï¼Œç›´æ¥åŒå‡»å¯åŠ¨

æ–°å»ºè¿æ¥

è¿æ¥æˆåŠŸ

2. Redisæ•°æ®ç±»å‹ â€‹

2.1 äº”ç§å¸¸ç”¨æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ä»‹ç» â€‹

Rediså­˜å‚¨çš„æ˜¯key-valueç»“æ„çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­keyæ˜¯å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç±»å‹ï¼Œvalueæœ‰5ç§å¸¸ç”¨çš„æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ï¼š

  • å­—ç¬¦ä¸² string
  • å“ˆå¸Œ hash
  • åˆ—è¡¨ list
  • é›†åˆ set
  • æœ‰åºé›†åˆ sorted set / zset

2.2 å„ç§æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ç‰¹ç‚¹ â€‹

è§£é‡Šè¯´æ˜ï¼š

  • å­—ç¬¦ä¸²(string)ï¼šæ™®é€šå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼ŒRedisä¸­æœ€ç®€å•çš„æ•°æ®ç±»å‹
  • å“ˆå¸Œ(hash)ï¼šä¹Ÿå«æ•£åˆ—ï¼Œç±»ä¼¼äºJavaä¸­çš„HashMapç»“æ„
  • åˆ—è¡¨(list)ï¼šæŒ‰ç…§æ’å…¥é¡ºåºæ’åºï¼Œå¯ä»¥æœ‰é‡å¤å…ƒç´ ï¼Œç±»ä¼¼äºJavaä¸­çš„LinkedList
  • é›†åˆ(set)ï¼šæ— åºé›†åˆï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰é‡å¤å…ƒç´ ï¼Œç±»ä¼¼äºJavaä¸­çš„HashSet
  • æœ‰åºé›†åˆ(sorted set/zset)ï¼šé›†åˆä¸­æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å…³è”ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ†æ•°(score)ï¼Œæ ¹æ®åˆ†æ•°å‡åºæ’åºï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰é‡å¤å…ƒç´ 

3. Rediså¸¸ç”¨å‘½ä»¤ â€‹

3.1 å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ“ä½œå‘½ä»¤ â€‹

Redis ä¸­å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç±»å‹å¸¸ç”¨å‘½ä»¤ï¼š

  • SET key value è®¾ç½®æŒ‡å®škeyçš„å€¼
  • GET key è·å–æŒ‡å®škeyçš„å€¼
  • SETEX key seconds value è®¾ç½®æŒ‡å®škeyçš„å€¼ï¼Œå¹¶å°† key çš„è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´è®¾ä¸º seconds ç§’(çŸ­ä¿¡éªŒè¯ç )
  • SETNX key value åªæœ‰åœ¨ keyå­˜åœ¨æ—¶è®¾ç½® key çš„å€¼ (åˆ†å¸ƒå¼é”)

æ›´å¤šå‘½ä»¤å¯ä»¥å‚è€ƒRedisä¸­æ–‡ç½‘ï¼šhttps://www.redis.net.cn

3.2 å“ˆå¸Œæ“ä½œå‘½ä»¤ â€‹

Redis hash æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªstringç±»å‹çš„ field å’Œ value çš„æ˜ å°„è¡¨ï¼Œhashç‰¹åˆ«é€‚åˆç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå¸¸ç”¨å‘½ä»¤ï¼š

  • HSET key field value å°†å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ key ä¸­çš„å­—æ®µ field çš„å€¼è®¾ä¸º value
  • HGET key field è·å–å­˜å‚¨åœ¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ä¸­æŒ‡å®šå­—æ®µçš„å€¼
  • HDEL key field åˆ é™¤å­˜å‚¨åœ¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ä¸­çš„æŒ‡å®šå­—æ®µ
  • HKEYS key è·å–å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰å­—æ®µ
  • HVALS key è·å–å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰å€¼

3.3 åˆ—è¡¨æ“ä½œå‘½ä»¤ â€‹

ç±»ä¼¼**åŒç«¯é˜Ÿåˆ—**

Redis åˆ—è¡¨æ˜¯ç®€å•çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²åˆ—è¡¨ï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§æ’å…¥é¡ºåºæ’åºï¼Œå¸¸ç”¨å‘½ä»¤ï¼š

  • LPUSH key value1 [value2] å°†ä¸€ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªå€¼æ’å…¥åˆ°åˆ—è¡¨å¤´éƒ¨ï¼ˆå·¦ä¾§ï¼‰
  • RPUSH key value1 [value2] å°†ä¸€ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªå€¼æ’å…¥åˆ°åˆ—è¡¨å°¾éƒ¨ï¼ˆå³ä¾§ï¼‰
  • LRANGE key start stop è·å–åˆ—è¡¨æŒ‡å®šèŒƒå›´å†…çš„å…ƒç´ 
  • RPOP key ç§»é™¤å¹¶è·å–åˆ—è¡¨æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ (æœ€å³ä¾§ )
  • LPOP key ç§»é™¤å¹¶è·å–åˆ—è¡¨æœ€å·¦ä¾§çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ 
  • LLEN key è·å–åˆ—è¡¨é•¿åº¦
  • BRPOP key1 [key2 ] timeout ç§»å‡ºå¹¶è·å–åˆ—è¡¨çš„æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œ å¦‚æœåˆ—è¡¨æ²¡æœ‰å…ƒç´ ä¼šé˜»å¡åˆ—è¡¨ç›´åˆ°ç­‰å¾…è¶… æ—¶æˆ–å‘ç°å¯å¼¹å‡ºå…ƒç´ ä¸ºæ­¢

3.4 é›†åˆæ“ä½œå‘½ä»¤ â€‹

Redis set æ˜¯stringç±»å‹çš„**æ— åºé›†åˆ**ã€‚é›†åˆæˆå‘˜æ˜¯å”¯ä¸€çš„ï¼Œè¿™å°±æ„å‘³ç€é›†åˆä¸­ä¸èƒ½å‡ºç°é‡å¤çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œå¸¸ç”¨å‘½ä»¤ï¼š

  • SADD key member1 [member2] å‘é›†åˆæ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªæˆå‘˜
  • SMEMBERS key è¿”å›é›†åˆä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰æˆå‘˜
  • SCARD key è·å–é›†åˆçš„æˆå‘˜æ•°
  • SINTER key1 [key2] è¿”å›ç»™å®šæ‰€æœ‰é›†åˆçš„äº¤é›†
  • SUNION key1 [key2] è¿”å›æ‰€æœ‰ç»™å®šé›†åˆçš„å¹¶é›†
  • SREM key member1 [member2] ç§»é™¤é›†åˆä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªæˆå‘˜

3.5 æœ‰åºé›†åˆæ“ä½œå‘½ä»¤ â€‹

Redisæœ‰åºé›†åˆæ˜¯stringç±»å‹å…ƒç´ çš„é›†åˆï¼Œä¸”ä¸å…è®¸æœ‰é‡å¤æˆå‘˜ã€‚æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ éƒ½ä¼šå…³è”ä¸€ä¸ªdoubleç±»å‹çš„åˆ†æ•°ã€‚å¸¸ç”¨å‘½ä»¤ï¼š

å¸¸ç”¨å‘½ä»¤ï¼š

  • ZADD key score1 member1 [score2 member2] å‘æœ‰åºé›†åˆæ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªæˆå‘˜
  • ZRANGE key start stop [WITHSCORES] é€šè¿‡ç´¢å¼•åŒºé—´è¿”å›æœ‰åºé›†åˆä¸­æŒ‡å®šåŒºé—´å†…çš„æˆå‘˜
  • ZINCRBY key increment member æœ‰åºé›†åˆä¸­å¯¹æŒ‡å®šæˆå‘˜çš„åˆ†æ•°åŠ ä¸Šå¢é‡ increment
  • ZREM key member [member ...] ç§»é™¤æœ‰åºé›†åˆä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªæˆå‘˜

3.6 é€šç”¨å‘½ä»¤ â€‹

Redisçš„é€šç”¨å‘½ä»¤æ˜¯ä¸åˆ†æ•°æ®ç±»å‹çš„ï¼Œéƒ½å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨çš„å‘½ä»¤ï¼š

  • KEYS pattern æŸ¥æ‰¾æ‰€æœ‰ç¬¦åˆç»™å®šæ¨¡å¼( pattern)çš„ key
  • EXISTS key æ£€æŸ¥ç»™å®š key æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
  • TYPE key è¿”å› key æ‰€å‚¨å­˜çš„å€¼çš„ç±»å‹
  • DEL key è¯¥å‘½ä»¤ç”¨äºåœ¨ key å­˜åœ¨æ˜¯åˆ é™¤ key

4.åœ¨Javaä¸­æ“ä½œRedis â€‹

4.1 Redisçš„Javaå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ â€‹

å‰é¢æˆ‘ä»¬è®²è§£äº†Redisçš„å¸¸ç”¨å‘½ä»¤ï¼Œè¿™äº›å‘½ä»¤æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬æ“ä½œRedisçš„åŸºç¡€ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨javaç¨‹åºä¸­åº”è¯¥å¦‚ä½•æ“ä½œRediså‘¢ï¼Ÿè¿™å°±éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨Redisçš„Javaå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼Œå°±å¦‚åŒæˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨JDBCæ“ä½œMySQLæ•°æ®åº“ä¸€æ ·ã€‚

Redis çš„ Java å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å¾ˆå¤šï¼Œå¸¸ç”¨çš„å‡ ç§ï¼š

  • Jedis
  • Lettuce
  • Spring Data Redis

Spring å¯¹ Redis å®¢æˆ·ç«¯è¿›è¡Œäº†æ•´åˆï¼Œæä¾›äº† Spring Data Redisï¼Œåœ¨Spring Booté¡¹ç›®ä¸­è¿˜æä¾›äº†å¯¹åº”çš„Starterï¼Œå³ spring-boot-starter-data-redisã€‚

æˆ‘ä»¬é‡ç‚¹å­¦ä¹ **Spring Data Redis**ã€‚

4.2 Spring Data Redisä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼ â€‹

4.2.1 ä»‹ç» â€‹

Spring Data Redis æ˜¯ Spring çš„ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œæä¾›äº†åœ¨ Spring åº”ç”¨ä¸­é€šè¿‡ç®€å•çš„é…ç½®å°±å¯ä»¥è®¿é—® Redis æœåŠ¡ï¼Œå¯¹ Redis åº•å±‚å¼€å‘åŒ…è¿›è¡Œäº†é«˜åº¦å°è£…ã€‚åœ¨ Spring é¡¹ç›®ä¸­ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨Spring Data Redisæ¥ç®€åŒ– Redis æ“ä½œã€‚

ç½‘å€ï¼šhttps://spring.io/projects/spring-data-redis

Spring Bootæä¾›äº†å¯¹åº”çš„Starterï¼Œmavenåæ ‡ï¼š

xml
<dependency>
	<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
	<artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-redis</artifactId>
</dependency>

Spring Data Redisä¸­æä¾›äº†ä¸€ä¸ªé«˜åº¦å°è£…çš„ç±»ï¼šRedisTemplateï¼Œå¯¹ç›¸å…³apiè¿›è¡Œäº†å½’ç±»å°è£…,å°†åŒä¸€ç±»å‹æ“ä½œå°è£…ä¸ºoperationæ¥å£ï¼Œå…·ä½“åˆ†ç±»å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

  • ValueOperationsï¼šstringæ•°æ®æ“ä½œ
  • SetOperationsï¼šsetç±»å‹æ•°æ®æ“ä½œ
  • ZSetOperationsï¼šzsetç±»å‹æ•°æ®æ“ä½œ
  • HashOperationsï¼šhashç±»å‹çš„æ•°æ®æ“ä½œ
  • ListOperationsï¼šlistç±»å‹çš„æ•°æ®æ“ä½œ

4.2.2 ç¯å¢ƒæ­å»º â€‹

è¿›å…¥åˆ°sky-serveræ¨¡å—

1). å¯¼å…¥Spring Data Redisçš„mavenåæ ‡(å·²å®Œæˆ)

xml
<dependency>
     <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
     <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-redis</artifactId>
</dependency>

2). é…ç½®Redisæ•°æ®æº

åœ¨application-dev.ymlä¸­æ·»åŠ 

yaml
sky:
  redis:
    host: localhost
    port: 6379
    password: 123456
    database: 10

è§£é‡Šè¯´æ˜ï¼š

database:æŒ‡å®šä½¿ç”¨Redisçš„å“ªä¸ªæ•°æ®åº“ï¼ŒRedisæœåŠ¡å¯åŠ¨åé»˜è®¤æœ‰16ä¸ªæ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œç¼–å·åˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯ä»0åˆ°15ã€‚

å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä¿®æ”¹Redisé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶æ¥æŒ‡å®šæ•°æ®åº“çš„æ•°é‡ã€‚

åœ¨application.ymlä¸­æ·»åŠ è¯»å–application-dev.ymlä¸­çš„ç›¸å…³Redisé…ç½®

yaml
spring:
  profiles:
    active: dev
  redis:
    host: ${sky.redis.host}
    port: ${sky.redis.port}
    password: ${sky.redis.password}
    database: ${sky.redis.database}

3). ç¼–å†™é…ç½®ç±»ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºRedisTemplateå¯¹è±¡

java
package com.sky.config;

import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
import org.springframework.data.redis.connection.RedisConnectionFactory;
import org.springframework.data.redis.core.RedisTemplate;
import org.springframework.data.redis.serializer.StringRedisSerializer;

@Configuration
@Slf4j
public class RedisConfiguration {

    @Bean
    public RedisTemplate redisTemplate(RedisConnectionFactory redisConnectionFactory){
        log.info("å¼€å§‹åˆ›å»ºredisæ¨¡æ¿å¯¹è±¡...");
        RedisTemplate redisTemplate = new RedisTemplate();
        //è®¾ç½®redisçš„è¿æ¥å·¥å‚å¯¹è±¡
        redisTemplate.setConnectionFactory(redisConnectionFactory);
        //è®¾ç½®redis keyçš„åºåˆ—åŒ–å™¨
        redisTemplate.setKeySerializer(new StringRedisSerializer());
        return redisTemplate;
    }
}

è§£é‡Šè¯´æ˜ï¼š

å½“å‰é…ç½®ç±»ä¸æ˜¯å¿…é¡»çš„ï¼Œå› ä¸º Spring Boot æ¡†æ¶ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨è£…é… RedisTemplate å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯é»˜è®¤çš„keyåºåˆ—åŒ–å™¨ä¸º

JdkSerializationRedisSerializerï¼Œå¯¼è‡´æˆ‘ä»¬å­˜åˆ°Redisä¸­åçš„æ•°æ®å’ŒåŸå§‹æ•°æ®æœ‰å·®åˆ«ï¼Œæ•…è®¾ç½®ä¸º

StringRedisSerializeråºåˆ—åŒ–å™¨ã€‚

4). é€šè¿‡RedisTemplateå¯¹è±¡æ“ä½œRedis

åœ¨testä¸‹æ–°å»ºæµ‹è¯•ç±»

java
package com.sky.test;

import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.boot.test.context.SpringBootTest;
import org.springframework.data.redis.core.*;

@SpringBootTest
public class SpringDataRedisTest {
    @Autowired
    private RedisTemplate redisTemplate;

    @Test
    public void testRedisTemplate(){
        System.out.println(redisTemplate);
        //stringæ•°æ®æ“ä½œ
        ValueOperations valueOperations = redisTemplate.opsForValue();
        //hashç±»å‹çš„æ•°æ®æ“ä½œ
        HashOperations hashOperations = redisTemplate.opsForHash();
        //listç±»å‹çš„æ•°æ®æ“ä½œ
        ListOperations listOperations = redisTemplate.opsForList();
        //setç±»å‹æ•°æ®æ“ä½œ
        SetOperations setOperations = redisTemplate.opsForSet();
        //zsetç±»å‹æ•°æ®æ“ä½œ
        ZSetOperations zSetOperations = redisTemplate.opsForZSet();
    }
}

æµ‹è¯•ï¼š

è¯´æ˜RedisTemplateå¯¹è±¡æ³¨å…¥æˆåŠŸï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”é€šè¿‡è¯¥RedisTemplateå¯¹è±¡è·å–æ“ä½œ5ç§æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ç›¸å…³å¯¹è±¡ã€‚

ä¸Šè¿°ç¯å¢ƒæ­å»ºå®Œæ¯•åï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°±æ¥å…·ä½“å¯¹å¸¸è§5ç§æ•°æ®ç±»å‹è¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œã€‚

4.2.3 æ“ä½œå¸¸è§ç±»å‹æ•°æ® â€‹

1). æ“ä½œå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç±»å‹æ•°æ®

java
	/**
     * æ“ä½œå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç±»å‹çš„æ•°æ®
     */
    @Test
    public void testString(){
        // set get setex setnx
        redisTemplate.opsForValue().set("name","å°æ˜");
        String city = (String) redisTemplate.opsForValue().get("name");
        System.out.println(city);
        redisTemplate.opsForValue().set("code","1234",3, TimeUnit.MINUTES);
        redisTemplate.opsForValue().setIfAbsent("lock","1");
        redisTemplate.opsForValue().setIfAbsent("lock","2");
    }

2). æ“ä½œå“ˆå¸Œç±»å‹æ•°æ®

java
	/**
     * æ“ä½œå“ˆå¸Œç±»å‹çš„æ•°æ®
     */
    @Test
    public void testHash(){
        //hset hget hdel hkeys hvals
        HashOperations hashOperations = redisTemplate.opsForHash();

        hashOperations.put("100","name","tom");
        hashOperations.put("100","age","20");

        String name = (String) hashOperations.get("100", "name");
        System.out.println(name);

        Set keys = hashOperations.keys("100");
        System.out.println(keys);

        List values = hashOperations.values("100");
        System.out.println(values);

        hashOperations.delete("100","age");
    }

3). æ“ä½œåˆ—è¡¨ç±»å‹æ•°æ®

java
	/**
     * æ“ä½œåˆ—è¡¨ç±»å‹çš„æ•°æ®
     */
    @Test
    public void testList(){
        //lpush lrange rpop llen
        ListOperations listOperations = redisTemplate.opsForList();

        listOperations.leftPushAll("mylist","a","b","c");
        listOperations.leftPush("mylist","d");

        List mylist = listOperations.range("mylist", 0, -1);
        System.out.println(mylist);

        listOperations.rightPop("mylist");

        Long size = listOperations.size("mylist");
        System.out.println(size);
    }

4). æ“ä½œé›†åˆç±»å‹æ•°æ®

java
	/**
     * æ“ä½œé›†åˆç±»å‹çš„æ•°æ®
     */
    @Test
    public void testSet(){
        //sadd smembers scard sinter sunion srem
        SetOperations setOperations = redisTemplate.opsForSet();

        setOperations.add("set1","a","b","c","d");
        setOperations.add("set2","a","b","x","y");

        Set members = setOperations.members("set1");
        System.out.println(members);

        Long size = setOperations.size("set1");
        System.out.println(size);

        Set intersect = setOperations.intersect("set1", "set2");
        System.out.println(intersect);

        Set union = setOperations.union("set1", "set2");
        System.out.println(union);

        setOperations.remove("set1","a","b");
    }

5). æ“ä½œæœ‰åºé›†åˆç±»å‹æ•°æ®

java
	/**
     * æ“ä½œæœ‰åºé›†åˆç±»å‹çš„æ•°æ®
     */
    @Test
    public void testZset(){
        //zadd zrange zincrby zrem
        ZSetOperations zSetOperations = redisTemplate.opsForZSet();

        zSetOperations.add("zset1","a",10);
        zSetOperations.add("zset1","b",12);
        zSetOperations.add("zset1","c",9);

        Set zset1 = zSetOperations.range("zset1", 0, -1);
        System.out.println(zset1);

        zSetOperations.incrementScore("zset1","c",10);

        zSetOperations.remove("zset1","a","b");
    }

6). é€šç”¨å‘½ä»¤æ“ä½œ

java
	/**
     * é€šç”¨å‘½ä»¤æ“ä½œ
     */
    @Test
    public void testCommon(){
        //keys exists type del
        Set keys = redisTemplate.keys("*");
        System.out.println(keys);

        Boolean name = redisTemplate.hasKey("name");
        Boolean set1 = redisTemplate.hasKey("set1");

        for (Object key : keys) {
            DataType type = redisTemplate.type(key);
            System.out.println(type.name());
        }

        redisTemplate.delete("mylist");
    }

5. åº—é“ºè¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€è®¾ç½® â€‹

5.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

5.1.1 äº§å“åŸå‹ â€‹

è¿›åˆ°è‹ç©¹å¤–å–åå°ï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºé¤å…çš„è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œè¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€åˆ†ä¸ºè¥ä¸šä¸­å’Œæ‰“çƒŠä¸­ï¼Œè‹¥å½“å‰é¤å…å¤„äºè¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨æ¥æ”¶ä»»ä½•è®¢å•ï¼Œå®¢æˆ·å¯åœ¨å°ç¨‹åºè¿›è¡Œä¸‹å•æ“ä½œï¼›è‹¥å½“å‰é¤å…å¤„äºæ‰“çƒŠçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œä¸æ¥å—ä»»ä½•è®¢å•ï¼Œå®¢æˆ·ä¾¿æ— æ³•åœ¨å°ç¨‹åºè¿›è¡Œä¸‹å•æ“ä½œã€‚

ç‚¹å‡»è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€æŒ‰é’®æ—¶ï¼Œå¼¹å‡ºæ›´æ”¹è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€

é€‰æ‹©è¥ä¸šï¼Œè®¾ç½®é¤å…ä¸ºè¥ä¸šä¸­çŠ¶æ€

é€‰æ‹©æ‰“çƒŠï¼Œè®¾ç½®é¤å…ä¸ºæ‰“çƒŠä¸­çŠ¶æ€

çŠ¶æ€è¯´æ˜ï¼š

5.1.2 æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ â€‹

æ ¹æ®ä¸Šè¿°åŸå‹å›¾è®¾è®¡æ¥å£ï¼Œå…±åŒ…å«3ä¸ªæ¥å£ã€‚

æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ï¼š

  • è®¾ç½®è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€
  • ç®¡ç†ç«¯æŸ¥è¯¢è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€
  • ç”¨æˆ·ç«¯æŸ¥è¯¢è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€

**æ³¨ï¼š**ä»æŠ€æœ¯å±‚é¢åˆ†æï¼Œå…¶å®ç®¡ç†ç«¯å’Œç”¨æˆ·ç«¯æŸ¥è¯¢è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€æ—¶ï¼Œå¯é€šè¿‡ä¸€ä¸ªæ¥å£å»å®ç°å³å¯ã€‚å› ä¸ºè¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€æ˜¯ä¸€è‡´çš„ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œæœ¬é¡¹ç›®çº¦å®šï¼š

  • ç®¡ç†ç«¯å‘å‡ºçš„è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œç»Ÿä¸€ä½¿ç”¨/adminä½œä¸ºå‰ç¼€ã€‚
  • ç”¨æˆ·ç«¯å‘å‡ºçš„è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œç»Ÿä¸€ä½¿ç”¨/userä½œä¸ºå‰ç¼€ã€‚

å› ä¸ºè®¿é—®è·¯å¾„ä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œæ•…åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤ä¸ªæ¥å£å®ç°ã€‚

1). è®¾ç½®è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€

2). ç®¡ç†ç«¯è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€

3). ç”¨æˆ·ç«¯è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€

5.1.3 è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€å­˜å‚¨æ–¹å¼ â€‹

è™½ç„¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä¸€å¼ è¡¨æ¥å­˜å‚¨è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€æ•°æ®ï¼Œä½†æ•´ä¸ªè¡¨ä¸­åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå­—æ®µï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ„ä¹‰ä¸å¤§ã€‚

è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€æ•°æ®å­˜å‚¨æ–¹å¼ï¼šåŸºäºRedisçš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ¥è¿›è¡Œå­˜å‚¨

**çº¦å®šï¼š**1è¡¨ç¤ºè¥ä¸š 0è¡¨ç¤ºæ‰“çƒŠ

5.2 ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

5.2.1 è®¾ç½®è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€ â€‹

åœ¨sky-serveræ¨¡å—ä¸­ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºShopController.java

æ ¹æ®æ¥å£å®šä¹‰åˆ›å»ºShopControllerçš„setStatusè®¾ç½®è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
package com.sky.controller.admin;

import com.sky.result.Result;
import io.swagger.annotations.Api;
import io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation;
import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.data.redis.core.RedisTemplate;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PathVariable;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.PutMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;

@RestController("adminShopController")
@RequestMapping("/admin/shop")
@Api(tags = "åº—é“ºç›¸å…³æ¥å£")
@Slf4j
public class ShopController {

    public static final String KEY = "SHOP_STATUS";

    @Autowired
    private RedisTemplate redisTemplate;

    /**
     * è®¾ç½®åº—é“ºçš„è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€
     * @param status
     * @return
     */
    @PutMapping("/{status}")
    @ApiOperation("è®¾ç½®åº—é“ºçš„è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€")
    public Result setStatus(@PathVariable Integer status){
        log.info("è®¾ç½®åº—é“ºçš„è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€ä¸ºï¼š{}",status == 1 ? "è¥ä¸šä¸­" : "æ‰“çƒŠä¸­");
        redisTemplate.opsForValue().set(KEY,status);
        return Result.success();
    }
}

5.2.2 ç®¡ç†ç«¯æŸ¥è¯¢è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€ â€‹

æ ¹æ®æ¥å£å®šä¹‰åˆ›å»ºShopControllerçš„getStatusæŸ¥è¯¢è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * è·å–åº—é“ºçš„è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€
     * @return
     */
    @GetMapping("/status")
    @ApiOperation("è·å–åº—é“ºçš„è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€")
    public Result<Integer> getStatus(){
        Integer status = (Integer) redisTemplate.opsForValue().get(KEY);
        log.info("è·å–åˆ°åº—é“ºçš„è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€ä¸ºï¼š{}",status == 1 ? "è¥ä¸šä¸­" : "æ‰“çƒŠä¸­");
        return Result.success(status);
    }

5.2.3 ç”¨æˆ·ç«¯æŸ¥è¯¢è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€ â€‹

åˆ›å»ºcom.sky.controller.useråŒ…ï¼Œåœ¨è¯¥åŒ…ä¸‹åˆ›å»ºShopController.java

æ ¹æ®æ¥å£å®šä¹‰åˆ›å»ºShopControllerçš„getStatusæŸ¥è¯¢è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
package com.sky.controller.user;

import com.sky.result.Result;
import io.swagger.annotations.Api;
import io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation;
import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.data.redis.core.RedisTemplate;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;

@RestController("userShopController")
@RequestMapping("/user/shop")
@Api(tags = "åº—é“ºç›¸å…³æ¥å£")
@Slf4j
public class ShopController {

    public static final String KEY = "SHOP_STATUS";

    @Autowired
    private RedisTemplate redisTemplate;

    /**
     * è·å–åº—é“ºçš„è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€
     * @return
     */
    @GetMapping("/status")
    @ApiOperation("è·å–åº—é“ºçš„è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€")
    public Result<Integer> getStatus(){
        Integer status = (Integer) redisTemplate.opsForValue().get(KEY);
        log.info("è·å–åˆ°åº—é“ºçš„è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€ä¸ºï¼š{}",status == 1 ? "è¥ä¸šä¸­" : "æ‰“çƒŠä¸­");
        return Result.success(status);
    }
}

5.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

5.3.1 æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£æµ‹è¯• â€‹

**å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡ï¼š**è®¿é—®http://localhost:8080/doc.htmlï¼Œæ‰“å¼€åº—é“ºç›¸å…³æ¥å£

**æ³¨æ„ï¼š**ä½¿ç”¨adminç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•é‡æ–°è·å–tokenï¼Œé˜²æ­¢tokenå¤±æ•ˆã€‚

è®¾ç½®è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€ï¼š

ç‚¹å‡»å‘é€

æŸ¥çœ‹Ideaæ§åˆ¶å°æ—¥å¿—

æŸ¥çœ‹Redisä¸­æ•°æ®

ç®¡ç†ç«¯æŸ¥è¯¢è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€ï¼š

ç”¨æˆ·ç«¯æŸ¥è¯¢è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€ï¼š

5.3.2 æ¥å£åˆ†ç»„å±•ç¤º â€‹

åœ¨ä¸Šè¿°æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£æµ‹è¯•ä¸­ï¼Œç®¡ç†ç«¯å’Œç”¨æˆ·ç«¯çš„æ¥å£æ”¾åœ¨ä¸€èµ·ï¼Œä¸æ–¹ä¾¿åŒºåˆ†ã€‚

æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è¦å®ç°ç®¡ç†ç«¯å’Œç”¨æˆ·ç«¯æ¥å£è¿›è¡ŒåŒºåˆ†ã€‚

åœ¨WebMvcConfiguration.javaä¸­ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æ‰«æ"com.sky.controller.admin"å’Œ"com.sky.controller.user"è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªåŒ…ã€‚

java
	@Bean
    public Docket docket1(){
        log.info("å‡†å¤‡ç”Ÿæˆæ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£...");
        ApiInfo apiInfo = new ApiInfoBuilder()
                .title("è‹ç©¹å¤–å–é¡¹ç›®æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£")
                .version("2.0")
                .description("è‹ç©¹å¤–å–é¡¹ç›®æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£")
                .build();

        Docket docket = new Docket(DocumentationType.SWAGGER_2)
                .groupName("ç®¡ç†ç«¯æ¥å£")
                .apiInfo(apiInfo)
                .select()
                //æŒ‡å®šç”Ÿæˆæ¥å£éœ€è¦æ‰«æçš„åŒ…
                .apis(RequestHandlerSelectors.basePackage("com.sky.controller.admin"))
                .paths(PathSelectors.any())
                .build();

        return docket;
    }

    @Bean
    public Docket docket2(){
        log.info("å‡†å¤‡ç”Ÿæˆæ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£...");
        ApiInfo apiInfo = new ApiInfoBuilder()
                .title("è‹ç©¹å¤–å–é¡¹ç›®æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£")
                .version("2.0")
                .description("è‹ç©¹å¤–å–é¡¹ç›®æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£")
                .build();

        Docket docket = new Docket(DocumentationType.SWAGGER_2)
                .groupName("ç”¨æˆ·ç«¯æ¥å£")
                .apiInfo(apiInfo)
                .select()
                //æŒ‡å®šç”Ÿæˆæ¥å£éœ€è¦æ‰«æçš„åŒ…
                .apis(RequestHandlerSelectors.basePackage("com.sky.controller.user"))
                .paths(PathSelectors.any())
                .build();

        return docket;
    }

é‡å¯æœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œå†æ¬¡è®¿é—®æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œå¯è¿›è¡Œé€‰æ‹©ç”¨æˆ·ç«¯æ¥å£æˆ–è€…ç®¡ç†ç«¯æ¥å£

5.3.3 å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒæµ‹è¯• â€‹

å¯åŠ¨nginx,è®¿é—® http://localhost

è¿›å…¥åå°ï¼ŒçŠ¶æ€ä¸ºè¥ä¸šä¸­

ç‚¹å‡»è¥ä¸šçŠ¶æ€è®¾ç½®ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹çŠ¶æ€ä¸ºæ‰“çƒŠä¸­
