    /**
     * æ‹’å•
     *
     * @return
     */
    @PutMapping("/rejection")
    @ApiOperation("æ‹’å•")
    public Result rejection(@RequestBody OrdersRejectionDTO ordersRejectionDTO) throws Exception {
        orderService.rejection(ordersRejectionDTO);
        return Result.success();
    }

5.2.2 OrderService â€‹

java
    /**
     * æ‹’å•
     *
     * @param ordersRejectionDTO
     */
    void rejection(OrdersRejectionDTO ordersRejectionDTO) throws Exception;

5.2.3 OrderServiceImpl â€‹

java
	/**
     * æ‹’å•
     *
     * @param ordersRejectionDTO
     */
    public void rejection(OrdersRejectionDTO ordersRejectionDTO) throws Exception {
        // æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢è®¢å•
        Orders ordersDB = orderMapper.getById(ordersRejectionDTO.getId());

        // è®¢å•åªæœ‰å­˜åœ¨ä¸”çŠ¶æ€ä¸º2ï¼ˆå¾…æ¥å•ï¼‰æ‰å¯ä»¥æ‹’å•
        if (ordersDB == null || !ordersDB.getStatus().equals(Orders.TO_BE_CONFIRMED)) {
            throw new OrderBusinessException(MessageConstant.ORDER_STATUS_ERROR);
        }

        //æ”¯ä»˜çŠ¶æ€
        Integer payStatus = ordersDB.getPayStatus();
        if (payStatus == Orders.PAID) {
            //ç”¨æˆ·å·²æ”¯ä»˜ï¼Œéœ€è¦é€€æ¬¾
            String refund = weChatPayUtil.refund(
                    ordersDB.getNumber(),
                    ordersDB.getNumber(),
                    new BigDecimal(0.01),
                    new BigDecimal(0.01));
            log.info("ç”³è¯·é€€æ¬¾ï¼š{}", refund);
        }

        // æ‹’å•éœ€è¦é€€æ¬¾ï¼Œæ ¹æ®è®¢å•idæ›´æ–°è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€ã€æ‹’å•åŸå› ã€å–æ¶ˆæ—¶é—´
        Orders orders = new Orders();
        orders.setId(ordersDB.getId());
        orders.setStatus(Orders.CANCELLED);
        orders.setRejectionReason(ordersRejectionDTO.getRejectionReason());
        orders.setCancelTime(LocalDateTime.now());

        orderMapper.update(orders);
    }

5.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

ç•¥

6. å–æ¶ˆè®¢å• â€‹

6.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

äº§å“åŸå‹ï¼š

ä¸šåŠ¡è§„åˆ™ï¼š

  • å–æ¶ˆè®¢å•å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯å°†è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€ä¿®æ”¹ä¸ºâ€œå·²å–æ¶ˆâ€
  • å•†å®¶å–æ¶ˆè®¢å•æ—¶éœ€è¦æŒ‡å®šå–æ¶ˆåŸå› 
  • å•†å®¶å–æ¶ˆè®¢å•æ—¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœç”¨æˆ·å·²ç»å®Œæˆäº†æ”¯ä»˜ï¼Œéœ€è¦ä¸ºç”¨æˆ·é€€æ¬¾

æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ï¼šå‚è§æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£

6.2 ä»£ç å®ç° â€‹

6.2.1 admin/OrderController â€‹

java
    /**
     * å–æ¶ˆè®¢å•
     *
     * @return
     */
    @PutMapping("/cancel")
    @ApiOperation("å–æ¶ˆè®¢å•")
    public Result cancel(@RequestBody OrdersCancelDTO ordersCancelDTO) throws Exception {
        orderService.cancel(ordersCancelDTO);
        return Result.success();
    }

6.2.2 OrderService â€‹

java
    /**
     * å•†å®¶å–æ¶ˆè®¢å•
     *
     * @param ordersCancelDTO
     */
    void cancel(OrdersCancelDTO ordersCancelDTO) throws Exception;

6.2.3 OrderServiceImpl â€‹

java
	/**
     * å–æ¶ˆè®¢å•
     *
     * @param ordersCancelDTO
     */
    public void cancel(OrdersCancelDTO ordersCancelDTO) throws Exception {
        // æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢è®¢å•
        Orders ordersDB = orderMapper.getById(ordersCancelDTO.getId());

        //æ”¯ä»˜çŠ¶æ€
        Integer payStatus = ordersDB.getPayStatus();
        if (payStatus == 1) {
            //ç”¨æˆ·å·²æ”¯ä»˜ï¼Œéœ€è¦é€€æ¬¾
            String refund = weChatPayUtil.refund(
                    ordersDB.getNumber(),
                    ordersDB.getNumber(),
                    new BigDecimal(0.01),
                    new BigDecimal(0.01));
            log.info("ç”³è¯·é€€æ¬¾ï¼š{}", refund);
        }

        // ç®¡ç†ç«¯å–æ¶ˆè®¢å•éœ€è¦é€€æ¬¾ï¼Œæ ¹æ®è®¢å•idæ›´æ–°è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€ã€å–æ¶ˆåŸå› ã€å–æ¶ˆæ—¶é—´
        Orders orders = new Orders();
        orders.setId(ordersCancelDTO.getId());
        orders.setStatus(Orders.CANCELLED);
        orders.setCancelReason(ordersCancelDTO.getCancelReason());
        orders.setCancelTime(LocalDateTime.now());
        orderMapper.update(orders);
    }

6.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

ç•¥

7. æ´¾é€è®¢å• â€‹

7.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

äº§å“åŸå‹ï¼š

ä¸šåŠ¡è§„åˆ™ï¼š

  • æ´¾é€è®¢å•å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯å°†è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€ä¿®æ”¹ä¸ºâ€œæ´¾é€ä¸­â€
  • åªæœ‰çŠ¶æ€ä¸ºâ€œå¾…æ´¾é€â€çš„è®¢å•å¯ä»¥æ‰§è¡Œæ´¾é€è®¢å•æ“ä½œ

æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ï¼šå‚è§æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£

7.2 ä»£ç å®ç° â€‹

7.2.1 admin/OrderController â€‹

java
    /**
     * æ´¾é€è®¢å•
     *
     * @return
     */
    @PutMapping("/delivery/{id}")
    @ApiOperation("æ´¾é€è®¢å•")
    public Result delivery(@PathVariable("id") Long id) {
        orderService.delivery(id);
        return Result.success();
    }

7.2.2 OrderService â€‹

java
    /**
     * æ´¾é€è®¢å•
     *
     * @param id
     */
    void delivery(Long id);

7.2.3 OrderServiceImpl â€‹

java
    /**
     * æ´¾é€è®¢å•
     *
     * @param id
     */
    public void delivery(Long id) {
        // æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢è®¢å•
        Orders ordersDB = orderMapper.getById(id);

        // æ ¡éªŒè®¢å•æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”çŠ¶æ€ä¸º3
        if (ordersDB == null || !ordersDB.getStatus().equals(Orders.CONFIRMED)) {
            throw new OrderBusinessException(MessageConstant.ORDER_STATUS_ERROR);
        }

        Orders orders = new Orders();
        orders.setId(ordersDB.getId());
        // æ›´æ–°è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€,çŠ¶æ€è½¬ä¸ºæ´¾é€ä¸­
        orders.setStatus(Orders.DELIVERY_IN_PROGRESS);

        orderMapper.update(orders);
    }

7.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

ç•¥

8. å®Œæˆè®¢å• â€‹

8.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

äº§å“åŸå‹ï¼š

ä¸šåŠ¡è§„åˆ™ï¼š

  • å®Œæˆè®¢å•å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯å°†è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€ä¿®æ”¹ä¸ºâ€œå·²å®Œæˆâ€
  • åªæœ‰çŠ¶æ€ä¸ºâ€œæ´¾é€ä¸­â€çš„è®¢å•å¯ä»¥æ‰§è¡Œè®¢å•å®Œæˆæ“ä½œ

æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ï¼šå‚è§æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£

8.2 ä»£ç å®ç° â€‹

8.2.1 admin/OrderController â€‹

java
    /**
     * å®Œæˆè®¢å•
     *
     * @return
     */
    @PutMapping("/complete/{id}")
    @ApiOperation("å®Œæˆè®¢å•")
    public Result complete(@PathVariable("id") Long id) {
        orderService.complete(id);
        return Result.success();
    }

8.2.2 OrderService â€‹

java
    /**
     * å®Œæˆè®¢å•
     *
     * @param id
     */
    void complete(Long id);

8.2.3 OrderServiceImpl â€‹

java
    /**
     * å®Œæˆè®¢å•
     *
     * @param id
     */
    public void complete(Long id) {
        // æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢è®¢å•
        Orders ordersDB = orderMapper.getById(id);

        // æ ¡éªŒè®¢å•æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”çŠ¶æ€ä¸º4
        if (ordersDB == null || !ordersDB.getStatus().equals(Orders.DELIVERY_IN_PROGRESS)) {
            throw new OrderBusinessException(MessageConstant.ORDER_STATUS_ERROR);
        }

        Orders orders = new Orders();
        orders.setId(ordersDB.getId());
        // æ›´æ–°è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€,çŠ¶æ€è½¬ä¸ºå®Œæˆ
        orders.setStatus(Orders.COMPLETED);
        orders.setDeliveryTime(LocalDateTime.now());

        orderMapper.update(orders);
    }

8.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

ç•¥

åä¸€ã€è‹ç©¹å¤–å–-æ ¡éªŒæ”¶è´§åœ°å€æ˜¯å¦è¶…å‡ºé…é€èŒƒå›´ â€‹

æ›´æ–°: 2025/4/11 å­—æ•°: 0 å­— æ—¶é•¿: 0 åˆ†é’Ÿ

1. ç¯å¢ƒå‡†å¤‡ â€‹

æ³¨å†Œè´¦å·ï¼šhttps://passport.baidu.com/v2/?reg&tt=1671699340600&overseas=&gid=CF954C2-A3D2-417F-9FE6-B0F249ED7E33&tpl=pp&u=https%3A%2F%2Flbsyun.baidu.com%2Findex.php%3Ftitle%3Dé¦–é¡µ

ç™»å½•ç™¾åº¦åœ°å›¾å¼€æ”¾å¹³å°ï¼šhttps://lbsyun.baidu.com/

è¿›å…¥æ§åˆ¶å°ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºåº”ç”¨ï¼Œè·å–AKï¼š

ç›¸å…³æ¥å£:

https://lbsyun.baidu.com/index.php?title=webapi/guide/webservice-geocoding

https://lbsyun.baidu.com/index.php?title=webapi/directionlite-v1

2. ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

2.1 application.yml â€‹

é…ç½®å¤–å–å•†å®¶åº—é“ºåœ°å€å’Œç™¾åº¦åœ°å›¾çš„AKï¼š

2.2 OrderServiceImpl â€‹

æ”¹é€ OrderServiceImplï¼Œæ³¨å…¥ä¸Šé¢çš„é…ç½®é¡¹ï¼š

java
    @Value("${sky.shop.address}")
    private String shopAddress;

    @Value("${sky.baidu.ak}")
    private String ak;

åœ¨OrderServiceImplä¸­æä¾›æ ¡éªŒæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
/**
     * æ£€æŸ¥å®¢æˆ·çš„æ”¶è´§åœ°å€æ˜¯å¦è¶…å‡ºé…é€èŒƒå›´
     * @param address
     */
    private void checkOutOfRange(String address) {
        Map map = new HashMap();
        map.put("address",shopAddress);
        map.put("output","json");
        map.put("ak",ak);

        //è·å–åº—é“ºçš„ç»çº¬åº¦åæ ‡
        String shopCoordinate = HttpClientUtil.doGet("https://api.map.baidu.com/geocoding/v3", map);

        JSONObject jsonObject = JSON.parseObject(shopCoordinate);
        if(!jsonObject.getString("status").equals("0")){
            throw new OrderBusinessException("åº—é“ºåœ°å€è§£æå¤±è´¥");
        }

        //æ•°æ®è§£æ
        JSONObject location = jsonObject.getJSONObject("result").getJSONObject("location");
        String lat = location.getString("lat");
        String lng = location.getString("lng");
        //åº—é“ºç»çº¬åº¦åæ ‡
        String shopLngLat = lat + "," + lng;

        map.put("address",address);
        //è·å–ç”¨æˆ·æ”¶è´§åœ°å€çš„ç»çº¬åº¦åæ ‡
        String userCoordinate = HttpClientUtil.doGet("https://api.map.baidu.com/geocoding/v3", map);

        jsonObject = JSON.parseObject(userCoordinate);
        if(!jsonObject.getString("status").equals("0")){
            throw new OrderBusinessException("æ”¶è´§åœ°å€è§£æå¤±è´¥");
        }

        //æ•°æ®è§£æ
        location = jsonObject.getJSONObject("result").getJSONObject("location");
        lat = location.getString("lat");
        lng = location.getString("lng");
        //ç”¨æˆ·æ”¶è´§åœ°å€ç»çº¬åº¦åæ ‡
        String userLngLat = lat + "," + lng;

        map.put("origin",shopLngLat);
        map.put("destination",userLngLat);
        map.put("steps_info","0");

        //è·¯çº¿è§„åˆ’
        String json = HttpClientUtil.doGet("https://api.map.baidu.com/directionlite/v1/driving", map);

        jsonObject = JSON.parseObject(json);
        if(!jsonObject.getString("status").equals("0")){
            throw new OrderBusinessException("é…é€è·¯çº¿è§„åˆ’å¤±è´¥");
        }

        //æ•°æ®è§£æ
        JSONObject result = jsonObject.getJSONObject("result");
        JSONArray jsonArray = (JSONArray) result.get("routes");
        Integer distance = (Integer) ((JSONObject) jsonArray.get(0)).get("distance");

        if(distance > 5000){
            //é…é€è·ç¦»è¶…è¿‡5000ç±³
            throw new OrderBusinessException("è¶…å‡ºé…é€èŒƒå›´");
        }
    }

åœ¨OrderServiceImplçš„submitOrderæ–¹æ³•ä¸­è°ƒç”¨ä¸Šé¢çš„æ ¡éªŒæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

åäºŒã€è‹ç©¹å¤–å–-SpringTaskå’ŒWebSocket(æ¥å•æé†’å’Œå®¢æˆ·å‚¬å•) â€‹

æ›´æ–°: 2025/4/11 å­—æ•°: 0 å­— æ—¶é•¿: 0 åˆ†é’Ÿ

è¯¾ç¨‹å†…å®¹ â€‹

  • Spring Task
  • è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€å®šæ—¶å¤„ç†
  • WebSocket
  • æ¥å•æé†’
  • å®¢æˆ·å‚¬å•

åŠŸèƒ½å®ç°ï¼šè®¢å•çŠ¶æ€å®šæ—¶å¤„ç†ã€æ¥å•æé†’å’Œå®¢æˆ·å‚¬å•

è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€å®šæ—¶å¤„ç†ï¼š

æ¥å•æé†’ï¼š

å®¢æˆ·å‚¬å•ï¼š

1. Spring Task â€‹

1.1 ä»‹ç» â€‹

Spring Task æ˜¯Springæ¡†æ¶æä¾›çš„ä»»åŠ¡è°ƒåº¦å·¥å…·ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æŒ‰ç…§çº¦å®šçš„æ—¶é—´è‡ªåŠ¨æ‰§è¡ŒæŸä¸ªä»£ç é€»è¾‘ã€‚

**å®šä½ï¼š**å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡æ¡†æ¶

ä½œç”¨ï¼šå®šæ—¶è‡ªåŠ¨æ‰§è¡ŒæŸæ®µJavaä»£ç 

ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¦åœ¨Javaç¨‹åºä¸­ä½¿ç”¨Spring Taskï¼Ÿ

åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯ï¼š

1). ä¿¡ç”¨å¡æ¯æœˆè¿˜æ¬¾æé†’

2). é“¶è¡Œè´·æ¬¾æ¯æœˆè¿˜æ¬¾æé†’

3). ç«è½¦ç¥¨å”®ç¥¨ç³»ç»Ÿå¤„ç†æœªæ”¯ä»˜è®¢å•

4). å…¥èŒçºªå¿µæ—¥ä¸ºç”¨æˆ·å‘é€é€šçŸ¥

**å¼ºè°ƒï¼š**åªè¦æ˜¯éœ€è¦å®šæ—¶å¤„ç†çš„åœºæ™¯éƒ½å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨Spring Task

1.2 è¡¨è¾¾å¼ â€‹

cronè¡¨è¾¾å¼å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œé€šè¿‡cronè¡¨è¾¾å¼å¯ä»¥å®šä¹‰ä»»åŠ¡è§¦å‘çš„æ—¶é—´

**æ„æˆè§„åˆ™ï¼š**åˆ†ä¸º6æˆ–7ä¸ªåŸŸï¼Œç”±ç©ºæ ¼åˆ†éš”å¼€ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªåŸŸä»£è¡¨ä¸€ä¸ªå«ä¹‰

æ¯ä¸ªåŸŸçš„å«ä¹‰åˆ†åˆ«ä¸ºï¼šç§’ã€åˆ†é’Ÿã€å°æ—¶ã€æ—¥ã€æœˆã€å‘¨ã€å¹´(å¯é€‰)

ä¸¾ä¾‹ï¼š

2022å¹´10æœˆ12æ—¥ä¸Šåˆ9ç‚¹æ•´ å¯¹åº”çš„cronè¡¨è¾¾å¼ä¸ºï¼š0 0 9 12 10 ? 2022

è¯´æ˜ï¼šä¸€èˆ¬æ—¥å’Œå‘¨çš„å€¼ä¸åŒæ—¶è®¾ç½®ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªè®¾ç½®ï¼Œå¦ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨ï¼Ÿè¡¨ç¤ºã€‚

**æ¯”å¦‚ï¼š**æè¿°2æœˆä»½çš„æœ€åä¸€å¤©ï¼Œæœ€åä¸€å¤©å…·ä½“æ˜¯å‡ å·å‘¢ï¼Ÿå¯èƒ½æ˜¯28å·ï¼Œä¹Ÿæœ‰å¯èƒ½æ˜¯29å·ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å°±ä¸èƒ½å†™å…·ä½“æ•°å­—ã€‚

ä¸ºäº†æè¿°è¿™äº›ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œæä¾›ä¸€äº›ç‰¹æ®Šçš„å­—ç¬¦ã€‚è¿™äº›å…·ä½“çš„ç»†èŠ‚ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°±ä¸ç”¨è‡ªå·±å»æ‰‹å†™ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¿™ä¸ªcronè¡¨è¾¾å¼ï¼Œå®ƒå…¶å®æœ‰åœ¨çº¿ç”Ÿæˆå™¨ã€‚

cronè¡¨è¾¾å¼åœ¨çº¿ç”Ÿæˆå™¨ï¼šhttps://cron.qqe2.com/

å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªç½‘ç«™ä¸Šé¢ï¼Œåªè¦æ ¹æ®è‡ªå·±çš„è¦æ±‚å»ç”Ÿæˆcornè¡¨è¾¾å¼å³å¯ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥ä¸€èˆ¬å°±ä¸ç”¨è‡ªå·±å»ç¼–å†™è¿™ä¸ªè¡¨è¾¾å¼ã€‚

é€šé…ç¬¦ï¼š

* è¡¨ç¤ºæ‰€æœ‰å€¼ï¼›

? è¡¨ç¤ºæœªè¯´æ˜çš„å€¼ï¼Œå³ä¸å…³å¿ƒå®ƒä¸ºä½•å€¼ï¼›

- è¡¨ç¤ºä¸€ä¸ªæŒ‡å®šçš„èŒƒå›´ï¼›

, è¡¨ç¤ºé™„åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå¯èƒ½å€¼ï¼›

/ ç¬¦å·å‰è¡¨ç¤ºå¼€å§‹æ—¶é—´ï¼Œç¬¦å·åè¡¨ç¤ºæ¯æ¬¡é€’å¢çš„å€¼ï¼›

cronè¡¨è¾¾å¼æ¡ˆä¾‹ï¼š

*/5 * * * * ? æ¯éš”5ç§’æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡

0 */1 * * * ? æ¯éš”1åˆ†é’Ÿæ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡

0 0 5-15 * * ? æ¯å¤©5-15ç‚¹æ•´ç‚¹è§¦å‘

0 0/3 * * * ? æ¯ä¸‰åˆ†é’Ÿè§¦å‘ä¸€æ¬¡

0 0-5 14 * * ? åœ¨æ¯å¤©ä¸‹åˆ2ç‚¹åˆ°ä¸‹åˆ2:05æœŸé—´çš„æ¯1åˆ†é’Ÿè§¦å‘

0 0/5 14 * * ? åœ¨æ¯å¤©ä¸‹åˆ2ç‚¹åˆ°ä¸‹åˆ2:55æœŸé—´çš„æ¯5åˆ†é’Ÿè§¦å‘

0 0/5 14,18 * * ? åœ¨æ¯å¤©ä¸‹åˆ2ç‚¹åˆ°2:55æœŸé—´å’Œä¸‹åˆ6ç‚¹åˆ°6:55æœŸé—´çš„æ¯5åˆ†é’Ÿè§¦å‘

0 0/30 9-17 * * ? æœä¹æ™šäº”å·¥ä½œæ—¶é—´å†…æ¯åŠå°æ—¶

0 0 10,14,16 * * ? æ¯å¤©ä¸Šåˆ10ç‚¹ï¼Œä¸‹åˆ2ç‚¹ï¼Œ4ç‚¹

1.3 å…¥é—¨æ¡ˆä¾‹ â€‹

1.3.1 Spring Taskä½¿ç”¨æ­¥éª¤ â€‹

1). å¯¼å…¥mavenåæ ‡ spring-contextï¼ˆå·²å­˜åœ¨ï¼‰

2). å¯åŠ¨ç±»æ·»åŠ æ³¨è§£ @EnableScheduling å¼€å¯ä»»åŠ¡è°ƒåº¦

3). è‡ªå®šä¹‰å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡ç±»

1.3.2 ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

ç¼–å†™å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡ç±»ï¼š

è¿›å…¥sky-serveræ¨¡å—ä¸­

java
package com.sky.task;

import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.springframework.scheduling.annotation.Scheduled;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

import java.util.Date;

/**
 * è‡ªå®šä¹‰å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡ç±»
 */
@Component
@Slf4j
public class MyTask {

    /**
     * å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡ æ¯éš”5ç§’è§¦å‘ä¸€æ¬¡
     */
    @Scheduled(cron = "0/5 * * * * ?")
    public void executeTask(){
        log.info("å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡å¼€å§‹æ‰§è¡Œï¼š{}",new Date());
    }
}

å¼€å¯ä»»åŠ¡è°ƒåº¦ï¼š

å¯åŠ¨ç±»æ·»åŠ æ³¨è§£ @EnableScheduling

java
package com.sky;

import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.springframework.boot.SpringApplication;
import org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.SpringBootApplication;
import org.springframework.cache.annotation.EnableCaching;
import org.springframework.scheduling.annotation.EnableScheduling;
import org.springframework.transaction.annotation.EnableTransactionManagement;

@SpringBootApplication
@EnableTransactionManagement //å¼€å¯æ³¨è§£æ–¹å¼çš„äº‹åŠ¡ç®¡ç†
@Slf4j
@EnableCaching
@EnableScheduling
public class SkyApplication {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        SpringApplication.run(SkyApplication.class, args);
        log.info("server started");
    }
}

1.3.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹æ—¥å¿—

æ¯éš”5ç§’æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚

2.è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€å®šæ—¶å¤„ç† â€‹

2.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æ â€‹

ç”¨æˆ·ä¸‹å•åå¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨çš„æƒ…å†µï¼š

  • ä¸‹å•åæœªæ”¯ä»˜ï¼Œè®¢å•ä¸€ç›´å¤„äº**â€œå¾…æ”¯ä»˜â€**çŠ¶æ€
  • ç”¨æˆ·æ”¶è´§åç®¡ç†ç«¯æœªç‚¹å‡»å®ŒæˆæŒ‰é’®ï¼Œè®¢å•ä¸€ç›´å¤„äº**â€œæ´¾é€ä¸­â€**çŠ¶æ€

æ”¯ä»˜è¶…æ—¶çš„è®¢å•å¦‚ä½•å¤„ç†ï¼Ÿ æ´¾é€ä¸­çš„è®¢å•ä¸€ç›´ä¸ç‚¹å‡»å®Œæˆå¦‚ä½•å¤„ç†ï¼Ÿ

å¯¹äºä¸Šé¢ä¸¤ç§æƒ…å†µéœ€è¦é€šè¿‡å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡æ¥ä¿®æ”¹è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå…·ä½“é€»è¾‘ä¸ºï¼š

  • é€šè¿‡å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡æ¯åˆ†é’Ÿæ£€æŸ¥ä¸€æ¬¡æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨æ”¯ä»˜è¶…æ—¶è®¢å•ï¼ˆä¸‹å•åè¶…è¿‡15åˆ†é’Ÿä»æœªæ”¯ä»˜åˆ™åˆ¤å®šä¸ºæ”¯ä»˜è¶…æ—¶è®¢å•ï¼‰ï¼Œå¦‚æœå­˜åœ¨åˆ™ä¿®æ”¹è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€ä¸ºâ€œå·²å–æ¶ˆâ€
  • é€šè¿‡å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡æ¯å¤©å‡Œæ™¨1ç‚¹æ£€æŸ¥ä¸€æ¬¡æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨â€œæ´¾é€ä¸­â€çš„è®¢å•ï¼Œå¦‚æœå­˜åœ¨åˆ™ä¿®æ”¹è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€ä¸ºâ€œå·²å®Œæˆâ€

2.2 ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

1). è‡ªå®šä¹‰å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡ç±»OrderTaskï¼ˆå¾…å®Œå–„ï¼‰ï¼š

java
package com.sky.task;

/**
 * è‡ªå®šä¹‰å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œå®ç°è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€å®šæ—¶å¤„ç†
 */
@Component
@Slf4j
public class OrderTask {

    @Autowired
    private OrderMapper orderMapper;

    /**
     * å¤„ç†æ”¯ä»˜è¶…æ—¶è®¢å•
     */
    @Scheduled(cron = "0 * * * * ?")
    public void processTimeoutOrder(){
        log.info("å¤„ç†æ”¯ä»˜è¶…æ—¶è®¢å•ï¼š{}", new Date());
    }

    /**
     * å¤„ç†â€œæ´¾é€ä¸­â€çŠ¶æ€çš„è®¢å•
     */
    @Scheduled(cron = "0 0 1 * * ?")
    public void processDeliveryOrder(){
        log.info("å¤„ç†æ´¾é€ä¸­è®¢å•ï¼š{}", new Date());
    }

}

2). åœ¨OrderMapperæ¥å£ä¸­æ‰©å±•æ–¹æ³•:

java
	/**
     * æ ¹æ®çŠ¶æ€å’Œä¸‹å•æ—¶é—´æŸ¥è¯¢è®¢å•
     * @param status
     * @param orderTime
     */
    @Select("select * from orders where status = #{status} and order_time < #{orderTime}")
    List<Orders> getByStatusAndOrdertimeLT(Integer status, LocalDateTime orderTime);

3). å®Œå–„å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡ç±»çš„processTimeoutOrderæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * å¤„ç†æ”¯ä»˜è¶…æ—¶è®¢å•
     */
    @Scheduled(cron = "0 * * * * ?")
    public void processTimeoutOrder(){
        log.info("å¤„ç†æ”¯ä»˜è¶…æ—¶è®¢å•ï¼š{}", new Date());

        LocalDateTime time = LocalDateTime.now().plusMinutes(-15);

        // select * from orders where status = 1 and order_time < å½“å‰æ—¶é—´-15åˆ†é’Ÿ
        List<Orders> ordersList = orderMapper.getByStatusAndOrdertimeLT(Orders.PENDING_PAYMENT, time);
        if(ordersList != null && ordersList.size() > 0){
            ordersList.forEach(order -> {
                order.setStatus(Orders.CANCELLED);
                order.setCancelReason("æ”¯ä»˜è¶…æ—¶ï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨å–æ¶ˆ");
                order.setCancelTime(LocalDateTime.now());
                orderMapper.update(order);
            });
        }
    }

4). å®Œå–„å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡ç±»çš„processDeliveryOrderæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * å¤„ç†â€œæ´¾é€ä¸­â€çŠ¶æ€çš„è®¢å•
     */
    @Scheduled(cron = "0 0 1 * * ?")
    public void processDeliveryOrder(){
        log.info("å¤„ç†æ´¾é€ä¸­è®¢å•ï¼š{}", new Date());
        // select * from orders where status = 4 and order_time < å½“å‰æ—¶é—´-1å°æ—¶
        LocalDateTime time = LocalDateTime.now().plusMinutes(-60);
        List<Orders> ordersList = orderMapper.getByStatusAndOrdertimeLT(Orders.DELIVERY_IN_PROGRESS, time);

        if(ordersList != null && ordersList.size() > 0){
            ordersList.forEach(order -> {
                order.setStatus(Orders.COMPLETED);
                orderMapper.update(order);
            });
        }
    }

2.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å¦‚ä¸‹æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ï¼š

  • æŸ¥çœ‹æ§åˆ¶å°sql
  • æŸ¥çœ‹æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­æ•°æ®å˜åŒ–

æ”¯ä»˜è¶…æ—¶çš„è®¢å•æµ‹è¯•ï¼š

1). æŸ¥çœ‹è®¢å•è¡¨

æœ‰ä¸€æ¡è®¢å•ï¼ŒçŠ¶æ€ä¸º1ã€‚è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€ 1å¾…ä»˜æ¬¾ 2å¾…æ¥å• 3å·²æ¥å• 4æ´¾é€ä¸­ 5å·²å®Œæˆ 6å·²å–æ¶ˆ

2). å¼€å¯å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡

å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡ï¼Œè§‚å¯Ÿæ§åˆ¶å°æ—¥å¿—ã€‚å¤„ç†æ”¯ä»˜è¶…æ—¶è®¢å•ä»»åŠ¡æ¯éš”1åˆ†é’Ÿæ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚

3). å†æ¬¡æŸ¥çœ‹è®¢å•è¡¨

çŠ¶æ€å·²æ›´æ”¹ä¸º6ï¼Œå·²å–æ¶ˆã€‚

è¯æ˜å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡å·²ç”Ÿæ•ˆã€‚

å¤„ç†â€œæ´¾é€ä¸­â€çŠ¶æ€çš„è®¢å•ä»»åŠ¡æµ‹è¯•è‡ªå·²å®Œæˆï¼Œæµ‹è¯•æ­¥éª¤å’Œä¸Šè¿°ä¸€è‡´ã€‚å¯é€‚å½“ä¿®æ”¹cronè¡¨è¾¾å¼ï¼Œæ”¹å˜ä»»åŠ¡æ‰§è¡Œé¢‘ç‡ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿æµ‹è¯•ã€‚

3. WebSocket â€‹

3.1 ä»‹ç» â€‹

WebSocket æ˜¯åŸºäº TCP çš„ä¸€ç§æ–°çš„ç½‘ç»œåè®®ã€‚å®ƒå®ç°äº†æµè§ˆå™¨ä¸æœåŠ¡å™¨å…¨åŒå·¥é€šä¿¡â€”â€”æµè§ˆå™¨å’ŒæœåŠ¡å™¨åªéœ€è¦å®Œæˆä¸€æ¬¡æ¡æ‰‹ï¼Œä¸¤è€…ä¹‹é—´å°±å¯ä»¥åˆ›å»ºæŒä¹…æ€§çš„è¿æ¥ï¼Œ å¹¶è¿›è¡ŒåŒå‘æ•°æ®ä¼ è¾“ã€‚

HTTPåè®®å’ŒWebSocketåè®®å¯¹æ¯” â€‹

  • HTTPæ˜¯çŸ­è¿æ¥
  • WebSocketæ˜¯é•¿è¿æ¥
  • HTTPé€šä¿¡æ˜¯å•å‘çš„ï¼ŒåŸºäºè¯·æ±‚å“åº”æ¨¡å¼
  • WebSocketæ”¯æŒåŒå‘é€šä¿¡
  • HTTPå’ŒWebSocketåº•å±‚éƒ½æ˜¯TCPè¿æ¥

**æ€è€ƒï¼š**æ—¢ç„¶WebSocketæ”¯æŒåŒå‘é€šä¿¡ï¼ŒåŠŸèƒ½çœ‹ä¼¼æ¯”HTTPå¼ºå¤§ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯å¯ä»¥åŸºäºWebSocketå¼€å‘æ‰€æœ‰çš„ä¸šåŠ¡åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Ÿ

WebSocketç¼ºç‚¹ï¼š

  • æœåŠ¡å™¨é•¿æœŸç»´æŠ¤é•¿è¿æ¥éœ€è¦ä¸€å®šçš„æˆæœ¬

  • å„ä¸ªæµè§ˆå™¨æ”¯æŒç¨‹åº¦ä¸ä¸€

  • WebSocket æ˜¯é•¿è¿æ¥ï¼Œå—ç½‘ç»œé™åˆ¶æ¯”è¾ƒå¤§ï¼Œéœ€è¦å¤„ç†å¥½é‡è¿

**ç»“è®ºï¼š**WebSocketå¹¶ä¸èƒ½å®Œå…¨å–ä»£HTTPï¼Œå®ƒåªé€‚åˆåœ¨ç‰¹å®šçš„åœºæ™¯ä¸‹ä½¿ç”¨

WebSocketåº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯ï¼š

1). è§†é¢‘å¼¹å¹•

v

2). ç½‘é¡µèŠå¤©

3). ä½“è‚²å®å†µæ›´æ–°

4). è‚¡ç¥¨åŸºé‡‘æŠ¥ä»·å®æ—¶æ›´æ–°

3.2 å…¥é—¨æ¡ˆä¾‹ â€‹

3.2.1 æ¡ˆä¾‹åˆ†æ â€‹

**éœ€æ±‚ï¼š**å®ç°æµè§ˆå™¨ä¸æœåŠ¡å™¨å…¨åŒå·¥é€šä¿¡ã€‚æµè§ˆå™¨æ—¢å¯ä»¥å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼ŒæœåŠ¡å™¨ä¹Ÿå¯ä¸»åŠ¨å‘æµè§ˆå™¨æ¨é€æ¶ˆæ¯ã€‚

æ•ˆæœå±•ç¤ºï¼š

å®ç°æ­¥éª¤ï¼š

1). ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨websocket.htmlé¡µé¢ä½œä¸ºWebSocketå®¢æˆ·ç«¯

2). å¯¼å…¥WebSocketçš„mavenåæ ‡

3). å¯¼å…¥WebSocketæœåŠ¡ç«¯ç»„ä»¶WebSocketServerï¼Œç”¨äºå’Œå®¢æˆ·ç«¯é€šä¿¡

4). å¯¼å…¥é…ç½®ç±»WebSocketConfigurationï¼Œæ³¨å†ŒWebSocketçš„æœåŠ¡ç«¯ç»„ä»¶

5). å¯¼å…¥å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡ç±»WebSocketTaskï¼Œå®šæ—¶å‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ¨é€æ•°æ®

3.2.2 ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

1). å®šä¹‰websocket.htmlé¡µé¢(èµ„æ–™ä¸­å·²æä¾›)

html
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>WebSocket Demo</title>
</head>
    
<body>
    <input id="text" type="text" />
    <button onclick="send()">å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯</button>
    <button onclick="closeWebSocket()">å…³é—­è¿æ¥</button>
    <div id="message">
    </div>
</body>
<script type="text/javascript">
    var websocket = null;
    var clientId = Math.random().toString(36).substr(2);

    //åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰æµè§ˆå™¨æ˜¯å¦æ”¯æŒWebSocket
    if('WebSocket' in window){
        //è¿æ¥WebSocketèŠ‚ç‚¹
        websocket = new WebSocket("ws://localhost:8080/ws/"+clientId);
    }
    else{
        alert('Not support websocket')
    }

    //è¿æ¥å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯çš„å›è°ƒæ–¹æ³•
    websocket.onerror = function(){
        setMessageInnerHTML("error");
    };

    //è¿æ¥æˆåŠŸå»ºç«‹çš„å›è°ƒæ–¹æ³•
    websocket.onopen = function(){
        setMessageInnerHTML("è¿æ¥æˆåŠŸ");
    }

    //æ¥æ”¶åˆ°æ¶ˆæ¯çš„å›è°ƒæ–¹æ³•
    websocket.onmessage = function(event){
        setMessageInnerHTML(event.data);
    }

    //è¿æ¥å…³é—­çš„å›è°ƒæ–¹æ³•
    websocket.onclose = function(){
        setMessageInnerHTML("close");
    }

    //ç›‘å¬çª—å£å…³é—­äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œå½“çª—å£å…³é—­æ—¶ï¼Œä¸»åŠ¨å»å…³é—­websocketè¿æ¥ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢è¿æ¥è¿˜æ²¡æ–­å¼€å°±å…³é—­çª—å£ï¼Œserverç«¯ä¼šæŠ›å¼‚å¸¸ã€‚
    window.onbeforeunload = function(){
        websocket.close();
    }

    //å°†æ¶ˆæ¯æ˜¾ç¤ºåœ¨ç½‘é¡µä¸Š
    function setMessageInnerHTML(innerHTML){
        document.getElementById('message').innerHTML += innerHTML + '<br/>';
    }

    //å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯
    function send(){
        var message = document.getElementById('text').value;
        websocket.send(message);
    }
	
	//å…³é—­è¿æ¥
    function closeWebSocket() {
        websocket.close();
    }
</script>
</html>

2). å¯¼å…¥mavenåæ ‡

åœ¨sky-serveræ¨¡å—pom.xmlä¸­å·²å®šä¹‰

xml
<dependency>
	<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
	<artifactId>spring-boot-starter-websocket</artifactId>
</dependency>

3). å®šä¹‰WebSocketæœåŠ¡ç«¯ç»„ä»¶(èµ„æ–™ä¸­å·²æä¾›)

ç›´æ¥å¯¼å…¥åˆ°sky-serveræ¨¡å—å³å¯

java
package com.sky.websocket;

import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
import javax.websocket.OnClose;
import javax.websocket.OnMessage;
import javax.websocket.OnOpen;
import javax.websocket.Session;
import javax.websocket.server.PathParam;
import javax.websocket.server.ServerEndpoint;
import java.util.Collection;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;

/**
 * WebSocketæœåŠ¡
 */
@Component
@ServerEndpoint("/ws/{sid}")
public class WebSocketServer {

    //å­˜æ”¾ä¼šè¯å¯¹è±¡
    private static Map<String, Session> sessionMap = new HashMap();

    /**
     * è¿æ¥å»ºç«‹æˆåŠŸè°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•
     */
    @OnOpen
    public void onOpen(Session session, @PathParam("sid") String sid) {
        System.out.println("å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼š" + sid + "å»ºç«‹è¿æ¥");
        sessionMap.put(sid, session);
    }

    /**
     * æ”¶åˆ°å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ¶ˆæ¯åè°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•
     *
     * @param message å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€è¿‡æ¥çš„æ¶ˆæ¯
     */
    @OnMessage
    public void onMessage(String message, @PathParam("sid") String sid) {
        System.out.println("æ”¶åˆ°æ¥è‡ªå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼š" + sid + "çš„ä¿¡æ¯:" + message);
    }

    /**
     * è¿æ¥å…³é—­è°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•
     *
     * @param sid
     */
    @OnClose
    public void onClose(@PathParam("sid") String sid) {
        System.out.println("è¿æ¥æ–­å¼€:" + sid);
        sessionMap.remove(sid);
    }

    /**
     * ç¾¤å‘
     *
     * @param message
     */
    public void sendToAllClient(String message) {
        Collection<Session> sessions = sessionMap.values();
        for (Session session : sessions) {
            try {
                //æœåŠ¡å™¨å‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯
                session.getBasicRemote().sendText(message);
            } catch (Exception e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

}

4). å®šä¹‰é…ç½®ç±»ï¼Œæ³¨å†ŒWebSocketçš„æœåŠ¡ç«¯ç»„ä»¶(ä»èµ„æ–™ä¸­ç›´æ¥å¯¼å…¥å³å¯)

java
package com.sky.config;

import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
import org.springframework.web.socket.server.standard.ServerEndpointExporter;

/**
 * WebSocketé…ç½®ç±»ï¼Œç”¨äºæ³¨å†ŒWebSocketçš„Bean
 */
@Configuration
public class WebSocketConfiguration {

    @Bean
    public ServerEndpointExporter serverEndpointExporter() {
        return new ServerEndpointExporter();
    }

}

5). å®šä¹‰å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡ç±»ï¼Œå®šæ—¶å‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ¨é€æ•°æ®(ä»èµ„æ–™ä¸­ç›´æ¥å¯¼å…¥å³å¯)

java
package com.sky.task;

import com.sky.websocket.WebSocketServer;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.scheduling.annotation.Scheduled;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
import java.time.LocalDateTime;
import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;

@Component
public class WebSocketTask {
    @Autowired
    private WebSocketServer webSocketServer;

    /**
     * é€šè¿‡WebSocketæ¯éš”5ç§’å‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯
     */
    @Scheduled(cron = "0/5 * * * * ?")
    public void sendMessageToClient() {
        webSocketServer.sendToAllClient("è¿™æ˜¯æ¥è‡ªæœåŠ¡ç«¯çš„æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼š" + DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("HH:mm:ss").format(LocalDateTime.now()));
    }
}

3.2.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡ï¼Œæ‰“å¼€websocket.htmlé¡µé¢

æµè§ˆå™¨å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨å‘é€æ•°æ®ï¼š

æœåŠ¡å™¨å‘æµè§ˆå™¨é—´éš”5ç§’æ¨é€æ•°æ®ï¼š

4. æ¥å•æé†’ â€‹

4.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

ç”¨æˆ·ä¸‹å•å¹¶ä¸”æ”¯ä»˜æˆåŠŸåï¼Œéœ€è¦ç¬¬ä¸€æ—¶é—´é€šçŸ¥å¤–å–å•†å®¶ã€‚é€šçŸ¥çš„å½¢å¼æœ‰å¦‚ä¸‹ä¸¤ç§ï¼š

  • è¯­éŸ³æ’­æŠ¥
  • å¼¹å‡ºæç¤ºæ¡†

è®¾è®¡æ€è·¯ï¼š

  • é€šè¿‡WebSocketå®ç°ç®¡ç†ç«¯é¡µé¢å’ŒæœåŠ¡ç«¯ä¿æŒé•¿è¿æ¥çŠ¶æ€
  • å½“å®¢æˆ·æ”¯ä»˜åï¼Œè°ƒç”¨WebSocketçš„ç›¸å…³APIå®ç°æœåŠ¡ç«¯å‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ¨é€æ¶ˆæ¯
  • å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµè§ˆå™¨è§£ææœåŠ¡ç«¯æ¨é€çš„æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯æ¥å•æé†’è¿˜æ˜¯å®¢æˆ·å‚¬å•ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œç›¸åº”çš„æ¶ˆæ¯æç¤ºå’Œè¯­éŸ³æ’­æŠ¥
  • çº¦å®šæœåŠ¡ç«¯å‘é€ç»™å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµè§ˆå™¨çš„æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ä¸ºJSONï¼Œå­—æ®µåŒ…æ‹¬ï¼štypeï¼ŒorderIdï¼Œcontent
    • type ä¸ºæ¶ˆæ¯ç±»å‹ï¼Œ1ä¸ºæ¥å•æé†’ 2ä¸ºå®¢æˆ·å‚¬å•
    • orderId ä¸ºè®¢å•id
    • content ä¸ºæ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹

4.2 ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

åœ¨OrderServiceImplä¸­æ³¨å…¥WebSocketServerå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹paySuccessæ–¹æ³•ï¼ŒåŠ å…¥å¦‚ä¸‹ä»£ç ï¼š

java
	@Autowired
    private WebSocketServer webSocketServer;
	/**
     * æ”¯ä»˜æˆåŠŸï¼Œä¿®æ”¹è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€
     *
     * @param outTradeNo
     */
    public void paySuccess(String outTradeNo) {
        // å½“å‰ç™»å½•ç”¨æˆ·id
        Long userId = BaseContext.getCurrentId();

        // æ ¹æ®è®¢å•å·æŸ¥è¯¢å½“å‰ç”¨æˆ·çš„è®¢å•
        Orders ordersDB = orderMapper.getByNumberAndUserId(outTradeNo, userId);

        // æ ¹æ®è®¢å•idæ›´æ–°è®¢å•çš„çŠ¶æ€ã€æ”¯ä»˜æ–¹å¼ã€æ”¯ä»˜çŠ¶æ€ã€ç»“è´¦æ—¶é—´
        Orders orders = Orders.builder()
                .id(ordersDB.getId())
                .status(Orders.TO_BE_CONFIRMED)
                .payStatus(Orders.PAID)
                .checkoutTime(LocalDateTime.now())
                .build();

        orderMapper.update(orders);
	  //é€šè¿‡websocketå‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµè§ˆå™¨æ¨é€æ¶ˆæ¯type orderId content
        Map map = new HashMap();
        map.put("type", 1);//æ¶ˆæ¯ç±»å‹ï¼Œ1è¡¨ç¤ºæ¥å•æé†’
        map.put("orderId", orders.getId());
        map.put("content", "è®¢å•å·ï¼š" + outTradeNo);

        String json= JSON.toJSONString(map);
    
        //é€šè¿‡WebSocketå®ç°æ¥å•æé†’ï¼Œå‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµè§ˆå™¨æ¨é€æ¶ˆæ¯
        webSocketServer.sendToAllClient(json);
    }

4.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å¦‚ä¸‹æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ï¼š

  • æŸ¥çœ‹æµè§ˆå™¨è°ƒè¯•å·¥å…·æ•°æ®äº¤äº’è¿‡ç¨‹
  • å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒ

1). ç™»å½•ç®¡ç†ç«¯åå°

ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸåï¼Œæµè§ˆå™¨ä¸æœåŠ¡å™¨å»ºç«‹é•¿è¿æ¥

æŸ¥çœ‹æ§åˆ¶å°æ—¥å¿—

2). å°ç¨‹åºç«¯ä¸‹å•æ”¯ä»˜

ä¿®æ”¹å›è°ƒåœ°å€ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨å†…ç½‘ç©¿é€è·å–åŸŸå

ä¸‹å•æ”¯ä»˜

3). æŸ¥çœ‹æ¥å•æé†’

æ”¯ä»˜æˆåŠŸåï¼Œåå°æ”¶åˆ°æ¥å•æé†’ï¼Œå¹¶æœ‰è¯­éŸ³æ’­æŠ¥

4.4 ä»£ç æäº¤ â€‹

åç»­æ­¥éª¤å’Œå…¶å®ƒåŠŸèƒ½ä»£ç æäº¤ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œä¸å†èµ˜è¿°ã€‚

5. å®¢æˆ·å‚¬å• â€‹

5.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

ç”¨æˆ·åœ¨å°ç¨‹åºä¸­ç‚¹å‡»å‚¬å•æŒ‰é’®åï¼Œéœ€è¦ç¬¬ä¸€æ—¶é—´é€šçŸ¥å¤–å–å•†å®¶ã€‚é€šçŸ¥çš„å½¢å¼æœ‰å¦‚ä¸‹ä¸¤ç§ï¼š

  • è¯­éŸ³æ’­æŠ¥
  • å¼¹å‡ºæç¤ºæ¡†

è®¾è®¡æ€è·¯ï¼š

  • é€šè¿‡WebSocketå®ç°ç®¡ç†ç«¯é¡µé¢å’ŒæœåŠ¡ç«¯ä¿æŒé•¿è¿æ¥çŠ¶æ€
  • å½“ç”¨æˆ·ç‚¹å‡»å‚¬å•æŒ‰é’®åï¼Œè°ƒç”¨WebSocketçš„ç›¸å…³APIå®ç°æœåŠ¡ç«¯å‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ¨é€æ¶ˆæ¯
  • å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµè§ˆå™¨è§£ææœåŠ¡ç«¯æ¨é€çš„æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯æ¥å•æé†’è¿˜æ˜¯å®¢æˆ·å‚¬å•ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œç›¸åº”çš„æ¶ˆæ¯æç¤ºå’Œè¯­éŸ³æ’­æŠ¥ çº¦å®šæœåŠ¡ç«¯å‘é€ç»™å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµè§ˆå™¨çš„æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ä¸ºJSONï¼Œå­—æ®µåŒ…æ‹¬ï¼štypeï¼ŒorderIdï¼Œcontent
    • type ä¸ºæ¶ˆæ¯ç±»å‹ï¼Œ1ä¸ºæ¥å•æé†’ 2ä¸ºå®¢æˆ·å‚¬å•
    • orderId ä¸ºè®¢å•id
    • content ä¸ºæ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹

å½“ç”¨æˆ·ç‚¹å‡»å‚¬å•æŒ‰é’®æ—¶ï¼Œå‘æœåŠ¡ç«¯å‘é€è¯·æ±‚ã€‚

æ¥å£è®¾è®¡(å‚¬å•)ï¼š

5.2 ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

5.2.1 Controllerå±‚ â€‹

æ ¹æ®ç”¨æˆ·å‚¬å•çš„æ¥å£å®šä¹‰ï¼Œåœ¨user/OrderControllerä¸­åˆ›å»ºå‚¬å•æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * ç”¨æˆ·å‚¬å•
     *
     * @param id
     * @return
     */
    @GetMapping("/reminder/{id}")
    @ApiOperation("ç”¨æˆ·å‚¬å•")
    public Result reminder(@PathVariable("id") Long id) {
        orderService.reminder(id);
        return Result.success();
    }

5.2.2 Serviceå±‚æ¥å£ â€‹

åœ¨OrderServiceæ¥å£ä¸­å£°æ˜reminderæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

     * ç”¨æˆ·å‚¬å•

5.2.3 Serviceå±‚å®ç°ç±» â€‹

åœ¨OrderServiceImplä¸­å®ç°reminderæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * ç”¨æˆ·å‚¬å•
     *
     * @param id
     */
    public void reminder(Long id) {
        // æŸ¥è¯¢è®¢å•æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
        Orders orders = orderMapper.getById(id);
        if (orders == null) {
            throw new OrderBusinessException(MessageConstant.ORDER_NOT_FOUND);
        }

        //åŸºäºWebSocketå®ç°å‚¬å•
        Map map = new HashMap();
        map.put("type", 2);//2ä»£è¡¨ç”¨æˆ·å‚¬å•
        map.put("orderId", id);
        map.put("content", "è®¢å•å·ï¼š" + orders.getNumber());
        webSocketServer.sendToAllClient(JSON.toJSONString(map));
    }

5.2.4 Mapperå±‚

åœ¨OrderMapperä¸­æ·»åŠ getByIdï¼š

	/**
     * æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢è®¢å•
     * @param id
     */
    @Select("select * from orders where id=#{id}")
    Orders getById(Long id);

5.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å¦‚ä¸‹æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ï¼š

  • æŸ¥çœ‹æµè§ˆå™¨è°ƒè¯•å·¥å…·æ•°æ®äº¤äº’è¿‡ç¨‹
  • å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒ

1). ç™»å½•ç®¡ç†ç«¯åå°

2). ç”¨æˆ·è¿›è¡Œå‚¬å•

3). æŸ¥çœ‹å‚¬å•æé†’

æ—¢æœ‰å‚¬å•å¼¹çª—ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶è¯­éŸ³æ’­æŠ¥

5.4 ä»£ç æäº¤ â€‹

åç»­æ­¥éª¤å’Œå…¶å®ƒåŠŸèƒ½ä»£ç æäº¤ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œä¸å†èµ˜è¿°ã€‚

åä¸‰ã€è‹ç©¹å¤–å–-Apache ECharts(æŠ¥è¡¨ç»Ÿè®¡) â€‹

æ›´æ–°: 2025/4/11 å­—æ•°: 0 å­— æ—¶é•¿: 0 åˆ†é’Ÿ

è¯¾ç¨‹å†…å®¹ â€‹

  • Apache ECharts
  • è¥ä¸šé¢ç»Ÿè®¡
  • ç”¨æˆ·ç»Ÿè®¡
  • è®¢å•ç»Ÿè®¡
  • é”€é‡æ’åTop10

åŠŸèƒ½å®ç°ï¼šæ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡

æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡æ•ˆæœå›¾ï¼š

1. Apache ECharts â€‹

1.1 ä»‹ç» â€‹

Apache ECharts æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾åŸºäº Javascript çš„æ•°æ®å¯è§†åŒ–å›¾è¡¨åº“ï¼Œæä¾›ç›´è§‚ï¼Œç”ŸåŠ¨ï¼Œå¯äº¤äº’ï¼Œå¯ä¸ªæ€§åŒ–å®šåˆ¶çš„æ•°æ®å¯è§†åŒ–å›¾è¡¨ã€‚ å®˜ç½‘åœ°å€ï¼šhttps://echarts.apache.org/zh/index.html

å¸¸è§æ•ˆæœå±•ç¤ºï¼š

1). æŸ±å½¢å›¾

2). é¥¼å½¢å›¾

3). æŠ˜çº¿å›¾

**æ€»ç»“ï¼š**ä¸ç®¡æ˜¯å“ªç§å½¢å¼çš„å›¾å½¢ï¼Œæœ€æœ¬è´¨çš„ä¸œè¥¿å®é™…ä¸Šæ˜¯æ•°æ®ï¼Œå®ƒå…¶å®æ˜¯å¯¹æ•°æ®çš„ä¸€ç§å¯è§†åŒ–å±•ç¤ºã€‚

1.2 å…¥é—¨æ¡ˆä¾‹ â€‹

Apache Echartså®˜æ–¹æä¾›çš„å¿«é€Ÿå…¥é—¨ï¼šhttps://echarts.apache.org/handbook/zh/get-started/

æ•ˆæœå±•ç¤ºï¼š

å®ç°æ­¥éª¤ï¼š

1). å¼•å…¥echarts.js æ–‡ä»¶(å½“å¤©èµ„æ–™å·²æä¾›)

2). ä¸º ECharts å‡†å¤‡ä¸€ä¸ªè®¾ç½®å®½é«˜çš„ DOM

3). åˆå§‹åŒ–echartså®ä¾‹

4). æŒ‡å®šå›¾è¡¨çš„é…ç½®é¡¹å’Œæ•°æ®

5). ä½¿ç”¨æŒ‡å®šçš„é…ç½®é¡¹å’Œæ•°æ®æ˜¾ç¤ºå›¾è¡¨

ä»£ç å¼€å‘ï¼š

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <title>ECharts</title>
    <!-- å¼•å…¥åˆšåˆšä¸‹è½½çš„ ECharts æ–‡ä»¶ -->
    <script src="echarts.js"></script>
  </head>
  <body>
    <!-- ä¸º ECharts å‡†å¤‡ä¸€ä¸ªå®šä¹‰äº†å®½é«˜çš„ DOM -->
    <div id="main" style="width: 600px;height:400px;"></div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
      // åŸºäºå‡†å¤‡å¥½çš„domï¼Œåˆå§‹åŒ–echartså®ä¾‹
      var myChart = echarts.init(document.getElementById('main'));

      // æŒ‡å®šå›¾è¡¨çš„é…ç½®é¡¹å’Œæ•°æ®
      var option = {
        title: {
          text: 'ECharts å…¥é—¨ç¤ºä¾‹'
        },
        tooltip: {},
        legend: {
          data: ['é”€é‡']
        },
        xAxis: {
          data: ['è¡¬è¡«', 'ç¾Šæ¯›è¡«', 'é›ªçººè¡«', 'è£¤å­', 'é«˜è·Ÿé‹', 'è¢œå­']
        },
        yAxis: {},
        series: [
          {
            name: 'é”€é‡',
            type: 'bar',
            data: [5, 20, 36, 10, 10, 20]
          }
        ]
      };

      // ä½¿ç”¨åˆšæŒ‡å®šçš„é…ç½®é¡¹å’Œæ•°æ®æ˜¾ç¤ºå›¾è¡¨ã€‚
      myChart.setOption(option);
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

æµ‹è¯•ï¼š(å½“å¤©èµ„æ–™ä¸­å·²æä¾›)

ä½¿ç”¨æµè§ˆå™¨æ–¹å¼æ‰“å¼€å³å¯ã€‚

**æ€»ç»“ï¼š**ä½¿ç”¨Echartsï¼Œé‡ç‚¹åœ¨äºç ”ç©¶å½“å‰å›¾è¡¨æ‰€éœ€çš„æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ã€‚é€šå¸¸æ˜¯éœ€è¦åç«¯æä¾›ç¬¦åˆæ ¼å¼è¦æ±‚çš„åŠ¨æ€æ•°æ®ï¼Œç„¶åå“åº”ç»™å‰ç«¯æ¥å±•ç¤ºå›¾è¡¨ã€‚

2. è¥ä¸šé¢ç»Ÿè®¡ â€‹

2.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

2.1.1 äº§å“åŸå‹ â€‹

è¥ä¸šé¢ç»Ÿè®¡æ˜¯åŸºäºæŠ˜ç°å›¾æ¥å±•ç°ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”æŒ‰ç…§å¤©æ¥å±•ç¤ºçš„ã€‚å®é™…ä¸Šï¼Œå°±æ˜¯æŸä¸€ä¸ªæ—¶é—´èŒƒå›´ä¹‹å†…çš„æ¯ä¸€å¤©çš„è¥ä¸šé¢ã€‚åŒæ—¶ï¼Œä¸ç®¡å…‰æ ‡æ”¾åœ¨å“ªä¸ªç‚¹ä¸Šï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå®ƒå°±ä¼šæŠŠå…·ä½“çš„æ•°å€¼å±•ç¤ºå‡ºæ¥ã€‚å¹¶ä¸”è¿˜éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„æ—¥æœŸå¹¶ä¸æ˜¯å›ºå®šå†™æ­»çš„ï¼Œæ˜¯ç”±ä¸Šè¾¹æ—¶é—´é€‰æ‹©å™¨æ¥å†³å®šã€‚æ¯”å¦‚é€‰æ‹©æ˜¯è¿‘7å¤©ã€æˆ–è€…æ˜¯è¿‘30æ—¥ï¼Œæˆ–è€…æ˜¯æœ¬å‘¨ï¼Œå°±ä¼šæŠŠç›¸åº”è¿™ä¸ªæ—¶é—´æ®µä¹‹å†…çš„æ¯ä¸€å¤©æ—¥æœŸé€šè¿‡æ¨ªåæ ‡å±•ç¤ºã€‚

åŸå‹å›¾ï¼š

ä¸šåŠ¡è§„åˆ™ï¼š

  • è¥ä¸šé¢æŒ‡è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€ä¸ºå·²å®Œæˆçš„è®¢å•é‡‘é¢åˆè®¡
  • åŸºäºå¯è§†åŒ–æŠ¥è¡¨çš„æŠ˜çº¿å›¾å±•ç¤ºè¥ä¸šé¢æ•°æ®ï¼ŒXè½´ä¸ºæ—¥æœŸï¼ŒYè½´ä¸ºè¥ä¸šé¢
  • æ ¹æ®æ—¶é—´é€‰æ‹©åŒºé—´ï¼Œå±•ç¤ºæ¯å¤©çš„è¥ä¸šé¢æ•°æ®

2.1.2 æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ â€‹

é€šè¿‡ä¸Šè¿°åŸå‹å›¾ï¼Œè®¾è®¡å‡ºå¯¹åº”çš„æ¥å£ã€‚

**æ³¨æ„ï¼š**å…·ä½“è¿”å›æ•°æ®ä¸€èˆ¬ç”±å‰ç«¯æ¥å†³å®šï¼Œå‰ç«¯å±•ç¤ºå›¾è¡¨ï¼Œå…·ä½“æŠ˜ç°å›¾å¯¹åº”æ•°æ®æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆæ ¼å¼ï¼Œæ˜¯æœ‰å›ºå®šçš„è¦æ±‚çš„ã€‚ æ‰€ä»¥è¯´ï¼Œåç«¯éœ€è¦å»é€‚åº”å‰ç«¯ï¼Œå®ƒéœ€è¦ä»€ä¹ˆæ ¼å¼çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°±ç»™å®ƒè¿”å›ä»€ä¹ˆæ ¼å¼çš„æ•°æ®ã€‚

2.2 ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

2.2.1 VOè®¾è®¡ â€‹

æ ¹æ®æ¥å£å®šä¹‰è®¾è®¡å¯¹åº”çš„VOï¼š

åœ¨sky-pojoæ¨¡å—ï¼ŒTurnoverReportVO.javaå·²å®šä¹‰

java
package com.sky.vo;

import lombok.AllArgsConstructor;
import lombok.Builder;
import lombok.Data;
import lombok.NoArgsConstructor;

import java.io.Serializable;

@Data
@Builder
@NoArgsConstructor
@AllArgsConstructor
public class TurnoverReportVO implements Serializable {

    //æ—¥æœŸï¼Œä»¥é€—å·åˆ†éš”ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š2022-10-01,2022-10-02,2022-10-03
    private String dateList;

    //è¥ä¸šé¢ï¼Œä»¥é€—å·åˆ†éš”ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š406.0,1520.0,75.0
    private String turnoverList;

}

2.2.2 Controllerå±‚ â€‹

æ ¹æ®æ¥å£å®šä¹‰åˆ›å»ºReportControllerï¼š

java
package com.sky.controller.admin;

import com.sky.result.Result;
import com.sky.service.ReportService;
import com.sky.vo.TurnoverReportVO;
import io.swagger.annotations.Api;
import io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation;
import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.format.annotation.DateTimeFormat;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.GetMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;
import java.time.LocalDate;

/**
 * æŠ¥è¡¨
 */
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/admin/report")
@Slf4j
@Api(tags = "ç»Ÿè®¡æŠ¥è¡¨ç›¸å…³æ¥å£")
public class ReportController {

    @Autowired
    private ReportService reportService;

    /**
     * è¥ä¸šé¢æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡
     *
     * @param begin
     * @param end
     * @return
     */
    @GetMapping("/turnoverStatistics")
    @ApiOperation("è¥ä¸šé¢æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡")
    public Result<TurnoverReportVO> turnoverStatistics(
            @DateTimeFormat(pattern = "yyyy-MM-dd")
                    LocalDate begin,
            @DateTimeFormat(pattern = "yyyy-MM-dd")
                    LocalDate end) {
        return Result.success(reportService.getTurnover(begin, end));
    }

}

2.2.3 Serviceå±‚æ¥å£ â€‹

åˆ›å»ºReportServiceæ¥å£ï¼Œå£°æ˜getTurnoveræ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
package com.sky.service;

import com.sky.vo.TurnoverReportVO;
import java.time.LocalDate;

public interface ReportService {

    /**
     * æ ¹æ®æ—¶é—´åŒºé—´ç»Ÿè®¡è¥ä¸šé¢
     * @param beginTime
     * @param endTime
     * @return
     */
    TurnoverReportVO getTurnover(LocalDate beginTime, LocalDate endTime);
}

2.2.4 Serviceå±‚å®ç°ç±» â€‹

åˆ›å»ºReportServiceImplå®ç°ç±»ï¼Œå®ç°getTurnoveræ–¹æ³•:

java
package com.sky.service.impl;

import com.sky.entity.Orders;
import com.sky.mapper.OrderMapper;
import com.sky.service.ReportService;
import com.sky.vo.TurnoverReportVO;
import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.apache.commons.lang.StringUtils;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.time.LocalDate;
import java.time.LocalDateTime;
import java.time.LocalTime;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

@Service
@Slf4j
public class ReportServiceImpl implements ReportService {

    @Autowired
    private OrderMapper orderMapper;

    /**
     * æ ¹æ®æ—¶é—´åŒºé—´ç»Ÿè®¡è¥ä¸šé¢
     * @param begin
     * @param end
     * @return
     */
    public TurnoverReportVO getTurnover(LocalDate begin, LocalDate end) {
        List<LocalDate> dateList = new ArrayList<>();
        dateList.add(begin);

        while (!begin.equals(end)){
            begin = begin.plusDays(1);//æ—¥æœŸè®¡ç®—ï¼Œè·å¾—æŒ‡å®šæ—¥æœŸå1å¤©çš„æ—¥æœŸ
            dateList.add(begin);
        }
        
       List<Double> turnoverList = new ArrayList<>();
        for (LocalDate date : dateList) { //æŸ¥è¯¢dateæ—¥æœŸå¯¹åº”çš„è¥ä¸šé¢æ•°æ®ï¼Œè¥ä¸šé¢æ˜¯æŒ‡ï¼šçŠ¶æ€ä¸ºâ€œå·²å®Œæˆâ€çš„è®¢å•é‡‘é¢åˆè®¡
         

            LocalDateTime beginTime = LocalDateTime.of(date, LocalTime.MIN); //è·å–yyyy-MM-ddæ ¼å¼å¯¹åº”çš„yyyy-MM-dd-mm-ssæ ¼å¼çš„æœ€å¤§æœ€å°å€¼ï¼Œå³ä¸ºè¯¥å¤©æ—¥æœŸ(LocalDateTime)çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼å’Œæœ€å°å€¼
            LocalDateTime endTime = LocalDateTime.of(date, LocalTime.MAX);
            Map map = new HashMap();
        	map.put("status", Orders.COMPLETED);
        	map.put("begin",beginTime);
        	map.put("end", endTime);
             //select sum(amount) from orders where order_time>beginTime and order_time<endTime and status=5
            Double turnover = orderMapper.sumByMap(map); 
            turnover = turnover == null ? 0.0 : turnover;
            turnoverList.add(turnover);
        }

        //å°è£…è¿”å›ç»“æœ
        return TurnoverReportVO.builder()
                .dateList(StringUtils.join(dateList,","))
                .turnoverList(StringUtils.join(turnoverList,","))
                .build();
    }
}

2.2.5 Mapperå±‚ â€‹

åœ¨OrderMapperæ¥å£å£°æ˜sumByMapæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * æ ¹æ®åŠ¨æ€æ¡ä»¶ç»Ÿè®¡è¥ä¸šé¢
     * @param map
     */
    Double sumByMap(Map map);

åœ¨OrderMapper.xmlæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ç¼–å†™åŠ¨æ€SQLï¼š

xml
<select id="sumByMap" resultType="java.lang.Double">
        select sum(amount) from orders
        <where>
            <if test="status != null">
                and status = #{status}
            </if>
            <if test="begin != null">
                and order_time >= #{begin}
            </if>
            <if test="end != null">
                and order_time <= #{end}
            </if>
        </where>
</select>

2.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å¦‚ä¸‹æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ï¼š

  • æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£æµ‹è¯•
  • å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒæµ‹è¯•

å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œå¯åŠ¨nginxï¼Œç›´æ¥é‡‡ç”¨å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒæµ‹è¯•ã€‚

è¿›å…¥æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡æ¨¡å—

1). æŸ¥çœ‹è¿‘7æ—¥è¥ä¸šé¢ç»Ÿè®¡

è¿›å…¥å¼€å‘è€…æ¨¡å¼ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹è¿”å›æ•°æ®

2). æŸ¥çœ‹è¿‘30æ—¥è¥ä¸šé¢ç»Ÿè®¡

è¿›å…¥å¼€å‘è€…æ¨¡å¼ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹è¿”å›æ•°æ®

ä¹Ÿå¯é€šè¿‡æ–­ç‚¹æ–¹å¼å¯åŠ¨ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹æ¯æ­¥æ‰§è¡Œæƒ…å†µã€‚

2.4 ä»£ç æäº¤ â€‹

åç»­æ­¥éª¤å’Œå…¶å®ƒåŠŸèƒ½ä»£ç æäº¤ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œä¸å†èµ˜è¿°ã€‚

3. ç”¨æˆ·ç»Ÿè®¡ â€‹

3.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

3.1.1 äº§å“åŸå‹ â€‹

æ‰€è°“ç”¨æˆ·ç»Ÿè®¡ï¼Œå®é™…ä¸Šç»Ÿè®¡çš„æ˜¯ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ•°é‡ã€‚é€šè¿‡æŠ˜çº¿å›¾æ¥å±•ç¤ºï¼Œä¸Šé¢è¿™æ ¹è“è‰²çº¿ä»£è¡¨çš„æ˜¯ç”¨æˆ·æ€»é‡ï¼Œä¸‹è¾¹è¿™æ ¹ç»¿è‰²çº¿ä»£è¡¨çš„æ˜¯æ–°å¢ç”¨æˆ·æ•°é‡ï¼Œæ˜¯å…·ä½“åˆ°æ¯ä¸€å¤©ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥è¯´ç”¨æˆ·ç»Ÿè®¡ä¸»è¦ç»Ÿè®¡ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°æ®ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯æ€»çš„ç”¨æˆ·æ•°é‡ï¼Œå¦å¤–ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯æ–°å¢ç”¨æˆ·æ•°é‡ã€‚

åŸå‹å›¾ï¼š

ä¸šåŠ¡è§„åˆ™ï¼š

  • åŸºäºå¯è§†åŒ–æŠ¥è¡¨çš„æŠ˜çº¿å›¾å±•ç¤ºç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®ï¼ŒXè½´ä¸ºæ—¥æœŸï¼ŒYè½´ä¸ºç”¨æˆ·æ•°
  • æ ¹æ®æ—¶é—´é€‰æ‹©åŒºé—´ï¼Œå±•ç¤ºæ¯å¤©çš„ç”¨æˆ·æ€»é‡å’Œæ–°å¢ç”¨æˆ·é‡æ•°æ®

3.1.2 æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ â€‹

æ ¹æ®ä¸Šè¿°åŸå‹å›¾è®¾è®¡æ¥å£ã€‚

3.2 ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

3.2.1 VOè®¾è®¡ â€‹

æ ¹æ®ç”¨æˆ·ç»Ÿè®¡æ¥å£çš„è¿”å›ç»“æœè®¾è®¡VOï¼š

åœ¨sky-pojoæ¨¡å—ï¼ŒUserReportVO.javaå·²å®šä¹‰

java
package com.sky.vo;

import lombok.AllArgsConstructor;
import lombok.Builder;
import lombok.Data;
import lombok.NoArgsConstructor;
import java.io.Serializable;

@Data
@Builder
@NoArgsConstructor
@AllArgsConstructor
public class UserReportVO implements Serializable {

    //æ—¥æœŸï¼Œä»¥é€—å·åˆ†éš”ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š2022-10-01,2022-10-02,2022-10-03
    private String dateList;

    //ç”¨æˆ·æ€»é‡ï¼Œä»¥é€—å·åˆ†éš”ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š200,210,220
    private String totalUserList;

    //æ–°å¢ç”¨æˆ·ï¼Œä»¥é€—å·åˆ†éš”ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š20,21,10
    private String newUserList;

}

3.2.2 Controllerå±‚ â€‹

æ ¹æ®æ¥å£å®šä¹‰ï¼Œåœ¨ReportControllerä¸­åˆ›å»ºuserStatisticsæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
/**
     * ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡
     * @param begin
     * @param end
     * @return
     */
    @GetMapping("/userStatistics")
    @ApiOperation("ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡")
    public Result<UserReportVO> userStatistics(
            @DateTimeFormat(pattern = "yyyy-MM-dd") LocalDate begin,
            @DateTimeFormat(pattern = "yyyy-MM-dd") LocalDate end){

        return Result.success(reportService.getUserStatistics(begin,end));            
}

3.2.3 Serviceå±‚æ¥å£ â€‹

åœ¨ReportServiceæ¥å£ä¸­å£°æ˜getUserStatisticsæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * æ ¹æ®æ—¶é—´åŒºé—´ç»Ÿè®¡ç”¨æˆ·æ•°é‡
     * @param begin
     * @param end
     * @return
     */
    UserReportVO getUserStatistics(LocalDate begin, LocalDate end);

3.2.4 Serviceå±‚å®ç°ç±» â€‹

åœ¨ReportServiceImplå®ç°ç±»ä¸­å®ç°getUserStatisticsæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	@Override
    public UserReportVO getUserStatistics(LocalDate begin, LocalDate end) {
        List<LocalDate> dateList = new ArrayList<>();
        dateList.add(begin);

        while (!begin.equals(end)){
            begin = begin.plusDays(1);
            dateList.add(begin);
        }
        List<Integer> newUserList = new ArrayList<>(); //æ–°å¢ç”¨æˆ·æ•°
        List<Integer> totalUserList = new ArrayList<>(); //æ€»ç”¨æˆ·æ•°

        for (LocalDate date : dateList) {
            LocalDateTime beginTime = LocalDateTime.of(date, LocalTime.MIN);
            LocalDateTime endTime = LocalDateTime.of(date, LocalTime.MAX);
            //æ–°å¢ç”¨æˆ·æ•°é‡ select count(id) from user where create_time > ? and create_time < ?
            Integer newUser = getUserCount(beginTime, endTime);
            //æ€»ç”¨æˆ·æ•°é‡ select count(id) from user where  create_time < ?
            Integer totalUser = getUserCount(null, endTime);

            newUserList.add(newUser);
            totalUserList.add(totalUser);
        }

        return UserReportVO.builder()
                .dateList(StringUtils.join(dateList,","))
                .newUserList(StringUtils.join(newUserList,","))
                .totalUserList(StringUtils.join(totalUserList,","))
                .build();
    }

åœ¨ReportServiceImplå®ç°ç±»ä¸­åˆ›å»ºç§æœ‰æ–¹æ³•getUserCountï¼š

java
	/**
     * æ ¹æ®æ—¶é—´åŒºé—´ç»Ÿè®¡ç”¨æˆ·æ•°é‡
     * @param beginTime
     * @param endTime
     * @return
     */
    private Integer getUserCount(LocalDateTime beginTime, LocalDateTime endTime) {
        Map map = new HashMap();
        map.put("begin",beginTime);
        map.put("end", endTime);
        return userMapper.countByMap(map);
    }

3.2.5 Mapperå±‚ â€‹

åœ¨UserMapperæ¥å£ä¸­å£°æ˜countByMapæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * æ ¹æ®åŠ¨æ€æ¡ä»¶ç»Ÿè®¡ç”¨æˆ·æ•°é‡
     * @param map
     * @return
     */
    Integer countByMap(Map map);

åœ¨UserMapper.xmlæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ç¼–å†™åŠ¨æ€SQLï¼š

java
<select id="countByMap" resultType="java.lang.Integer">
        select count(id) from user
        <where>
            <if test="begin != null">
                and create_time >= #{begin}
            </if>
            <if test="end != null">
                and create_time <= #{end}
            </if>
        </where>
</select>

3.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å¦‚ä¸‹æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ï¼š

  • æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£æµ‹è¯•
  • å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒæµ‹è¯•

è¿›å…¥æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡æ¨¡å—

1). æŸ¥çœ‹è¿‘7æ—¥ç”¨æˆ·ç»Ÿè®¡

è¿›å…¥å¼€å‘è€…æ¨¡å¼ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹è¿”å›æ•°æ®

2). æŸ¥çœ‹è¿‘30æ—¥ç”¨æˆ·ç»Ÿè®¡

è¿›å…¥å¼€å‘è€…æ¨¡å¼ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹è¿”å›æ•°æ®

ä¹Ÿå¯é€šè¿‡æ–­ç‚¹æ–¹å¼å¯åŠ¨ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹æ¯æ­¥æ‰§è¡Œæƒ…å†µã€‚

3.4 ä»£ç æäº¤ â€‹

åç»­æ­¥éª¤å’Œå…¶å®ƒåŠŸèƒ½ä»£ç æäº¤ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œä¸å†èµ˜è¿°ã€‚

4. è®¢å•ç»Ÿè®¡ â€‹

4.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

4.1.1 äº§å“åŸå‹ â€‹

è®¢å•ç»Ÿè®¡é€šè¿‡ä¸€ä¸ªæŠ˜ç°å›¾æ¥å±•ç°ï¼ŒæŠ˜çº¿å›¾ä¸Šæœ‰ä¸¤æ ¹çº¿ï¼Œè¿™æ ¹è“è‰²çš„çº¿ä»£è¡¨çš„æ˜¯è®¢å•æ€»æ•°ï¼Œè€Œä¸‹è¾¹è¿™æ ¹ç»¿è‰²çš„çº¿ä»£è¡¨çš„æ˜¯æœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•æ•°ï¼ŒæŒ‡çš„å°±æ˜¯çŠ¶æ€æ˜¯å·²å®Œæˆçš„è®¢å•å°±å±äºæœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«åæ˜ çš„æ˜¯æ¯ä¸€å¤©çš„æ•°æ®ã€‚ä¸Šé¢è¿˜æœ‰3ä¸ªæ•°å­—ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯è®¢å•æ€»æ•°ã€æœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•ã€è®¢å•å®Œæˆç‡ï¼Œå®ƒæŒ‡çš„æ˜¯æ•´ä¸ªæ—¶é—´åŒºé—´ä¹‹å†…æ€»çš„æ•°æ®ã€‚

åŸå‹å›¾ï¼š

ä¸šåŠ¡è§„åˆ™ï¼š

  • æœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•æŒ‡çŠ¶æ€ä¸º â€œå·²å®Œæˆâ€ çš„è®¢å•
  • åŸºäºå¯è§†åŒ–æŠ¥è¡¨çš„æŠ˜çº¿å›¾å±•ç¤ºè®¢å•æ•°æ®ï¼ŒXè½´ä¸ºæ—¥æœŸï¼ŒYè½´ä¸ºè®¢å•æ•°é‡
  • æ ¹æ®æ—¶é—´é€‰æ‹©åŒºé—´ï¼Œå±•ç¤ºæ¯å¤©çš„è®¢å•æ€»æ•°å’Œæœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•æ•°
  • å±•ç¤ºæ‰€é€‰æ—¶é—´åŒºé—´å†…çš„æœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•æ•°ã€æ€»è®¢å•æ•°ã€è®¢å•å®Œæˆç‡ï¼Œè®¢å•å®Œæˆç‡ = æœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•æ•° / æ€»è®¢å•æ•° * 100%

4.1.2 æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ â€‹

æ ¹æ®ä¸Šè¿°åŸå‹å›¾è®¾è®¡æ¥å£ã€‚

4.2 ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

4.2.1 VOè®¾è®¡ â€‹

æ ¹æ®è®¢å•ç»Ÿè®¡æ¥å£çš„è¿”å›ç»“æœè®¾è®¡VOï¼š

åœ¨sky-pojoæ¨¡å—ï¼ŒOrderReportVO.javaå·²å®šä¹‰

java
package com.sky.vo;

import lombok.AllArgsConstructor;
import lombok.Builder;
import lombok.Data;
import lombok.NoArgsConstructor;
import java.io.Serializable;

@Data
@Builder
@NoArgsConstructor
@AllArgsConstructor
public class OrderReportVO implements Serializable {

    //æ—¥æœŸï¼Œä»¥é€—å·åˆ†éš”ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š2022-10-01,2022-10-02,2022-10-03
    private String dateList;

    //æ¯æ—¥è®¢å•æ•°ï¼Œä»¥é€—å·åˆ†éš”ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š260,210,215
    private String orderCountList;

    //æ¯æ—¥æœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•æ•°ï¼Œä»¥é€—å·åˆ†éš”ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š20,21,10
    private String validOrderCountList;

    //è®¢å•æ€»æ•°
    private Integer totalOrderCount;

    //æœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•æ•°
    private Integer validOrderCount;

    //è®¢å•å®Œæˆç‡
    private Double orderCompletionRate;

}

4.2.2 Controllerå±‚ â€‹

åœ¨ReportControllerä¸­æ ¹æ®è®¢å•ç»Ÿè®¡æ¥å£åˆ›å»ºorderStatisticsæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
/**
     * è®¢å•æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡
     * @param begin
     * @param end
     * @return
     */
    @GetMapping("/ordersStatistics")
    @ApiOperation("ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡")
    public Result<OrderReportVO> orderStatistics(
            @DateTimeFormat(pattern = "yyyy-MM-dd")
                    LocalDate begin,
            @DateTimeFormat(pattern = "yyyy-MM-dd")
                    LocalDate end){

        return Result.success(reportService.getOrderStatistics(begin,end));
    }

4.2.3 Serviceå±‚æ¥å£ â€‹

åœ¨ReportServiceæ¥å£ä¸­å£°æ˜getOrderStatisticsæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
/**
* æ ¹æ®æ—¶é—´åŒºé—´ç»Ÿè®¡è®¢å•æ•°é‡
* @param begin 
* @param end
* @return 
*/
OrderReportVO getOrderStatistics(LocalDate begin, LocalDate end);

4.2.4 Serviceå±‚å®ç°ç±» â€‹

åœ¨ReportServiceImplå®ç°ç±»ä¸­å®ç°getOrderStatisticsæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
/**
* æ ¹æ®æ—¶é—´åŒºé—´ç»Ÿè®¡è®¢å•æ•°é‡
* @param begin 
* @param end
* @return 
*/
public OrderReportVO getOrderStatistics(LocalDate begin, LocalDate end){
	List<LocalDate> dateList = new ArrayList<>();
    dateList.add(begin);

    while (!begin.equals(end)){
          begin = begin.plusDays(1);
          dateList.add(begin);
     }
    //æ¯å¤©è®¢å•æ€»æ•°é›†åˆ
     List<Integer> orderCountList = new ArrayList<>();
    //æ¯å¤©æœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•æ•°é›†åˆ
    List<Integer> validOrderCountList = new ArrayList<>();
    for (LocalDate date : dateList) {
         LocalDateTime beginTime = LocalDateTime.of(date, LocalTime.MIN);
         LocalDateTime endTime = LocalDateTime.of(date, LocalTime.MAX);
   //æŸ¥è¯¢æ¯å¤©çš„æ€»è®¢å•æ•° select count(id) from orders where order_time > ? and order_time < ?
         Integer orderCount = getOrderCount(beginTime, endTime, null);

  //æŸ¥è¯¢æ¯å¤©çš„æœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•æ•° select count(id) from orders where order_time > ? and order_time < ? and status = ?
         Integer validOrderCount = getOrderCount(beginTime, endTime, Orders.COMPLETED);

         orderCountList.add(orderCount);
         validOrderCountList.add(validOrderCount);
        }

    //æ—¶é—´åŒºé—´å†…çš„æ€»è®¢å•æ•°
    Integer totalOrderCount = orderCountList.stream().reduce(Integer::sum).get();
    //æ—¶é—´åŒºé—´å†…çš„æ€»æœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•æ•°
    Integer validOrderCount = validOrderCountList.stream().reduce(Integer::sum).get();
    //è®¢å•å®Œæˆç‡
    Double orderCompletionRate = 0.0;
    if(totalOrderCount != 0){
         orderCompletionRate = validOrderCount.doubleValue() / totalOrderCount;
     }
    return OrderReportVO.builder()
                .dateList(StringUtils.join(dateList, ","))
                .orderCountList(StringUtils.join(orderCountList, ","))
                .validOrderCountList(StringUtils.join(validOrderCountList, ","))
                .totalOrderCount(totalOrderCount)
                .validOrderCount(validOrderCount)
                .orderCompletionRate(orderCompletionRate)
                .build();
    
}

åœ¨ReportServiceImplå®ç°ç±»ä¸­æä¾›ç§æœ‰æ–¹æ³•getOrderCountï¼š

java
/**
* æ ¹æ®æ—¶é—´åŒºé—´ç»Ÿè®¡æŒ‡å®šçŠ¶æ€çš„è®¢å•æ•°é‡
* @param beginTime
* @param endTime
* @param status
* @return
*/
private Integer getOrderCount(LocalDateTime beginTime, LocalDateTime endTime, Integer status) {
	Map map = new HashMap();
	map.put("status", status);
	map.put("begin",beginTime);
	map.put("end", endTime);
	return orderMapper.countByMap(map);
}

4.2.5 Mapperå±‚ â€‹

åœ¨OrderMapperæ¥å£ä¸­å£°æ˜countByMapæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
/**
*æ ¹æ®åŠ¨æ€æ¡ä»¶ç»Ÿè®¡è®¢å•æ•°é‡
* @param map
*/
Integer countByMap(Map map);

åœ¨OrderMapper.xmlæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ç¼–å†™åŠ¨æ€SQLï¼š

java
<select id="countByMap" resultType="java.lang.Integer">
        select count(id) from orders
        <where>
            <if test="status != null">
                and status = #{status}
            </if>
            <if test="begin != null">
                and order_time >= #{begin}
            </if>
            <if test="end != null">
                and order_time <= #{end}
            </if>
        </where>
</select>

4.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å¦‚ä¸‹æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ï¼š

  • æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£æµ‹è¯•
  • å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒ

é‡å¯æœåŠ¡ï¼Œç›´æ¥é‡‡ç”¨å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒæµ‹è¯•ã€‚

è¿›å…¥æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡æ¨¡å—

1). æŸ¥çœ‹è¿‘7æ—¥è®¢å•ç»Ÿè®¡

è¿›å…¥å¼€å‘è€…æ¨¡å¼ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹è¿”å›æ•°æ®

2). æŸ¥çœ‹è¿‘30æ—¥è®¢å•ç»Ÿè®¡

è¿›å…¥å¼€å‘è€…æ¨¡å¼ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹è¿”å›æ•°æ®

ä¹Ÿå¯é€šè¿‡æ–­ç‚¹æ–¹å¼å¯åŠ¨ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹æ¯æ­¥æ‰§è¡Œæƒ…å†µã€‚

4.4 ä»£ç æäº¤ â€‹

åç»­æ­¥éª¤å’Œå…¶å®ƒåŠŸèƒ½ä»£ç æäº¤ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œä¸å†èµ˜è¿°ã€‚

5. é”€é‡æ’åTop10 â€‹

5.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

5.1.1 äº§å“åŸå‹ â€‹

æ‰€è°“é”€é‡æ’åï¼Œé”€é‡æŒ‡çš„æ˜¯å•†å“é”€å”®çš„æ•°é‡ã€‚é¡¹ç›®å½“ä¸­çš„å•†å“ä¸»è¦åŒ…å«ä¸¤ç±»ï¼šä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯å¥—é¤ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯èœå“ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥é”€é‡æ’åå…¶å®æŒ‡çš„å°±æ˜¯èœå“å’Œå¥—é¤é”€å”®çš„æ•°é‡æ’åã€‚é€šè¿‡æŸ±å½¢å›¾æ¥å±•ç¤ºé”€é‡æ’åï¼Œè¿™äº›é”€é‡æ˜¯æŒ‰ç…§é™åºæ¥æ’åˆ—ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”åªéœ€è¦ç»Ÿè®¡é”€é‡æ’åå‰åçš„å•†å“ã€‚

åŸå‹å›¾ï¼š

ä¸šåŠ¡è§„åˆ™ï¼š

  • æ ¹æ®æ—¶é—´é€‰æ‹©åŒºé—´ï¼Œå±•ç¤ºé”€é‡å‰10çš„å•†å“ï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬èœå“å’Œå¥—é¤ï¼‰
  • åŸºäºå¯è§†åŒ–æŠ¥è¡¨çš„æŸ±çŠ¶å›¾é™åºå±•ç¤ºå•†å“é”€é‡
  • æ­¤å¤„çš„é”€é‡ä¸ºå•†å“é”€å”®çš„ä»½æ•°

5.1.2 æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ â€‹

æ ¹æ®ä¸Šè¿°åŸå‹å›¾è®¾è®¡æ¥å£ã€‚

5.2 ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

5.2.1 VOè®¾è®¡ â€‹

æ ¹æ®é”€é‡æ’åæ¥å£çš„è¿”å›ç»“æœè®¾è®¡VOï¼š

åœ¨sky-pojoæ¨¡å—ï¼ŒSalesTop10ReportVO.javaå·²å®šä¹‰

java
package com.sky.vo;

import lombok.AllArgsConstructor;
import lombok.Builder;
import lombok.Data;
import lombok.NoArgsConstructor;
import java.io.Serializable;

@Data
@Builder
@NoArgsConstructor
@AllArgsConstructor
public class SalesTop10ReportVO implements Serializable {

    //å•†å“åç§°åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œä»¥é€—å·åˆ†éš”ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šé±¼é¦™è‚‰ä¸,å®«ä¿é¸¡ä¸,æ°´ç…®é±¼
    private String nameList;

    //é”€é‡åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œä»¥é€—å·åˆ†éš”ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š260,215,200
    private String numberList;

}

5.2.2 Controllerå±‚ â€‹

åœ¨ReportControllerä¸­æ ¹æ®é”€é‡æ’åæ¥å£åˆ›å»ºtop10æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
/**
* é”€é‡æ’åç»Ÿè®¡
* @param begin
* @param end
* @return
*/
@GetMapping("/top10")
@ApiOperation("é”€é‡æ’åç»Ÿè®¡")
public Result<SalesTop10ReportVO> top10(
    @DateTimeFormat(pattern = "yyyy-MM-dd") LocalDate begin,
    @DateTimeFormat(pattern = "yyyy-MM-dd") LocalDate end){
	return Result.success(reportService.getSalesTop10(begin,end));
}

5.2.3 Serviceå±‚æ¥å£ â€‹

åœ¨ReportServiceæ¥å£ä¸­å£°æ˜getSalesTop10æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
/**
* æŸ¥è¯¢æŒ‡å®šæ—¶é—´åŒºé—´å†…çš„é”€é‡æ’åtop10 
* @param begin
* @param end
* @return
*/
SalesTop10ReportVO getSalesTop10(LocalDate begin, LocalDate end);

5.2.4 Serviceå±‚å®ç°ç±» â€‹

åœ¨ReportServiceImplå®ç°ç±»ä¸­å®ç°getSalesTop10æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
/**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢æŒ‡å®šæ—¶é—´åŒºé—´å†…çš„é”€é‡æ’åtop10
     * @param begin
     * @param end
     * @return
     * */
    public SalesTop10ReportVO getSalesTop10(LocalDate begin, LocalDate end){
        LocalDateTime beginTime = LocalDateTime.of(begin, LocalTime.MIN);
        LocalDateTime endTime = LocalDateTime.of(end, LocalTime.MAX);
        List<GoodsSalesDTO> goodsSalesDTOList = orderMapper.getSalesTop10(beginTime, endTime);

        String nameList = StringUtils.join(goodsSalesDTOList.stream().map(GoodsSalesDTO::getName).collect(Collectors.toList()),",");
        String numberList = StringUtils.join(goodsSalesDTOList.stream().map(GoodsSalesDTO::getNumber).collect(Collectors.toList()),",");

        return SalesTop10ReportVO.builder()
                .nameList(nameList)
                .numberList(numberList)
                .build();
    }

5.2.5 Mapperå±‚ â€‹

åœ¨OrderMapperæ¥å£ä¸­å£°æ˜getSalesTop10æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
/**
* æŸ¥è¯¢å•†å“é”€é‡æ’å
* @param begin
* @param end
*/
List<GoodsSalesDTO> getSalesTop10(LocalDateTime begin, LocalDateTime end);

åœ¨OrderMapper.xmlæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ç¼–å†™åŠ¨æ€SQLï¼š

xml
<select id="getSalesTop10" resultType="com.sky.dto.GoodsSalesDTO">
        select od.name name,sum(od.number) number from order_detail od ,orders o
        where od.order_id = o.id
            and o.status = 5
            <if test="begin != null">
                and order_time >= #{begin}
            </if>
            <if test="end != null">
                and order_time <= #{end}
            </if>
        group by name
        order by number desc
        limit 0, 10
</select>

5.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å¦‚ä¸‹æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ï¼š

  • æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£æµ‹è¯•
  • å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒ

é‡å¯æœåŠ¡ï¼Œç›´æ¥é‡‡ç”¨å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒæµ‹è¯•ã€‚

æŸ¥çœ‹è¿‘30æ—¥é”€é‡æ’åTop10ç»Ÿè®¡

è‹¥æŸ¥è¯¢çš„æŸä¸€æ®µæ—¶é—´æ²¡æœ‰é”€é‡æ•°æ®ï¼Œåˆ™æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸å‡ºæ•ˆæœã€‚

è¿›å…¥å¼€å‘è€…æ¨¡å¼ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹è¿”å›æ•°æ®

ä¹Ÿå¯é€šè¿‡æ–­ç‚¹æ–¹å¼å¯åŠ¨ï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹æ¯æ­¥æ‰§è¡Œæƒ…å†µã€‚

5.4 ä»£ç æäº¤ â€‹

åç»­æ­¥éª¤å’Œå…¶å®ƒåŠŸèƒ½ä»£ç æäº¤ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œä¸å†èµ˜è¿°ã€‚

åå››ã€è‹ç©¹å¤–å–-Apache POI â€‹

æ›´æ–°: 2025/4/11 å­—æ•°: 0 å­— æ—¶é•¿: 0 åˆ†é’Ÿ

è¯¾ç¨‹å†…å®¹ â€‹

  • å·¥ä½œå°
  • Apache POI
  • å¯¼å‡ºè¿è¥æ•°æ®ExcelæŠ¥è¡¨

åŠŸèƒ½å®ç°ï¼šå·¥ä½œå°ã€æ•°æ®å¯¼å‡º

å·¥ä½œå°æ•ˆæœå›¾ï¼š

æ•°æ®å¯¼å‡ºæ•ˆæœå›¾ï¼š

åœ¨æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡é¡µé¢ç‚¹å‡»æ•°æ®å¯¼å‡ºï¼šç”ŸæˆExcelæŠ¥è¡¨

1. å·¥ä½œå° â€‹

1.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

1.1.1 äº§å“åŸå‹ â€‹

å·¥ä½œå°æ˜¯ç³»ç»Ÿè¿è¥çš„æ•°æ®çœ‹æ¿ï¼Œå¹¶æä¾›å¿«æ·æ“ä½œå…¥å£ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æœ‰æ•ˆæé«˜å•†å®¶çš„å·¥ä½œæ•ˆç‡ã€‚

å·¥ä½œå°å±•ç¤ºçš„æ•°æ®ï¼š

  • ä»Šæ—¥æ•°æ®
  • è®¢å•ç®¡ç†
  • èœå“æ€»è§ˆ
  • å¥—é¤æ€»è§ˆ
  • è®¢å•ä¿¡æ¯

åŸå‹å›¾ï¼š

åè¯è§£é‡Šï¼š

  • è¥ä¸šé¢ï¼šå·²å®Œæˆè®¢å•çš„æ€»é‡‘é¢
  • æœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•ï¼šå·²å®Œæˆè®¢å•çš„æ•°é‡
  • è®¢å•å®Œæˆç‡ï¼šæœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•æ•° / æ€»è®¢å•æ•° * 100%
  • å¹³å‡å®¢å•ä»·ï¼šè¥ä¸šé¢ / æœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•æ•°
  • æ–°å¢ç”¨æˆ·ï¼šæ–°å¢ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ•°é‡

1.1.2 æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ â€‹

é€šè¿‡ä¸Šè¿°åŸå‹å›¾åˆ†æï¼Œå…±åŒ…å«6ä¸ªæ¥å£ã€‚

æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ï¼š

  • ä»Šæ—¥æ•°æ®æ¥å£
  • è®¢å•ç®¡ç†æ¥å£
  • èœå“æ€»è§ˆæ¥å£
  • å¥—é¤æ€»è§ˆæ¥å£
  • è®¢å•æœç´¢ï¼ˆå·²å®Œæˆï¼‰
  • å„ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€çš„è®¢å•æ•°é‡ç»Ÿè®¡ï¼ˆå·²å®Œæˆï¼‰

1). ä»Šæ—¥æ•°æ®çš„æ¥å£è®¾è®¡

2). è®¢å•ç®¡ç†çš„æ¥å£è®¾è®¡

3). èœå“æ€»è§ˆçš„æ¥å£è®¾è®¡

4). å¥—é¤æ€»è§ˆçš„æ¥å£è®¾è®¡

1.2 ä»£ç å¯¼å…¥ â€‹

ç›´æ¥å¯¼å…¥è¯¾ç¨‹èµ„æ–™ä¸­çš„å·¥ä½œå°æ¨¡å—åŠŸèƒ½ä»£ç å³å¯ï¼š

1.2.1 Controllerå±‚ â€‹

æ·»åŠ WorkSpaceController.java

java
package com.sky.controller.admin;

import com.sky.result.Result;
import com.sky.service.WorkspaceService;
import com.sky.vo.BusinessDataVO;
import com.sky.vo.DishOverViewVO;
import com.sky.vo.OrderOverViewVO;
import com.sky.vo.SetmealOverViewVO;
import io.swagger.annotations.Api;
import io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation;
import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.GetMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RequestMapping;
import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController;
import java.time.LocalDateTime;
import java.time.LocalTime;

/**
 * å·¥ä½œå°
 */
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/admin/workspace")
@Slf4j
@Api(tags = "å·¥ä½œå°ç›¸å…³æ¥å£")
public class WorkSpaceController {

    @Autowired
    private WorkspaceService workspaceService;

    /**
     * å·¥ä½œå°ä»Šæ—¥æ•°æ®æŸ¥è¯¢
     * @return
     */
    @GetMapping("/businessData")
    @ApiOperation("å·¥ä½œå°ä»Šæ—¥æ•°æ®æŸ¥è¯¢")
    public Result<BusinessDataVO> businessData(){
        //è·å¾—å½“å¤©çš„å¼€å§‹æ—¶é—´
        LocalDateTime begin = LocalDateTime.now().with(LocalTime.MIN);
        //è·å¾—å½“å¤©çš„ç»“æŸæ—¶é—´
        LocalDateTime end = LocalDateTime.now().with(LocalTime.MAX);

        BusinessDataVO businessDataVO = workspaceService.getBusinessData(begin, end);
        return Result.success(businessDataVO);
    }

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢è®¢å•ç®¡ç†æ•°æ®
     * @return
     */
    @GetMapping("/overviewOrders")
    @ApiOperation("æŸ¥è¯¢è®¢å•ç®¡ç†æ•°æ®")
    public Result<OrderOverViewVO> orderOverView(){
        return Result.success(workspaceService.getOrderOverView());
    }

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢èœå“æ€»è§ˆ
     * @return
     */
    @GetMapping("/overviewDishes")
    @ApiOperation("æŸ¥è¯¢èœå“æ€»è§ˆ")
    public Result<DishOverViewVO> dishOverView(){
        return Result.success(workspaceService.getDishOverView());
    }

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢å¥—é¤æ€»è§ˆ
     * @return
     */
    @GetMapping("/overviewSetmeals")
    @ApiOperation("æŸ¥è¯¢å¥—é¤æ€»è§ˆ")
    public Result<SetmealOverViewVO> setmealOverView(){
        return Result.success(workspaceService.getSetmealOverView());
    }
}

1.2.2 Serviceå±‚æ¥å£ â€‹

æ·»åŠ WorkspaceService.java

java
package com.sky.service;

import com.sky.vo.BusinessDataVO;
import com.sky.vo.DishOverViewVO;
import com.sky.vo.OrderOverViewVO;
import com.sky.vo.SetmealOverViewVO;
import java.time.LocalDateTime;

public interface WorkspaceService {

    /**
     * æ ¹æ®æ—¶é—´æ®µç»Ÿè®¡è¥ä¸šæ•°æ®
     * @param begin
     * @param end
     * @return
     */
    BusinessDataVO getBusinessData(LocalDateTime begin, LocalDateTime end);

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢è®¢å•ç®¡ç†æ•°æ®
     * @return
     */
    OrderOverViewVO getOrderOverView();

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢èœå“æ€»è§ˆ
     * @return
     */
    DishOverViewVO getDishOverView();

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢å¥—é¤æ€»è§ˆ
     * @return
     */
    SetmealOverViewVO getSetmealOverView();

}

1.2.3 Serviceå±‚å®ç°ç±» â€‹

æ·»åŠ WorkspaceServiceImpl.java

java
package com.sky.service.impl;

import com.sky.constant.StatusConstant;
import com.sky.entity.Orders;
import com.sky.mapper.DishMapper;
import com.sky.mapper.OrderMapper;
import com.sky.mapper.SetmealMapper;
import com.sky.mapper.UserMapper;
import com.sky.service.WorkspaceService;
import com.sky.vo.BusinessDataVO;
import com.sky.vo.DishOverViewVO;
import com.sky.vo.OrderOverViewVO;
import com.sky.vo.SetmealOverViewVO;
import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
import java.time.LocalDateTime;
import java.time.LocalTime;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;

@Service
@Slf4j
public class WorkspaceServiceImpl implements WorkspaceService {

    @Autowired
    private OrderMapper orderMapper;
    @Autowired
    private UserMapper userMapper;
    @Autowired
    private DishMapper dishMapper;
    @Autowired
    private SetmealMapper setmealMapper;

    /**
     * æ ¹æ®æ—¶é—´æ®µç»Ÿè®¡è¥ä¸šæ•°æ®
     * @param begin
     * @param end
     * @return
     */
    public BusinessDataVO getBusinessData(LocalDateTime begin, LocalDateTime end) {
        /**
         * è¥ä¸šé¢ï¼šå½“æ—¥å·²å®Œæˆè®¢å•çš„æ€»é‡‘é¢
         * æœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•ï¼šå½“æ—¥å·²å®Œæˆè®¢å•çš„æ•°é‡
         * è®¢å•å®Œæˆç‡ï¼šæœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•æ•° / æ€»è®¢å•æ•°
         * å¹³å‡å®¢å•ä»·ï¼šè¥ä¸šé¢ / æœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•æ•°
         * æ–°å¢ç”¨æˆ·ï¼šå½“æ—¥æ–°å¢ç”¨æˆ·çš„æ•°é‡
         */

        Map map = new HashMap();
        map.put("begin",begin);
        map.put("end",end);

        //æŸ¥è¯¢æ€»è®¢å•æ•°
        Integer totalOrderCount = orderMapper.countByMap(map);

        map.put("status", Orders.COMPLETED);
        //è¥ä¸šé¢
        Double turnover = orderMapper.sumByMap(map);
        turnover = turnover == null? 0.0 : turnover;

        //æœ‰æ•ˆè®¢å•æ•°
        Integer validOrderCount = orderMapper.countByMap(map);

        Double unitPrice = 0.0;

        Double orderCompletionRate = 0.0;
        if(totalOrderCount != 0 && validOrderCount != 0){
            //è®¢å•å®Œæˆç‡
            orderCompletionRate = validOrderCount.doubleValue() / totalOrderCount;
            //å¹³å‡å®¢å•ä»·
            unitPrice = turnover / validOrderCount;
        }

        //æ–°å¢ç”¨æˆ·æ•°
        Integer newUsers = userMapper.countByMap(map);

        return BusinessDataVO.builder()
                .turnover(turnover)
                .validOrderCount(validOrderCount)
                .orderCompletionRate(orderCompletionRate)
                .unitPrice(unitPrice)
                .newUsers(newUsers)
                .build();
    }


    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢è®¢å•ç®¡ç†æ•°æ®
     *
     * @return
     */
    public OrderOverViewVO getOrderOverView() {
        Map map = new HashMap();
        map.put("begin", LocalDateTime.now().with(LocalTime.MIN));
        map.put("status", Orders.TO_BE_CONFIRMED);

        //å¾…æ¥å•
        Integer waitingOrders = orderMapper.countByMap(map);

        //å¾…æ´¾é€
        map.put("status", Orders.CONFIRMED);
        Integer deliveredOrders = orderMapper.countByMap(map);

        //å·²å®Œæˆ
        map.put("status", Orders.COMPLETED);
        Integer completedOrders = orderMapper.countByMap(map);

        //å·²å–æ¶ˆ
        map.put("status", Orders.CANCELLED);
        Integer cancelledOrders = orderMapper.countByMap(map);

        //å…¨éƒ¨è®¢å•
        map.put("status", null);
        Integer allOrders = orderMapper.countByMap(map);

        return OrderOverViewVO.builder()
                .waitingOrders(waitingOrders)
                .deliveredOrders(deliveredOrders)
                .completedOrders(completedOrders)
                .cancelledOrders(cancelledOrders)
                .allOrders(allOrders)
                .build();
    }

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢èœå“æ€»è§ˆ
     *
     * @return
     */
    public DishOverViewVO getDishOverView() {
        Map map = new HashMap();
        map.put("status", StatusConstant.ENABLE);
        Integer sold = dishMapper.countByMap(map);

        map.put("status", StatusConstant.DISABLE);
        Integer discontinued = dishMapper.countByMap(map);

        return DishOverViewVO.builder()
                .sold(sold)
                .discontinued(discontinued)
                .build();
    }

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢å¥—é¤æ€»è§ˆ
     *
     * @return
     */
    public SetmealOverViewVO getSetmealOverView() {
        Map map = new HashMap();
        map.put("status", StatusConstant.ENABLE);
        Integer sold = setmealMapper.countByMap(map);

        map.put("status", StatusConstant.DISABLE);
        Integer discontinued = setmealMapper.countByMap(map);

        return SetmealOverViewVO.builder()
                .sold(sold)
                .discontinued(discontinued)
                .build();
    }
}

1.2.4 Mapperå±‚ â€‹

åœ¨SetmealMapperä¸­æ·»åŠ countByMapæ–¹æ³•å®šä¹‰

java
	/**
     * æ ¹æ®æ¡ä»¶ç»Ÿè®¡å¥—é¤æ•°é‡
     * @param map
     * @return
     */
    Integer countByMap(Map map);

åœ¨SetmealMapper.xmlä¸­æ·»åŠ å¯¹åº”SQLå®ç°

xml
<select id="countByMap" resultType="java.lang.Integer">
        select count(id) from setmeal
        <where>
            <if test="status != null">
                and status = #{status}
            </if>
            <if test="categoryId != null">
                and category_id = #{categoryId}
            </if>
        </where>
</select>

åœ¨DishMapperä¸­æ·»åŠ countByMapæ–¹æ³•å®šä¹‰

java
	/**
     * æ ¹æ®æ¡ä»¶ç»Ÿè®¡èœå“æ•°é‡
     * @param map
     * @return
     */
    Integer countByMap(Map map);

åœ¨DishMapper.xmlä¸­æ·»åŠ å¯¹åº”SQLå®ç°

xml
<select id="countByMap" resultType="java.lang.Integer">
        select count(id) from dish
        <where>
            <if test="status != null">
                and status = #{status}
            </if>
            <if test="categoryId != null">
                and category_id = #{categoryId}
            </if>
        </where>
</select>

1.3 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å¦‚ä¸‹æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ï¼š

  • é€šè¿‡æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£æµ‹è¯•
  • å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒæµ‹è¯•

æ¥ä¸‹æ¥æˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨ä¸Šè¿°ä¸¤ç§æ–¹å¼åˆ†åˆ«æµ‹è¯•ã€‚

1.3.1 æ¥å£æ–‡æ¡£æµ‹è¯• â€‹

å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡ï¼Œè®¿é—®http://localhost:8080/doc.htmlï¼Œè¿›å…¥å·¥ä½œå°ç›¸å…³æ¥å£

**æ³¨æ„ï¼š**ä½¿ç”¨adminç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•é‡æ–°è·å–tokenï¼Œåœ¨å…¨å±€å‚æ•°è®¾ç½®ä¸­æ·»åŠ ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢tokenå¤±æ•ˆã€‚

1). ä»Šæ—¥æ•°æ®æŸ¥è¯¢

2). èœå“æ€»è§ˆæŸ¥è¯¢

3). è®¢å•ç®¡ç†æ•°æ®æŸ¥è¯¢

4). å¥—é¤æ€»è§ˆæŸ¥è¯¢

1.3.2 å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒæµ‹è¯• â€‹

å¯åŠ¨nginx,è®¿é—® http://localhostï¼Œè¿›å…¥å·¥ä½œå°

è¿›å…¥å¼€å‘è€…æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æŸ¥çœ‹ä»Šæ—¥æ•°æ®ã€è®¢å•ç®¡ç†ã€èœå“æ€»è§ˆã€å¥—é¤æ€»è§ˆ

1). ä»Šæ—¥æ•°æ®æŸ¥è¯¢

2). è®¢å•ç®¡ç†æ•°æ®æŸ¥è¯¢

3). èœå“æ€»è§ˆæŸ¥è¯¢

4). å¥—é¤æ€»è§ˆæŸ¥è¯¢

1.4 ä»£ç æäº¤ â€‹

åç»­æ­¥éª¤å’Œå…¶å®ƒåŠŸèƒ½ä»£ç æäº¤ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œä¸å†èµ˜è¿°ã€‚

2. Apache POI â€‹

2.1 ä»‹ç» â€‹

Apache POI æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¤„ç†Miscrosoft Officeå„ç§æ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼çš„å¼€æºé¡¹ç›®ã€‚ç®€å•æ¥è¯´å°±æ˜¯ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ POI åœ¨ Java ç¨‹åºä¸­å¯¹Miscrosoft Officeå„ç§æ–‡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œè¯»å†™æ“ä½œã€‚ ä¸€èˆ¬æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼ŒPOI éƒ½æ˜¯ç”¨äºæ“ä½œ Excel æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

Apache POI çš„åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯ï¼š

  • é“¶è¡Œç½‘é“¶ç³»ç»Ÿå¯¼å‡ºäº¤æ˜“æ˜ç»†

  • å„ç§ä¸šåŠ¡ç³»ç»Ÿå¯¼å‡ºExcelæŠ¥è¡¨

  • æ‰¹é‡å¯¼å…¥ä¸šåŠ¡æ•°æ®

2.2 å…¥é—¨æ¡ˆä¾‹ â€‹

Apache POIæ—¢å¯ä»¥å°†æ•°æ®å†™å…¥Excelæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è¯»å–Excelæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹æ¥åˆ†åˆ«è¿›è¡Œå®ç°ã€‚

Apache POIçš„mavenåæ ‡ï¼š(é¡¹ç›®ä¸­å·²å¯¼å…¥)

xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.poi</groupId>
    <artifactId>poi</artifactId>
    <version>3.16</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.poi</groupId>
    <artifactId>poi-ooxml</artifactId>
    <version>3.16</version>
</dependency>

2.2.1 å°†æ•°æ®å†™å…¥Excelæ–‡ä»¶ â€‹

1). ä»£ç å¼€å‘

java
package com.sky.test;

import org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFCell;
import org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFRow;
import org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFSheet;
import org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFWorkbook;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;

public class POITest {

    /**
     * åŸºäºPOIå‘Excelæ–‡ä»¶å†™å…¥æ•°æ®
     * @throws Exception
     */
    public static void write() throws Exception{
        //åœ¨å†…å­˜ä¸­åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªExcelæ–‡ä»¶å¯¹è±¡
        XSSFWorkbook excel = new XSSFWorkbook();
        //åˆ›å»ºSheeté¡µ
        XSSFSheet sheet = excel.createSheet("itcast");

        //åœ¨Sheeté¡µä¸­åˆ›å»ºè¡Œï¼Œ0è¡¨ç¤ºç¬¬1è¡Œ
        XSSFRow row1 = sheet.createRow(0);
        //åˆ›å»ºå•å…ƒæ ¼å¹¶åœ¨å•å…ƒæ ¼ä¸­è®¾ç½®å€¼ï¼Œå•å…ƒæ ¼ç¼–å·ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä»0å¼€å§‹ï¼Œ1è¡¨ç¤ºç¬¬2ä¸ªå•å…ƒæ ¼
        row1.createCell(1).setCellValue("å§“å");
        row1.createCell(2).setCellValue("åŸå¸‚");

        XSSFRow row2 = sheet.createRow(1);
        row2.createCell(1).setCellValue("å¼ ä¸‰");
        row2.createCell(2).setCellValue("åŒ—äº¬");

        XSSFRow row3 = sheet.createRow(2);
        row3.createCell(1).setCellValue("æå››");
        row3.createCell(2).setCellValue("ä¸Šæµ·");

        FileOutputStream out = new FileOutputStream(new File("D:\\itcast.xlsx"));
        //é€šè¿‡è¾“å‡ºæµå°†å†…å­˜ä¸­çš„Excelæ–‡ä»¶å†™å…¥åˆ°ç£ç›˜ä¸Š
        excel.write(out);

        //å…³é—­èµ„æº
        out.flush();
        out.close();
        excel.close();
    }
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
        write();
    }
}

2). å®ç°æ•ˆæœ

åœ¨Dç›˜ä¸­ç”Ÿæˆitcast.xlsxæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºåç§°ä¸ºitcastçš„Sheeté¡µï¼ŒåŒæ—¶å°†å†…å®¹æˆåŠŸå†™å…¥ã€‚

2.2.2 è¯»å–Excelæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„æ•°æ® â€‹

1). ä»£ç å¼€å‘

java
package com.sky.test;

import org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFCell;
import org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFRow;
import org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFSheet;
import org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFWorkbook;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;

public class POITest {
    /**
     * åŸºäºPOIè¯»å–Excelæ–‡ä»¶
     * @throws Exception
     */
    public static void read() throws Exception{
        FileInputStream in = new FileInputStream(new File("D:\\itcast.xlsx"));
        //é€šè¿‡è¾“å…¥æµè¯»å–æŒ‡å®šçš„Excelæ–‡ä»¶
        XSSFWorkbook excel = new XSSFWorkbook(in);
        //è·å–Excelæ–‡ä»¶çš„ç¬¬1ä¸ªSheeté¡µ
        XSSFSheet sheet = excel.getSheetAt(0);

        //è·å–Sheeté¡µä¸­çš„æœ€åä¸€è¡Œçš„è¡Œå·
        int lastRowNum = sheet.getLastRowNum();

        for (int i = 0; i <= lastRowNum; i++) {
            //è·å–Sheeté¡µä¸­çš„è¡Œ
            XSSFRow titleRow = sheet.getRow(i);
            //è·å–è¡Œçš„ç¬¬2ä¸ªå•å…ƒæ ¼
            XSSFCell cell1 = titleRow.getCell(1);
            //è·å–å•å…ƒæ ¼ä¸­çš„æ–‡æœ¬å†…å®¹
            String cellValue1 = cell1.getStringCellValue();
            //è·å–è¡Œçš„ç¬¬3ä¸ªå•å…ƒæ ¼
            XSSFCell cell2 = titleRow.getCell(2);
            //è·å–å•å…ƒæ ¼ä¸­çš„æ–‡æœ¬å†…å®¹
            String cellValue2 = cell2.getStringCellValue();

            System.out.println(cellValue1 + " " +cellValue2);
        }

        //å…³é—­èµ„æº
        in.close();
        excel.close();
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
        read();
    }
}

2). å®ç°æ•ˆæœ

å°†itcast.xlsxæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„æ•°æ®è¿›è¡Œè¯»å–

3. å¯¼å‡ºè¿è¥æ•°æ®ExcelæŠ¥è¡¨ â€‹

3.1 éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æå’Œè®¾è®¡ â€‹

3.1.1 äº§å“åŸå‹ â€‹

åœ¨æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡é¡µé¢ï¼Œæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ®å¯¼å‡ºçš„æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»è¯¥æŒ‰é’®æ—¶ï¼Œå…¶å®å°±ä¼šä¸‹è½½ä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶å®é™…ä¸Šæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªExcelå½¢å¼çš„æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ä¸»è¦åŒ…å«æœ€è¿‘30æ—¥è¿è¥ç›¸å…³çš„æ•°æ®ã€‚è¡¨æ ¼çš„å½¢å¼å·²ç»å›ºå®šï¼Œä¸»è¦ç”±æ¦‚è§ˆæ•°æ®å’Œæ˜ç»†æ•°æ®ä¸¤éƒ¨åˆ†ç»„æˆã€‚çœŸæ­£å¯¼å‡ºè¿™ä¸ªæŠ¥è¡¨ä¹‹åï¼Œç›¸å¯¹åº”çš„æ•°å­—å°±ä¼šå¡«å……åœ¨è¡¨æ ¼ä¸­ï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥è¿›è¡Œå­˜æ¡£ã€‚

åŸå‹å›¾ï¼š

å¯¼å‡ºçš„ExcelæŠ¥è¡¨æ ¼å¼ï¼š

ä¸šåŠ¡è§„åˆ™ï¼š

  • å¯¼å‡ºExcelå½¢å¼çš„æŠ¥è¡¨æ–‡ä»¶
  • å¯¼å‡ºæœ€è¿‘30å¤©çš„è¿è¥æ•°æ®

3.1.2 æ¥å£è®¾è®¡ â€‹

é€šè¿‡ä¸Šè¿°åŸå‹å›¾è®¾è®¡å¯¹åº”çš„æ¥å£ã€‚

æ³¨æ„ï¼š

  • å½“å‰æ¥å£æ²¡æœ‰ä¼ é€’å‚æ•°ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå¯¼å‡ºçš„æ˜¯æœ€è¿‘30å¤©çš„è¿è¥æ•°æ®ï¼Œåç«¯è®¡ç®—å³å¯ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸éœ€è¦ä»»ä½•å‚æ•°

  • å½“å‰æ¥å£æ²¡æœ‰è¿”å›æ•°æ®ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæŠ¥è¡¨å¯¼å‡ºåŠŸèƒ½æœ¬è´¨ä¸Šæ˜¯æ–‡ä»¶ä¸‹è½½ï¼ŒæœåŠ¡ç«¯ä¼šé€šè¿‡è¾“å‡ºæµå°†Excelæ–‡ä»¶ä¸‹è½½åˆ°å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµè§ˆå™¨

3.3 ClassLoader å’Œ getResourceAsStream â€‹

InputStream inputStream = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("template/è¿è¥æ•°æ®æŠ¥è¡¨æ¨¡æ¿.xlsx"); è¿™æ®µä»£ç æ¶‰åŠåˆ°å‡ ä¸ª Java æŠ€æœ¯ç‚¹å’Œæ¦‚å¿µï¼Œä¸»è¦ç”¨äºä»ç±»è·¯å¾„ä¸­è¯»å–èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶ã€‚ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯å¯¹è¿™æ®µä»£ç çš„è¯¦ç»†è§£é‡Šï¼š

1. ClassLoader å’Œ getResourceAsStream â€‹

  • ClassLoaderï¼šJava çš„ ClassLoader æ˜¯ä¸€ç§ç‰¹æ®Šçš„ç±»ï¼Œç”¨äºåœ¨è¿è¡Œæ—¶åŠ è½½ç±»å’Œèµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶ã€‚æ¯ä¸ªç±»éƒ½æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªä¸ä¹‹å…³è”çš„ ClassLoaderï¼Œå®ƒè´Ÿè´£åŠ è½½è¯¥ç±»åŠå…¶ä¾èµ–çš„èµ„æºã€‚

  • getResourceAsStreamï¼šClassLoader æä¾›çš„ getResourceAsStream(String name) æ–¹æ³•ç”¨äºä»ç±»è·¯å¾„ï¼ˆclasspathï¼‰ä¸­è·å–èµ„æºçš„è¾“å…¥æµã€‚è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•ä¼šè¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ª InputStreamï¼Œé€šè¿‡å®ƒå¯ä»¥è¯»å–èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶çš„å†…å®¹ã€‚èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶å¯ä»¥æ˜¯é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ã€å›¾ç‰‡ã€æ–‡æ¡£ç­‰ã€‚

2. å…·ä½“æµç¨‹ â€‹

  1. è·å– ClassLoaderï¼š

    java
    this.getClass().getClassLoader()
    • this.getClass() è·å–å½“å‰å¯¹è±¡çš„ Class å¯¹è±¡ã€‚
    • getClassLoader() æ–¹æ³•è¿”å›ä¸å½“å‰ç±»ç›¸å…³è”çš„ ClassLoader å¯¹è±¡ã€‚

  2. è·å–èµ„æºè¾“å…¥æµï¼š

    java
    getResourceAsStream("template/è¿è¥æ•°æ®æŠ¥è¡¨æ¨¡æ¿.xlsx")
    • getResourceAsStream(String name) æ–¹æ³•æ¥å—ä¸€ä¸ªèµ„æºè·¯å¾„ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªè·¯å¾„æ˜¯ç›¸å¯¹äºç±»è·¯å¾„çš„ã€‚
    • "template/è¿è¥æ•°æ®æŠ¥è¡¨æ¨¡æ¿.xlsx" æ˜¯èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶çš„è·¯å¾„ï¼Œç›¸å¯¹äºç±»è·¯å¾„ã€‚å³ src/main/resourcesï¼ˆå¦‚æœæ˜¯ Maven é¡¹ç›®ï¼‰ä¸‹çš„ template ç›®å½•ä¸­çš„ è¿è¥æ•°æ®æŠ¥è¡¨æ¨¡æ¿.xlsx æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

  3. è¿”å› InputStreamï¼š

    • è¯¥æ–¹æ³•è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ª InputStream å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå…è®¸ä½ ä»ä¸­è¯»å–èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶çš„å†…å®¹ã€‚

3. å®é™…åº”ç”¨ â€‹

è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼å¸¸ç”¨äºè¯»å–ç±»è·¯å¾„ä¸‹çš„é™æ€èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå¦‚é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ã€æ¨¡æ¿æ–‡ä»¶ã€é™æ€æ•°æ®ç­‰ã€‚åœ¨ Spring Boot æˆ–å…¶ä»– Java åº”ç”¨ä¸­ï¼Œä½ ç»å¸¸ä¼šçœ‹åˆ°ç±»ä¼¼çš„ä»£ç æ¥åŠ è½½é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶æˆ–å…¶ä»–èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç  â€‹

å‡è®¾ä½ æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª Excel æ–‡ä»¶ è¿è¥æ•°æ®æŠ¥è¡¨æ¨¡æ¿.xlsx æ”¾åœ¨é¡¹ç›®çš„ src/main/resources/template ç›®å½•ä¸‹ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç ä»ç±»è·¯å¾„ä¸­è¯»å–å®ƒï¼š

java
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.io.IOException;

public class ResourceLoader {

    public void loadResource() {
        // è·å– ClassLoader
        ClassLoader classLoader = this.getClass().getClassLoader();

        // ä»ç±»è·¯å¾„ä¸­è·å–èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶çš„è¾“å…¥æµ
        try (InputStream inputStream = classLoader.getResourceAsStream("template/è¿è¥æ•°æ®æŠ¥è¡¨æ¨¡æ¿.xlsx")) {
            if (inputStream == null) {
                System.out.println("Resource not found!");
                return;
            }

            // å¤„ç†è¾“å…¥æµä¸­çš„æ•°æ®
            // ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œè¯»å– Excel æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹ï¼ˆè¿™é‡Œç®€å•æ‰“å°æ–‡ä»¶çš„å¤§å°ï¼‰
            System.out.println("File size: " + inputStream.available() + " bytes");
        } catch (IOException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}

æ€»ç»“

  • ClassLoader ç”¨äºåœ¨è¿è¡Œæ—¶åŠ è½½ç±»å’Œèµ„æºã€‚
  • getResourceAsStream æ–¹æ³•ä»ç±»è·¯å¾„ä¸­è·å–èµ„æºçš„è¾“å…¥æµã€‚
  • InputStream ç”¨äºè¯»å–æ•°æ®æµä¸­çš„å†…å®¹ã€‚

è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼çš„å¥½å¤„æ˜¯èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶è¢«æ‰“åŒ…åˆ°åº”ç”¨çš„ JAR æ–‡ä»¶æˆ– WAR æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ï¼Œèƒ½å¤Ÿåœ¨è¿è¡Œæ—¶è½»æ¾è®¿é—®ï¼Œè€Œä¸éœ€è¦æ‹…å¿ƒæ–‡ä»¶çš„å®é™…è·¯å¾„ã€‚

4. ç±»è·¯å¾„çš„ä½œç”¨ â€‹

  • ç±»è·¯å¾„ä»‹ç»ï¼š CSNDç±»è·¯å¾„ä»‹ç»
  • ç±»åŠ è½½ï¼šJVM ä½¿ç”¨ç±»è·¯å¾„æ¥æŸ¥æ‰¾å’ŒåŠ è½½ Java ç±»æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆ.class æ–‡ä»¶ï¼‰ã€‚å½“ä½ é€šè¿‡ Class.forName()ã€new æ“ä½œç¬¦ã€æˆ– ClassLoader æ¥åŠ è½½ç±»æ—¶ï¼ŒJVM ä¼šåœ¨ç±»è·¯å¾„ä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾è¿™äº›ç±»ã€‚
  • èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶ï¼šç±»è·¯å¾„è¿˜ç”¨äºæŸ¥æ‰¾å’ŒåŠ è½½èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå¦‚é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ã€å›¾ç‰‡ã€XML æ–‡ä»¶ç­‰ã€‚è¿™äº›èµ„æºé€šå¸¸ä½äºé¡¹ç›®çš„ src/main/resources ç›®å½•ä¸‹ï¼Œæˆ–è€…åœ¨ JAR æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ã€‚

3.2 ä»£ç å¼€å‘ â€‹

3.2.1 å®ç°æ­¥éª¤ â€‹

1). è®¾è®¡Excelæ¨¡æ¿æ–‡ä»¶

2). æŸ¥è¯¢è¿‘30å¤©çš„è¿è¥æ•°æ®

3). å°†æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°çš„è¿è¥æ•°æ®å†™å…¥æ¨¡æ¿æ–‡ä»¶

4). é€šè¿‡è¾“å‡ºæµå°†Excelæ–‡ä»¶ä¸‹è½½åˆ°å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµè§ˆå™¨

3.2.2 Controllerå±‚ â€‹

æ ¹æ®æ¥å£å®šä¹‰ï¼Œåœ¨ReportControllerä¸­åˆ›å»ºexportæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * å¯¼å‡ºè¿è¥æ•°æ®æŠ¥è¡¨
     * @param response
     */
    @GetMapping("/export")
    @ApiOperation("å¯¼å‡ºè¿è¥æ•°æ®æŠ¥è¡¨")
    public void export(HttpServletResponse response){
        reportService.exportBusinessData(response);
    }

3.2.3 Serviceå±‚æ¥å£ â€‹

åœ¨ReportServiceæ¥å£ä¸­å£°æ˜å¯¼å‡ºè¿è¥æ•°æ®æŠ¥è¡¨çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

java
	/**
     * å¯¼å‡ºè¿‘30å¤©çš„è¿è¥æ•°æ®æŠ¥è¡¨
     * @param response
     **/
    void exportBusinessData(HttpServletResponse response);

3.2.4 Serviceå±‚å®ç°ç±» â€‹

åœ¨ReportServiceImplå®ç°ç±»ä¸­å®ç°å¯¼å‡ºè¿è¥æ•°æ®æŠ¥è¡¨çš„æ–¹æ³•:

æå‰å°†èµ„æ–™ä¸­çš„è¿è¥æ•°æ®æŠ¥è¡¨æ¨¡æ¿.xlsxæ‹·è´åˆ°é¡¹ç›®çš„resources/templateç›®å½•ä¸­

java
    /**å¯¼å‡ºè¿‘30å¤©çš„è¿è¥æ•°æ®æŠ¥è¡¨
     * @param response
     **/
    public void exportBusinessData(HttpServletResponse response) {
        LocalDate begin = LocalDate.now().minusDays(30);
        LocalDate end = LocalDate.now().minusDays(1);
        //æŸ¥è¯¢æ¦‚è§ˆè¿è¥æ•°æ®ï¼Œæä¾›ç»™Excelæ¨¡æ¿æ–‡ä»¶
        BusinessDataVO businessData = workspaceService.getBusinessData(LocalDateTime.of(begin,LocalTime.MIN), LocalDateTime.of(end, LocalTime.MAX));
        InputStream inputStream = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("template/è¿è¥æ•°æ®æŠ¥è¡¨æ¨¡æ¿.xlsx");
        try {
            //åŸºäºæä¾›å¥½çš„æ¨¡æ¿æ–‡ä»¶åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„Excelè¡¨æ ¼å¯¹è±¡
            XSSFWorkbook excel = new XSSFWorkbook(inputStream);
            //è·å¾—Excelæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªSheeté¡µ
            XSSFSheet sheet = excel.getSheet("Sheet1");

            sheet.getRow(1).getCell(1).setCellValue(begin + "è‡³" + end);
            //è·å¾—ç¬¬4è¡Œ
            XSSFRow row = sheet.getRow(3);
            //è·å–å•å…ƒæ ¼
            row.getCell(2).setCellValue(businessData.getTurnover());
            row.getCell(4).setCellValue(businessData.getOrderCompletionRate());
            row.getCell(6).setCellValue(businessData.getNewUsers());
            row = sheet.getRow(4);
            row.getCell(2).setCellValue(businessData.getValidOrderCount());
            row.getCell(4).setCellValue(businessData.getUnitPrice());
            for (int i = 0; i < 30; i++) {
                LocalDate date = begin.plusDays(i);
               //å‡†å¤‡æ˜ç»†æ•°æ®
                businessData = workspaceService.getBusinessData(LocalDateTime.of(date,LocalTime.MIN), LocalDateTime.of(date, LocalTime.MAX));
                row = sheet.getRow(7 + i);
                row.getCell(1).setCellValue(date.toString());
                row.getCell(2).setCellValue(businessData.getTurnover());
                row.getCell(3).setCellValue(businessData.getValidOrderCount());
                row.getCell(4).setCellValue(businessData.getOrderCompletionRate());
                row.getCell(5).setCellValue(businessData.getUnitPrice());
                row.getCell(6).setCellValue(businessData.getNewUsers());
            }
            //é€šè¿‡è¾“å‡ºæµå°†æ–‡ä»¶ä¸‹è½½åˆ°å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµè§ˆå™¨ä¸­
            ServletOutputStream out = response.getOutputStream();
            excel.write(out);
            //å…³é—­èµ„æº
            out.flush();
            out.close();
            excel.close();

        }catch (IOException e){
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

3.4 åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• â€‹

ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨å‰åç«¯è”è°ƒæµ‹è¯•ã€‚

è¿›å…¥æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡

ç‚¹å‡»æ•°æ®å¯¼å‡ºï¼šExcelæŠ¥è¡¨ä¸‹è½½æˆåŠŸ

3.5 ä»£ç æäº¤ â€‹

åç»­æ­¥éª¤å’Œå…¶å®ƒåŠŸèƒ½ä»£ç æäº¤ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œä¸å†èµ˜è¿°ã€‚

æœ€åæ›´æ–°äº:

Pager
